title: Yankees starter Luis Gil exits in 4th inning against Guardians with lower back tightness
creator: By LARRY FLEISHER - Associated Press
content: NEW YORK (AP) — Yankees rookie Luis Gil exited Tuesday night’s start against the Cleveland Guardians in the fourth inning with lower back tightness. After throwing an 89 mph changeup to Jose Ramírez, the right-hander called for an athletic trainer. Following a brief meeting on the mound that included New York manager Aaron Boone, Gil was replaced by Tim Hill. Before his final delivery, Gil allowed a homer to Brayan Rocchio and walked Steven Kwan on four pitches. The Yankees said Gil was examined by Dr. David Trofa, the team's orthopedic doctor, and will be reassessed again Wednesday. No imaging was scheduled. Pitching on seven days’ rest, Gil allowed three runs and three hits in three-plus innings. He struggled with command most of the night, walking six and throwing first-pitch strikes to only six of 19 batters. Gil is 12-6 with a 3.39 ERA in 25 starts but has issued 66 walks. He has thrown 124 2/3 innings after missing most of the previous two seasons due to Tommy John surgery. Gil debuted in August 2021 and was 1-1 with a 3.38 ERA in six outings. He made one start for the Yankees in 2022 before getting injured. New York began the night with a half-game lead in the AL East over Baltimore. AP MLB: https://apnews.com/hub/mlb

title: Yankees se niegan a bajar a Anthony Volpe a las menores tras bajón ofensivo
creator: Miguel Rapetti
content: La temporada del shortstop de New York Yankees, Anthony Volpe, ha sido bastante irregular , con grandes momentos a comienzos del 2024 pero un bajón ofensivo clave entre julio y agosto, lo que ha hecho despertar rumores que este martes se encargó de desmentir el gerente general de los Mulos, Brian Cashman. Con la idea de mejorar su rendimiento algunas fuentes han teorizado con que los Yankees podrían mandar a Volpe a las Ligas Menores, pero esto fue desestimado de inmediato por Cashman que cree que no hay forma de desarrollar su juego que en las Grandes Ligas. “No hemos hablado de eso”, dijo Cashman a Joel Sherman (New York Post). “Siento que, por lejos, creemos en él y, sí, su desarrollo continúa a nivel de las Grandes Ligas. Obviamente, hay dificultades cuando se le quita la oportunidad a alguien al principio, cosa que se ganó (en 2023) pero todavía está encontrando su camino “. Aunque Volpe en el mes de agosto ha tenido un promedio de .186, en el mes de mayo también contó con una gran ofensiva de .293 con una seguidillas importante de juegos con al menos un hit, lo que ratificó la confianza de los Yankees en el joven infielder. “ También es, por lejos, nuestro mejor jugador en esa posición (shortstop), y se podría decir que es, por lejos, nuestro mejor jugador en nuestro cuadro interior “, añadió. Los comentarios de Cashman también fueron respaldados por el mánager de Yankees, Aaron Boone , que indicó que Volpe es el mejor en su posición de toda la...

Corbin Carroll homers as the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1
creator: AP
content: MIAMI (AP) — Corbin Carroll and Lourdes Gurriel Jr. homered to help Eduardo Rodriguez and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1 on Tuesday night. Arizona, which finished with four hits, improved to a major league-best 30-13 since July 1. Carroll also singled and scored on Joc Pederson's base hit, and Geraldo Perdomo walked twice. title: Corbin Carroll homers as the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1
creator: AP
content: MIAMI (AP) — Corbin Carroll and Lourdes Gurriel Jr. homered to help Eduardo Rodriguez and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1 on Tuesday night. Arizona, which finished with four hits, improved to a major league-best 30-13 since July 1. Carroll also singled and scored on Joc Pederson's base hit, and Geraldo Perdomo walked twice. Rodriguez allowed one run and six hits over 5 1/3 innings in his third start of the season since being activated from the injured list on Aug. 7. Rodriguez (2-0) struck out five and walked one. Ryan Thompson, A.J. Puk and Justin Martinez combined for 3 2/3 innings of one-hit ball after Rodriguez departed. Martinez worked a perfect ninth for his fourth save in five opportunities. The Marlins hit five doubles, but they went 1 for 9 with runners in scoring position. Carroll helped Arizona get off to a fast start. He hit a leadoff single in the first and advanced on a balk by Edward Cabrera. After Perdomo popped out, Carroll scampered home on Pederson’s grounder into center field. Carroll connected in the fifth for his third homer in five games and No. 14 on the season overall. He drove a sinker from Cabrera over the wall in left. The Marlins got their only run on Xavier Edwards’ RBI single in the bottom of the fifth, but Gurriel responded with a 414-foot drive to left in the sixth for his 15th homer. Cabrera (2-5) allowed four hits in six innings. The right-hander walked three and struck out three. The Diamondbacks signed veteran...

title: Una madre y sus tres hijos hallados a salvo en Nevada tras desaparecer en Utah
creator: Roxana Navarro
content: El Departamento de Policía de St. George informó que la madre de 27 años y sus tres hijos fueron encontrados a salvo por la Patrulla de Carreteras de Nevada, luego de ser reportados como desaparecidos y en peligro en Utah. Después de una investigación, descubrieron que el padre de los niños era sospechoso de la desaparición de su familia, y fue puesto bajo custodia. La madre fue identificada como Brittany Etta Deal, de 27 años , y sus tres hijos; Braylee Michelle Kelly, de 9 años, Quentin Michael Kelly, de 5 años y Brixton King Haley, de 2 años , fueron reportados como desaparecidos el lunes 19 de agosto cuando un familiar llamó a la policía en St. George porque estaba preocupado por la familia. La mujer sufría violencia doméstica La policía realizó una verificación de bienestar, pero no encontró a nadie en la casa. Enviaron una alerta de “desaparición en peligro” con la descripción física de cada uno de ellos. Documentos oficiales que compartió KSL News, el 14 de agosto, Brittany fue hospitalizada luego de una pelea con el sospechoso. Las autoridades de Utah dijeron que la última vez que vieron a los tres menores fue cuando su padre, identificado como David Gene Remley, de 36 años, los recogió en la escuela el lunes . El hombre conducía la camioneta GMC Terrain blanco con matrícula de Utah 5AF687, propiedad de Brittany , y no sabían si la mujer iba dentro de ella, explicaron en un comunicado. “La policía pide ayuda del público para localizar a...

title: Gomber pitches 7 strong innings, Rockies hold on to beat Nationals 3-1
creator: Harvey Valentine, The Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — Austin Gomber gave up one run and three hits in seven innings, Ryan McMahon had two hits and drove in a run, and the Colorado Rockies beat the Washington Nationals 3-1 on Tuesday night. WASHINGTON (AP) — Austin Gomber gave up one run and three hits in seven innings, Ryan McMahon had two hits and drove in a run, and the Colorado Rockies beat the Washington Nationals 3-1 on Tuesday night. Brenton Doyle and Ezequiel Tovar each had two hits and scored a run for Colorado, which has won three of its last four. Gomber (4-8) threw 96 pitches, striking out five and walking two. Angel Chivilli pitched around a one-out walk and single in the ninth for his first career save. Rockies outfielder Nolan Jones went 1 for 4 with an RBI single in his first game back from the injured list. He was activated Sunday and had been on the IL since July 11 with a lower back strain. CJ Abrams homered for the Nationals, who were held to five hits and have lost five of their last six games. Trinayani Serial Today August 21st: 'త్రినయని' సీరియల్: తవ్వకాల్లో నిధిని సొంతం చేసుకున్న నయని.. మిగతా అందరికీ షాక్‌ కొడుతుందేంటి?
creator: Jhanshi Balleda
content: Trinayani Serial Today Episode సుమన విశాల్‌కి తేలు కుట్టిన చోట తవ్వకాలు చేయాలని చెప్తే అందరూ ఆశ్చర్యపోతారు. తిలోత్తమ వల్లభతో మనం చేయాలి అనుకున్న పని సుమన చేస్తానంటోందని చెప్తుంది. అందరూ ఇప్పుడొద్దని అంటే సుమన కచ్చితంగా తవ్వాలని చాలా విలువైనదేదో ఉందని చెప్తుంది. ఎవరూ తన మాట వినడం లేదని పెద్దబొట్టమ్మ వచ్చి చెప్తా అంది ఇంకా రాలేదని సుమన అనుకుంటుంది. హాసిని: విశాల్‌కి మంచి చెడు జరిగిన చోట మళ్లీ వెళ్లి తవ్వుకోవడం అవసరమా తిలోత్తమ: ఒకరికి చెడు జరిగిందని అందరికీ అలా జరుగుతుందని అనుకోవడం కరెక్టేనా. దురంధర: ఇప్పుడు తవ్వకుండా ఉంటే నష్టం ఏం లేదు కదా. వల్లభ: లాభం పోతుంది కదా. అక్కడేమైనా నిధి, నిక్షేపాలు ఉన్నాయేమో. పెద్దబొట్టమ్మ: నిధి ఉందో అక్కడికి వెళ్లి తవ్వాలని విధిలో రాసుందేమో ఎవరికీ తెలుసు. మీ మాటలు అక్కడి వరకు వినిపిస్తున్నాయి. సుమన: ఇంకీ ఏమంటారు తవ్వుతారా లేదా విక్రాంత్: అక్కడేం లేకపోతే ఆ గోతిలోనే నిన్ను పాతేస్తాం. వల్లభ: పెద్ద బొట్టమ్మ కూడా సుమనకు వత్తాసు పలుకుతుంది అంటే ఏదో విషయం ఉంటుంది. సుమన: అక్క ఇంకేం ఆలోచించకు బావ గారికి తేలు కుట్టిన చోటు తవ్వితే నిధి దొరక్కపోయినా బావగారి గాయానికి మందు దొరుకుతుందేమో. నయని: తవ్వుదాం. నా భర్తకి చెడు జరిగిన చోటే మంచి జరుగుతుందని నమ్ముతున్నా. తిలోత్తమ: మనసులో నీ నమ్మకమే మాకు ముఖ్యం నయని. పెద్దబొట్టమ్మ: మనసులో అది బయట పడితే మాకు మణి మార్గం బోధపడుతుంది నయని. సుమన: మనసులో నన్ను శ్రీమంతురాలిని నువ్వే చేయబోతున్నావ్ అక్క. చూద్దాం ఏం జరుగుతుందో అందరూ విశాల్‌కి తేలు కుట్టిన చోటుకి వెళ్తారు. ఇక సుమనకు నువ్వే చెప్పావ్ కదా అని పెద్దబొట్టమ్మని తిలోత్తమ అడుగుతుంది. ఇక పెద్దబొట్టమ్మ ఆ నిధి కోసం ఆరుగురు వెయిట్ చేస్తున్నారని చెప్తుంది. తిలోత్తమ...

title: Here. We. Go: Morristown East, Morristown West getting ready for 53rd career meeting
creator: By Rob Harvey Tribune Sports Editor
content: There’s a chill in the air this week which can only mean one thing. Football is back. And with football back, that means Morristown East and Morristown West are set for the Citizen Tribune Kickoff Classic on Friday night at 7 p.m. at Burke-Toney Stadium to open up the season. Both teams are coming off jamboree appearances last week, East falling 13-7 to Clinton while West had a scoreless quarter with Cherokee. “I think we tackled much better during the jamboree and just executed better,” Morristown West coach Alvin Sanders said. “We had a turnover but responded back from it. There was no head hanging. We moved the football, even with guys in different positions. We’re really excited about that.” “I thought we’ve had a mature response following the jamboree,” Morristown East coach Dallas Kuykendall said. “We’ve responded to our mistakes. Our mistakes were basic things that were easy to fix. We’re working on things this week to make sure we leave no doubt and kids know where they need to be and what they’re doing there.” Friday’s battle between the two teams will be the second City Championship game for Kuykendall. After experiencing the atmosphere last year and everything that surrounds the game, he said he feels much more comfortable in year two. “You feel a lot more comfortable and know the situation better,” Kuykendall said. “Until you’re in that environment, there’s nothing else that compares. Having last year under my belt and understanding what this game means to the...

title: दिल्ली पोलिसांकडून मनोरमा खेडकरांचे नामनिर्देशन पत्राची चौकशी
creator: सुनील भोंगळ
content: Pooja Khedkar अहमदनगर : वादग्रस्त आयएएस अधिकारी पूजा खेडकर यांच्या कुटुंबाच्या संदर्भातील कागदपत्रांची माहिती घेण्यासाठी काल पाथर्डी येथील तहसील कार्यालयात दिल्ली पोलिसांचे दोन जणांचे पथक आले होते. या पथकाने स्थानिक प्रशासनाकडून पूजा खेडकर यांच्या आई आणि भालगावच्या माजी लोकनियुक्त सरपंच डॉ. मनोरमा खेडकर यांनी ग्रामपंचायत निवडणूक लढवताना जे नामनिर्देशन पत्र तहसील कार्यालयातील निवडणूक शाखेत दाखल केले होते ते नामनिर्देशन पत्र आपल्या ताब्यात घेतले. पोलिसांचे पथक खेडकर (Pooja Khedkar) कुटुंबाचे गाव असलेल्या भालगाव येथे सुद्धा जाईल असे वाटत होते. मात्र भालगावला न जात या पथकाने तहसील कार्यालयातच डॉ. खेडकर यांनी जे नामनिर्देशन पत्र दाखल केले होते त्याची माहिती घेतली. डॉ. खेडकर यांनी मागील वेळेस झालेल्या जिल्हा परिषदेच्या निवडणुकीत उमेदवारी केली होती. मात्र त्यांना पराभवाला सामोरे जावे लागले होते, तर त्यानंतर झालेल्या भालगाव गावच्या लोकनियुक्त सरपंच निवडणुकीत त्या उभ्या राहिल्या आणि बहुमताने निवडूनसुद्धा आल्या होत्या. मात्र त्यानंतर पुन्हा एकदा झालेल्या ग्रामपंचायत निवडणुकीत त्यांना पराभवाचा सामना करावा लागला होता. या निवडणुकीत डॉ. खेडकर यांनी जे नामनिर्देशन पत्र दाखल केले होते आणि त्याच्यासोबत जी कागदपत्रे निवडणूक शाखेत दाखल केली होती. त्या सर्व कागदपत्रांची आज दिल्लीच्या पथकाने छाननी करत या कागदपत्रांच्या प्रति आपल्यासोबत नेल्या. या संदर्भात या पथकाकडून माहिती घेण्याचा प्रयत्न केला असता त्यांनी या विषयावर बोलण्यास नकार दिला. नेमकं प्रकरण काय? पूजा दिलीप खेडकर (Pooja Khedkar) 2023 च्या बॅचच्या आयएएस अधिकारी होती. केंद्रीय लोकसेवा आयोगाच्या (UPSC) परीक्षेत तिने 841 वा क्रमांक पटकावला...

title: പട്ടയ പ്രശ്നം: ഡിജിറ്റൽ സർവേ ഫീൽഡ് ജോലികൾ കഴിഞ്ഞു
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: ‘Appreciate the good in life,’ PM Anwar tells Malaysians students in India during meet with diaspora
content: NEW DELHI, Aug 21 — Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim concluded the second day of his visit to India by attending an engagement session with the Malaysian diaspora at the Malaysian High Commission here. In his speech at the event, the prime minister highlighted the necessity for Malaysia to make some unpopular decisions, such as the rationalisation of diesel subsidies, to prevent the country’s wealth from being exploited by outsiders. Anwar, who is on an official visit to India from August 19 to 21, also advised the students and younger Malaysians present to appreciate the good in life. “As long as opportunities are given and help is granted, we (should) work together,” he said to an audience of over 100 Malaysians. Today, Anwar is scheduled to meet with Indian industry captains and BJP President J.P.Nadda and conduct an exit press conference with the Malaysian media before departing for Kuala Lumpur. — Bernama

title: टी20 वर्ल्ड कप में न्यूयॉर्क की पिच को ICC ने दी हैरान कर देने वाली रेटिंग, दिग्गजों ने जमकर की थी आलोचना
creator: मोहम्मद अलफैज
content: T20 World Cup 2024 Pitches Rating: टी20 वर्ल्ड कप 2024 अमेरिका और वेस्टइंडीज़ की मेज़बानी में खेला गया था. अमेरिकी में क्रिकेट को बढ़ावा देने के लिए यहां टूर्नामेंट के कुछ मैचों का आयोजन हुआ था. टी20 विश्व कप के लिए अमेरिका के न्यूयॉर्क में एक नया अस्थाई स्टेडियम बनाया गया था, जिसका नाम नासाऊ काउंटी क्रिकेट स्टेडियम था. इस स्टेडियम में ड्रॉप इन पिचों का इस्तेमाल किया गया था, जिसकी जमकर आलोचना हुई थी. नासाऊ काउंटी क्रिकेट स्टेडियम की पिचों की दिग्गजों ने खूब आलोचना की थी. इस मैदान पर कोई भी हाई स्कोरिंग मैच देखने को नहीं मिला था. इसी मैदान पर भारत और पाकिस्तान के बीच भी मुकाबला खेला गया था. यहां की ड्रॉप इन पिचों को एडिलेड के क्यूरेटर डेमियन हफ ने तैयार किया था. हालांकि बगैर किसी टेस्टिंग के ही इन पिचों पर मैच करवा दिए गए थे. पिचों में काफी असमतल उच्छाल देखने को मिली थी, जिससे बल्लेबाज़ों को बैटिंग करने में काफी दिक्कतों का सामना करना पड़ा था. हालांकि गेंदबाज़ों के लिहाज से यहां की पिच अच्छी साबित हुई थी. न्यूयॉर्क के आठ मैचों में पहली पारी का औसत स्कोर 107.6 था. आईसीसी ने दी चौंकाने वाली रेटिंग अब लंबे इंतजार के बाद आईसीसी ने आखिरकार पिच को लेकर रेटिंग जारी कर दी. न्यूयॉर्क मैचों के लिए रंजन मदुगले, डेविड बून, जेफ क्रो और रिची रिचर्डसन चार रेफरी थे. न्यूयॉर्क की पिचों पर भारत बनाम पाकिस्तान सहित खले गए 8 मैचों में 6 मैचों को 'संतोषजनक' रेटिंग मिली है. वहीं भारत बनाम आयरलैंड सहित यहां हुए दो मुकाबलों को 'असंतोषजनक' रेटिंग मिली. इसके अलावा श्रीलंका और दक्षिण अफ्रीका के बीच खेल के लिए इस्तेमाल की गई पिच को भी रेफरी ने नापसंद किया है. वहीं सुपर-8 में भारत और अफगानिस्तान के बीच...

title: 'Lackadaisical approach' by officer: LG directs 'surrendering of services' of IAS officer
creator: The Hans India
content: New Delhi: Delhi Lieutenant Governor V K Saxena has directed "surrendering of the services" of an IAS officer at the disposal of Department of Personnel and Training for repatriation to his parent cadre over his alleged "lackadaisical approach" in finalising a tripartite agreement. In a communication to DDA Vice-chairman Ashish Kundra, Principal Secretary to LG Saxena said several meetings were held under Saxena over utilising drone surveys. "I am writing to address a critical issue regarding utilising drone surveys to generate and analyse the data to determine the current status of the land, including encroachments, unauthorised constructions, change detection etc, which was discussed and deliberated in meetings chaired by the Lt Governor on June 6, August 2, and August 16," read the communication. These meetings attended by the chief secretary of Delhi, commissioners of the MCD and other senior officials, focused on expanding the scope of the memorandum of understanding (MoU) dated August 23, 2019, between the DDA and the Survey of India (Sol) into a tripartite agreement by including the MCD. "This expansion is intended to ensure that the outputs of the drone surveys benefit all concerned government organisations and citizens of Delhi. "It has been noted with grave concern that despite commitment in June itself to finalise the tripartite agreement of the DDA, MCD and Survey of India within a week and to start the work on ground, nothing has happened in this regard," it...

title: '여러분 야구의 날은 언제였나요?'...KBO, 8월 23일 팬 감사 이벤트 진행
64세 이경규 울부짖었다...최초 건강검진 결과 공개 (경이로운 습관)
content: 64세 이경규 울부짖었다...최초 건강검진 결과 공개 (경이로운 습관) 방송인 이경규가 SBS ‘이경규의 경이로운 습관’을 통해 방송 인생 최초로 건강 프로그램 MC에 도전한다. ‘이경규의 경이로운 습관’은 연예계 대부 이경규와 톡톡 튀는 매력의 소유자 이윤아 아나운서가 3명의 의사들과 함께 자리해 건강해지는 습관과 노하우에 대해 얘기하는 새로운 형태의 토크 프로그램이다. 귓불의 주름으로 MRI를 찍으러 가는 등 한바탕 소동을 겪었던 이경규. 올해 64세인 그는 이제 건강에 관심 가질 나이라면서 건강 챌린지 도전자들에 10000% 동질감을 느꼈다고 털어놨다. 이경규는 도전자들의 상태에 대해 누구보다 분노하고, 걱정하고, 공감하는 모습을 보였다는 후문이다. 이경규는 데뷔 44년 만에 처음으로 실제 검진을 통해 건강 상태 결과를 낱낱이 스튜디오에서 공개한다. 건강검진 촬영 도중 이런 방송은 처음이라며 울부짖었다고 하는데. 해당 검사 결과를 분석한 의사들이 전문용어로 설명하자 이경규는 내가 알아들을 수 있게 “쉽게 쉽게 하잔 말이야~”라며 그답게 호통을 쳐 스튜디오를 웃음바다로 만들었다는 후문이다. ‘이경규의 경이로운 습관’은 9월 1일 첫 방송된다.

title: El Kilómetro, núcleo de la criminalidad en Choloma
creator: Noticias de hoy en Honduras: Sucesos, deportes y más
content: El Kilómetro sigue figurando como el sector más conflictivo del municipio de Choloma, norte de Honduras, por los crímenes de alto impacto que se están registrando. En ese sector se han suscitado tres asesinatos en menos de 15 días, de cuya autoría señala la Policía a un grupo criminal denominado a la Célula de El Kilómetro de la Pandilla 18 que opera en la zona. La ultima víctima de esa célula es un joven que privaron de su libertad el lunes 19 de agosto en El Kilómetro y apareció asesinado ese mismo día en los bordos de la colonia Primavera de Choloma. Las indagaciones de la Policía establecen que ese grupo criminal tiene en su haber varios secuestros exprés de los cuales tres las víctimas fueron asesinadas este año. El joven ultimado el lunes respondía al nombre de Bayron Moisés Alvarenga Toro (de 22 años) quien, según averiguaciones de la Policía, residía en La Lima y fue privado de su libertad en el sector de El Kilómetro. Se informó que Alvarenga Toro andaba visitando a su novia en El Kilómetro, pero ya le habían avisado los pandilleros que no lo querían ver en esa zona y no hizo caso a la advertencia. De acuerdo a lo indicado, el joven tenía pocos meses de haber salido de la cárcel de Támara. Dos pintores de carros fueron secuestrados y sesinados en El Kilómetro Con Alvarenga Toro ya suman tres las personas asesinadas por los pandilleros de la 18 en menos de 15 días. El 6 de agosto, los pintores de carros Sergio Geovany Portillo...

title: 恐怖!迷信「亂倫殺嬰」可致富 57歲獸父性侵女兒9年埋7嬰屍
content: 印尼發生亂倫性侵殺嬰案,中年父親因受巫師唆擺,迷信與親生女兒亂倫,並將生下的子女即時殺死,就能極速致富,他因而性侵女兒長達9年,其間生下7名子女,全殺掉埋屍。 去年有村民在岸邊發現多具嬰屍,事件因而揭發。涉事男子被起訴謀殺、違反兒童保護法等罪名,其女兒因身心嚴重受創,被送入婦幼保護組織照顧。警方目前只找到4具嬰屍,其他仍在找尋中,案件情節近日在網上瘋傳,引起網民嘩然,紛紛要求判處該名獸父極刑。 深信亂倫殺嬰可極速致富 綜合外媒報導,案件發生於印尼中爪哇省班尤瑪斯縣(Banyumas)的村莊,去年6月15日,有村民在河岸邊發現嬰屍後報警。警方接手調查,相繼挖出3具嬰屍,追查下發現57歲男子魯迪(Rudi)有重嫌,隨即將他拘捕。 經審問後,魯迪對罪行直認不諱,又透露自己在10多年前認識1名巫師,對方指「和親生女兒發生關係」可以極速致富,且須殺掉父女亂倫生下來的小孩。 亂倫9年誕下7嬰兒全被殺 魯迪對此深信不疑,自2013年開始性侵當時年僅13歲的女兒,多次威逼利誘女兒就範,直到2021年間陸續生下5男2女,共計7名嬰兒。魯迪對親生孩子下毒手,用布料掩住初生嬰兒的口鼻,將嬰兒悶死後再把屍體埋在河岸邊,至少有7名新生兒被埋。魯迪為怕東窗事發,多次威脅妻女不將事件得告知他人,不過多年來並沒有變得富有。 報導指多年來被父親性侵的女生,其間曾和男友誕下1子,後來交由其他家庭收養。而事件被揭發後,女生因身心靈嚴重受創,已被送往婦幼保護組織照顧,魯迪則依謀殺及違反兒童保護法等罪名被起訴,最重將面臨死刑。警方目前只找到4具嬰屍,其他嬰屍仍在搜索中。 案件情節近日在網上瘋傳,網友都感到十分憤怒,認為獸父毀掉女兒一生,甚至指迷信也只是借口,身為父親為一己私慾性侵女兒及殺嬰,罪不可恕,認為該判處極刑。 延伸閱讀: 澳監獄駭人性侵案!男囚被多人性侵半小時 獄警玩手機未阻止受查 大學生付錢約炮16歲女高中生 赴公園野戰加錢做這事 下場慘了 文章授權轉載自 《香港01》

title: Gomber pitches 7 strong innings, Rockies hold on to beat Nationals 3-1
creator: By HARVEY VALENTINE - Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — Austin Gomber gave up one run and three hits in seven innings, Ryan McMahon had two hits and drove in a run, and the Colorado Rockies beat the Washington Nationals 3-1 on Tuesday night. Brenton Doyle and Ezequiel Tovar each had two hits and scored a run for Colorado, which has won three of its last four. Gomber (4-8) threw 96 pitches, striking out five and walking two. Angel Chivilli pitched around a one-out walk and single in the ninth for his first career save. Rockies outfielder Nolan Jones went 1 for 4 with an RBI single in his first game back from the injured list. He was activated Sunday and had been on the IL since July 11 with a lower back strain. CJ Abrams homered for the Nationals, who were held to five hits and have lost five of their last six games. Washington starter DJ Herz (2-6) gave up three runs (two earned) on six hits while striking out seven and walking two in 5 2/3 innings. Three consecutive hits, the last a single by McMahon, gave the Rockies a 1-0 lead in the first. The Nationals put runners on first and second with one out in the fifth, but Gomber got Jacob Young on a fly to left and Alex Call on a grounder to short. Jones' single made it 2-0 in the sixth and another run scored in the inning on a throwing error by Nationals third baseman José Tena. Abrams cut the deficit to 3-1 when he led off the sixth with a homer. TRAINER’S ROOM Rockies: RHP Ryan Feltner (right shoulder strain) is scheduled to make a rehab start for Triple-A...

title: Mumbai Weather Update: Rains Return, Easing Heat And Humidity; IMD Issues Yellow Alert
Australia approves US$13.5 billion project to export solar power to Singapore
content: SYDNEY: Australia said on Wednesday (Aug 21) it had given the go-ahead for a A$20 billion (US$13.5 billion) solar project that plans to ship energy from a giant solar farm in the country's north to Singapore through a 4,300km undersea cable . Environment Minister Tanya Plibersek said SunCable's flagship Australia-Asia power link project would help meet the growing demand for renewable energy at home and abroad. A final investment decision is expected in 2027 with electricity supply to begin in the early 2030s, according to SunCable. The approval comes with strict conditions to protect nature and the project must avoid the habitat of greater bilby, which are small rabbit-like marsupials with long floppy ears , Plibersek said. Over two stages of development, the project aims to deliver up to 6 gigawatts of green electricity to large-scale industrial customers in Darwin, the capital city of Australia's Northern Territory, and in Singapore. The approval comes as the centre-left government ramps up renewable energy projects even as the opposition coalition proposes building nuclear plants to replace coal-fired power by 2050, in a country where nuclear power is currently banned. SunCable, owned by billionaire Mike Cannon-Brookes, said the approval was "a vote of confidence" in the project. Cannon-Brookes, the co-founder of tech firm Atlassian turned environmental activist, last year said the project was viable and that outside investors would be drawn to the project. "SunCable...

title: Bhopal: Health Dept Issues Guidelines For Safety In MP Medical Colleges After NMC Directive
content: Bhopal (Madhya Pradesh): Medical superintendent (MS) and Medical college dean will compulsorily take round at night in campus and police and local administration will be approached for coordination for night patrolling. After National Medical commission (NMC) instruction over RG Kar Medical College rape and murder incidence, Health department of Madhya Pradesh has laid down guideline for the safety of medical students in hospitals and 17 government medical colleges. The guidelines have been finalized after meeting with Deans of medical colleges through video conferencing recently. Over safety issue, junior doctors were on strike in Madhya Pradesh demanding implementation of doctors protection act. The other points of safety measure are as follow  - CCTV cameras, lightings in sensitive areas like basement, parking, stairs, top of buildings were public movement is very less. - Arrangement of security at exit, entry points of hospitals, medical colleges to check anti-social elements. - Safety arrangement for patients as well as their attenders - Medical colleges should approach police, local administration for coordination in night patrolling. - If there is police chowki, instruction should be given to take the stance for safety measures. - Only one attender be allowed with patient if patient is serious. - After 6:00pm, entry of unnecessary people should be prohibited.

title: ATENCIÓN: Fichaje BOMBA estaría por llegar a la Liga BBVA MX
content: Habrá más fichajes para Rayados en la presente ventana de transferencias, así lo aseguro José Antonio ‘ Tato ’ Noriega , presidente deportivo del conjunto regiomontano. Luego de la baja de Maximiliano Meza, quien continuará su carrera en River Plate, compartió que no descartan que se integren nuevos futbolistas a la plantilla. Para el regreso del torneo Apertura 2024 de la Liga BBVA MX, luego de su participación en la Leagues Cup 2024, Rayados empezará una nueva era en el banquillo: Fernando ‘Tano’ Ortiz salió del club y, en principio Nicolás Sánchez como interino. Martín Demichelis continuará al mando. La figura, la sorpresa y la decepción de la Leagues Cup Te puede interesar: Martín Demichelis confirma quien es la figura de Rayados “Ante la salida de Maxi ( Mexa ), se nos abre la posibilidad de traer un jugador no formado en México. Lo hemos platicado con Martín ( Demichelis ) y estamos en ese análisis. No queremos tomar una decisión apresurada. [...] Hemos estado avanzando en nombres y con negociaciones avanzadas también, obviamente. Pero lo analizaremos cuando Martín tenga un poco más claro y podamos conjuntamente tomar una decisión”, fueron las palabras de José Antonio ‘ Tato ’ Noriega , directivo de Rayados . A lo largo del mercado de fichajes, Orbelín Pineda ha sido vinculado con un regreso al futbol mexicano para jugar en Rayados ; sin embargo, la decisión final sería que permanezca en Europa con el AEK Atenas, bajo la dirección técnica...

title: Laline: How Executives Can Foster Adaptive, Resilient Organisational Culture, Inspire Change and Sustainable Success
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: Rodria Laline, the inventor of the first chip used on the first ATM card, is a former senior vice-president of Oracle in Asia Pacific and Harvard and is an INSEAD and IESE professor. She has been CEO of global research and development collaborations with IBM, ING, Hewlett-Packard, Digital Equipment Corporation, Honeywell Bull, Elsevier Science, Oracle Corporation, Siemens and Philips. She was co-founder of the Global Chipcard Alliance and an Open Software Foundation board member. She will be among the four faculty members delivering the TEXEM, UK programme Strategic Agility and Inspiring Change. Other faculty members include Ambassador Charles Crawford, an Oxford and Harvard-trained British diplomat. He is the winner of the equivalent of two Oscars and a former British ambassador to Bosnia and Poland. Oxford-trained Prof Roger Delves, board member at Global Firm at the age of 30 and Dr Alim Abubakre, advisory board member of London Business School Africa Society and Founder of TEXEM, UK. In this interview, Laline shares insights on how to inspire change and fuel Sustainable Success as part of this TEXEM, UK programme ‘Strategic Agility and Inspiring Change: Fuelling Sustainable Success’, taking place between August 26 and 29 at Hilton Liverpool. Excerpt: Given your extensive experience with global giants like IBM, Oracle, and Siemens, how can executives effectively navigate the complexities of strategic agility in their organisations today? Strategic agility is about...

title: CEO identifies education, psychological development as most effective charity
creator: Amaechi Okonkwo
content: The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Housing and Construction Mayor Limited, My-ACE China, has identified education and psychological development as the two most effective ways of the giving charity. He made the observation at his honorary award and eventual induction into the Rotary Club family recently in Port Harcourt. China harped on the two strategies as the most impactful forms of donations. He told newsmen that strategic donating is what will help people out of poverty, stressing that ineffective philanthropy will rather create highly dependent people who will always come back for help. China stated that the preliminary philanthropy he was doing was not the effective type, saying; “Charity is an ineffective philanthropy because if you give a man fish, he will come back tomorrow for another fish and you can’t feed him all your life. “So, charity of donation is actually charity of backing people (carrying people on your back). And the philosophy says you can’t back more than two people, but you can help a limitless number of people. So effective charity which I will start doing when I have more time will be real charity which is to make the person you are helping to be independent of your help subsequently. “So, the two things I believe that will cause real charity are education and psychological development”, he stated, adding how it will make people develop grit – the emotional intelligence and psychological development. He observed that following experts recent...

title: How to respond during an active shooter situation: ‘run, hide, fight’
creator: Brian Rokos
content: On the anniversary of the Cook's Corner mass shooting, O.C. officials detail what they train civilians to do to save lives.

title: How to respond during an active shooter situation: ‘run, hide, fight’
content: When John Snowling opened fire inside Cook’s Corner in Trabuco Canyon on Aug. 23 one year ago, many customers of the bar and restaurant instinctively employed what safety experts say are two of the three tenets of surviving a shooting — run, hide, fight — by sprinting for the exits or taking cover behind furniture. Most did so safely, but three people were killed and six others, including Snowling’s estranged wife and initial target, were injured. Orange County sheriff’s deputies put an end to the siege when they killed Snowling in a gun battle. Since the attack, the Sheriff’s Department has conducted 95 active-shooter trainings for 6,056 people, said Sgt. Brian Gunsolley, who helps conduct those classes. That’s about double the number of sessions from the previous year. More than two-thirds of those requests resulted from a state law that became effective in July that requires employers with 10 or more workers to provide workplace violence prevention training. The County of Orange Social Services Agency, Soka University, Walmart, Panasonic and numerous cities have requested the training. “The best thing would be to gain distance from the threat and put objects between you and the threat,” Gunsolley said. There are additional important actions beyond the basic three that he incorporates into lessons — prevent and prepare — that can help someone stop or survive a similar attack. Gunsolley said most workplace attacks are perpetrated by employees. Trainees learn the signs and...

title: Brush fire breaks out in Newhall
content: A brush fire broke out in Newhall shortly before 6 p.m. on Tuesday near the intersection of Newhall Avenue and Needham Ranch Parkway, according to first responder radio dispatch traffic. The fire was at 1 acre just after 6 p.m., according to radio traffic. A Fire Department spokesperson said he was unable to provide information on the incident when reached by phone at that time. However, radio traffic indicated that there was “light to medium fuel,” though no structures were deemed to be threatened as of this story’s publication. One helicopter was attached to the incident as of 6 p.m. on Tuesday, according to radio traffic. This is a breaking news story and will be updated as more information becomes available.

title: Alicia Silverstone is ‘alive and well’ after appearing to eat harmful plant
content: The US actress had shared a video of herself on Instagram biting into what appeared to be a small orange fruit, which looked similar to a cherry tomato. Silverstone did not identify the plant, but social media users began to speculate that the fruit was solanum pseudocapsicum, commonly known as the Jerusalem cherry, which is “harmful if eaten” according to the Royal Horticultural Society. “Alive and well! Don’t worry... I didn’t swallow,” the actress said on Instagram. The 47-year-old had previously uploaded a video saying: “Okay, I’ve discovered something that I can’t figure out what it is, and I need your help. “I just bit into it because I was on the street and we were discussing whether this was a tomato or not. “It’s definitely not, because look at these leaves.” She then showed the leaves before asking “what the heck is it?”. The actress then bit into the plant again and showed the inside with seeds, bigger than those you would see inside a tomato of its size. “I don’t think you’re supposed to eat this, it’s almost like a pepper”, she said. In the Horticultural Trades Association’s 2022 guide to potentially harmful plants, the Jerusalem cherry is listed as being harmful if eaten to both humans and pets. Silverstone is most known for playing Cher in 1999 film Clueless and also appeared in Batman And Robin (1997) and Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed (2004).

title: La idea de subir el 4 por mil al 5 por mil fue del Gobierno Petro: esta metadata es la prueba reina que delata al Ministerio de Hacienda
content: Este martes se desató una tormenta en el país por la posibilidad de que se aumentara el famoso gravamen del 4 por mil al 5 por mil a las transacciones financieras. Aunque el Ministerio de Hacienda salió a negar que el Gobierno Petro esté pensando en esa propuesta, SEMANA conoció un documento que prueba que, efectivamente, la idea surgió de dicho ministerio. En concreto, el borrador fue elaborado por Nicolás García Díaz, asesor del Ministerio de Hacienda. Esta es la metadata del documento que evidencia que el autor fue García Díaz, quien está vinculado a MinHacienda como asesor. En la mañana de este martes, el Ministerio de Hacienda divulgó un comunicado en el que señaló que no se estaba contemplando una reforma en ese sentido. “A la fecha, no existe un documento oficial que desarrolle los puntos que se presentarán ante el Congreso de la República con la Ley de Financiamiento. Por tanto, cualquier información que circule en medios de comunicación y en redes sociales no es veraz ”, sostuvo la entidad. Sin embargo, tal como se evidencia en el documento conocido por SEMANA, en el Ministerio de Hacienda sí se estaba barajando esa posibilidad. La entidad dijo en el comunicado: “El Proyecto de Ley de Financiamiento no propondrá ajustes en el Gravamen a los Movimientos Financieros (4x1.000). El Presupuesto General de la Nación de 2025 incluye un recurso contingente por $ 12 billones (0,7 % del PIB) que se viabilizará a través de un proyecto de Ley de...

title: 2 teens charged, 1 suspect at large in Toronto carjacking
creator: Alex Arsenych
content: Toronto police have charged two teenagers in connection with a carjacking, and are still searching for a third suspect. Between Aug. 14 and Aug. 15, police said three suspects broke into a home in the area of Dufferin Street and Glencairn Avenue and stole a car in the area of Yonge Street and Drewry Avenue. On Aug. 14, police allege two suspects approached the home while a third suspect waited in a vehicle nearby. They said the suspects allegedly kicked in the door, got inside the home and looked for car keys, but when they couldn’t find those quickly, they took off. The following day, police said two people were walking to their vehicle in a parking lot when they were confronted by two suspects, with one allegedly wielding a knife. Officers say the two suspects “forced” the victims to handover the keys to their vehicle before driving away. On Aug. 16, officers with the Toronto Police Service Hold Up Squad found the vehicle and arrested one of the suspects. Police searched the vehicle and found clothing that was allegedly worn during the robberies. Police charged 19-year-old Mohit Paul, of Toronto, with robbery with an offensive weapon, break and enter, and two counts of disguise with intent. After further investigation, police identified a second suspect and after a search on Aug. 17., they seized a knife and clothes allegedly used during the robberies. Officers arrested a 17-year-old, who is facing the same charges as Paul. His identity is protected under the provisions of...

title: Most of T&T saving money
creator: Vishanna Phagoo
content: New research has found that most of the population is saving money. However, the majority of people surveyed are using the unsafe option of saving money at home and not in financial institutions. While much of Trinidad and Tobago is embracing advancements in financial technology, a survey by the European Union and the United Nations Capital Development Fund finds there is still a strong preference for cash savings among citizens. The survey was conducted among 2,000 nationals over 15 years of age in which geographic coverage, diversity in income levels, financial backgrounds, age, gender, ethnicity and demographic diversity among municipalities were prioritised. Minister of Finance Colm Imbert said yesterday, “the research tells us that 75% of our population save to some extent, which means that in the world context, Trinidad and Tobago is a high savings economy. However, an astonishing 82% of this group choose to save their money at home, which is neither safe nor productive.” He was speaking at the official launch of the National Financial Inclusion Survey Report (2023) at Tower D, International Waterfront Centre in Port of Spain. He said: “Delving deeper into the numbers, what we know now from the survey findings is that the state of financial inclusion in T&T is complex and constantly changing. Financial exclusion is rising, with 25% of households lacking access to formal financial accounts due to barriers such as documentation and high costs.” Within that 25%, Imbert...

title: E-bike battery causes fire at Auburn hotel, displacing two
creator: Kelly Rocheleau kelly.rocheleau@lee.net
content: The failure of an electric bike battery caused a fire at an Auburn hotel that displaced two people last week, according to the Auburn Fire Department. The department received a call about a fire at about 5:50 p.m. Thursday at The Cayuga Inn at the Finger Lakes at 37 William St., Assistant Fire Chief Jeff Clark told The Citizen. The fire was under control within about 10 minutes of the department's arrival. It was contained to one room on the second floor of the hotel, though Clark said the room was significantly damaged. Assistant Fire Chief Ed Sherman told The Citizen an investigation determined the fire was caused by the failure of a lithium-ion battery for an electric bike in the room. Along with the fire, the battery failure caused some small explosions. The battery was not charged nor in the bike at the time of the fire. Two people were displaced by the fire and assisted by the American Red Cross. Other guests were able to return to the hotel afterward. Sherman noted that lithium-ion battery fires have been rising in recent years as e-bikes have become more popular. In the interest of safety, he said, people should only use the battery and charging cord designed for a particular device, follow the manufacturer's instructions and only buy devices listed by a qualified testing laboratory. He also recommended that devices not be charged on a pillow, bed or couch, and that electric bikes be charged outside in a flat, dry area. He said he often sees e-bikes inside...

Scaloni, con el pulso del campeón
content: Lionel Scaloni no se casa con nadie . Es algo que demostró el entrenador desde que comenzó como interino y que a lo largo de estos seis años del ciclo sigue dejando señales a cada paso. Cuando algunos pensaban que estos partidos de las Eliminatorias podían servir como festejos del bicampeonato de América, el entrenador dejó en claro con la lista de convocados que no quiere que nadie se relaje , que lo que pasó en Miami se terminó en Miami. Y la lectura de los 28 convocados para enfrentar a Chile y Colombia es linea l: fueron llamados los de mejor presente . Los que tienen algún problema físico ( Lionel Messi y Palacios ), los que no pasan por su mejor momento en sus clubes o los que ya cumplieron su etapa en la Scaloneta ( Dybala , Ángel Correa o Armani ) no serán parte de esta nueva etapa que arranca el grupo, después de haber logrado lo vuelta olímpica en la despedida de la Selección Argentina del ídolo Ángel Di María . En la nómina de citados no están 10 de los 26 campeones del mundo. Tampoco hay seis de los 26 que dieron la vuelta hace poco más de un mes . Una marca distintiva de que el DT quiere seguir potenciando la competencia interna para que nadie se duerma en los laureles. Por eso, el primer llamado para dos que se destacaron en los Juegos Olímpicos ( Equi Fernández y Giuliano Simeone ), una nueva oportunidad para Leo Balerdi , que a los 25 años es el capitán del Olympique de Marsella, otra vez la chance para Valentín Barco y Matías...

Dollar hits lowest this year vs euro as traders brace for jobs data, Jackson Hole
content: TOKYO : The dollar slipped to its lowest this year versus the euro on Wednesday as traders braced for potentially crucial revisions to U.S. payrolls data later in the day, ahead of a speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell at the end of the week. The U.S. currency also dipped below the closely watched 145 yen level and hovered close to the more-than-one-year low to sterling reached overnight. Pressure notably came from U.S. bond yields, which hit their lowest since Aug. 5, when yields crashed to the a more-than-one-year trough after surprisingly soft monthly jobs figures sparked recession fear. "The reduced yield premium in the U.S. Treasury market has been a clear factor driving the USD lower," said Chris Weston, head of research at Pepperstone. "As we can see in so many USD pairs of late, the USD just can't find a friend in the market and is in free fall." A weak monthly payrolls report at the start of the month was a catalyst for a spike in volatility across asset classes, leaving market participants bracing for another potential shock with revised data due later Wednesday. The Aug. 2 payrolls report sent traders racing to price in prospects of the Fed needing to slash interest rates by a half percentage point at its mid-September policy meeting, pushing the implied probability of such a move to about 71 per cent, according to CME Group's FedWatch Tool. However, a run of better macroeconomic data has since seen the odds flip, with bets now 72 per cent for a...

title: Coparmex CDMX fortalece su compromiso con la inclusión en la Feria de Empleo LGBT+
creator: Redacción
content: En un paso significativo hacia la inclusión y diversidad en el ámbito laboral, la con elobjetivo de explorar convenios de colaboración que permitan a las empresas, tanto grandes como pequeñas y medianas (PYMES), La feria, organizada por Pride Connection México y diversas organizaciones, busca abrir nuevas oportunidades de empleo para sectores vulnerables, incluyendo a personas de la comunidad LGBTIQ+, adultos mayores y personas con capacidades diferentes. En representación de Coparmex CDMX asistieron Angélica Brito Miranda, vicepresidenta de Asociaciones y Organismos Empresariales; Fernando Arnabar Foubert, vicepresidente de Alcaldías, y Jorge de la Rosa, presidente de zona. Al hablar de la intención de los organizadores del evento, Angélica Brito explicó que “lo que ellos buscan es No solo se enfoca en la comunidad LGBTIQ+, sino también en otros sectores vulnerables. La Vicepresidenta subrayó la relevancia de abrirse a estas posibilidades, especialmente ahora con Adal Ortiz Ávalos, quien recientemente asumió la presidencia de Coparmex Ciudad de México con una visión más innovadora. “Estamos abriendo la posibilidad de colaboración con diferentes organismos y alcaldías, que son clave para nosotros,” afirmó Brito Miranda, destacando la importancia de estas alianzas para fomentar un entorno laboral más inclusivo y diverso. title: 本周 ETF 陸續掛牌上市 今天再添債券新兵
content: 投信募集 ETF 不放暑假,本周陸續有ETF新兵掛牌,繼中國信託投信的中信日本半導體(00954) 及中信日經高股息(00956)20日掛牌上市後,今天將有 群益 投信的群益優選非投等債ETF掛牌。 證交所表示,群益投信募集發行的「群益優選收益非投資等級債券 ETF 證券投資信託基金」 21 日正式掛牌上市,並得辦理融資融券。 根據送件資料顯示,群益優選非投等債ETF標的指數為「ICE 1-5 年 BB-B 級成熟市場信用優息美元非投資等級債券指數」,是由 ICE Data Indices, LLC 編製及維護,該指數主要投資於成熟市場國家的美元非投資等級公司債,篩選信用評級介於 BB+至 B-、剩餘到期日介於一至五年之間,及流通在外金額、票息、單一產業與單一發行人上限等條件,並透過信用與利差決定權重,指數規則將每月檢視是否新增或剔除成分債券,截至 7 月底,指數成分債券合計 256 檔。 證交所表示,加上群益優選非投等債ETF,集中市場掛牌上市 ETF 將達 166 檔。國內 ETF 商品種類日趨多元,追蹤標的涵蓋國內外各主要交易所證券、債券及大宗商品等,便利投資人資產配置選擇,惟各類金融商品投資均具有風險,投資前應審慎評估,建議投資人投資前應詳閱公開說明書。 ▪ 何世昌/銀行限貸令風暴 恐引發五大效應 ▪ 買房苦租房也苦!4縣市房東漲租逾1成、這裡以買代租 ▪ 降溫房市...央行祭不動產減降令 市場:斷掉資金供給 ▪ 最新青安統計7月再創次高紀錄 8月恐遭限貸令緊縮 ▪ 台中首購族「人道走廊」 這兩區還有1字頭預售屋

title: લોકો તોબા પોકારી ગયાં:વરસાદી પાણીમાં ધોવાઈ ગયેલા માર્ગો ઉપર ઉડતી ધૂળથી લોકો તોબા પોકારી ગયાં
content: જૂનાગઢ શહેરમાં વરસાદી પાણી પડવાથી મનપાના શાસકોએ કરોડો રૂપિયાના ખર્ચે બનાવેલા ડામરના રોડ તૂટીને ઠેર ઠેર ખાડા પડી ગાડા માર્ગ જેવા બની જતાં શહેરીજનો તેમજ અસંખ્ય પ્રવાસીઓને ભારે યાતના ભોગવી પડી છે. છેલ્લા બે-ત્રણ દિવસથી વરસાદે વિરામ લીધો છે પરંતુ શહેરના વેપારીઓ અને નાગરિકોના માથે વરસાદથી ધોવાઈને તૂટી ગયેલા રોડની ધૂળ મુસીબત બનીને યાતના આપી રહી છે. શહેરના સરદાર બાગથી મોતીબાગ, ગાંધી ચોકથી બસ સ્ટેન્ડ, કાળવા ચોકથી ચિત્તાખાના, તળેટી રોડથી ભવનાથ તરફ જવાના રોડ પર વેપારીઓને વેપાર ધંધો કરવો અને દ્વિચક્રી વાહન ચાલકોને પસાર થવું મુશ્કેલી ભર્યું બની ગયું છે. ધોવાઈ ગયેલા રોડ ઉપરથી પસાર થતા વાહનોને લઈને ઉડતી ધૂળ લોકોની આંખમાં અને શ્વાસમાં જવાના કારણે તેમના આરોગ્યને પણ ભારે નુકસાન કરી રહી હોવાની ફરિયાદો ઉઠી રહી છે.મનપા શાસકો અને માર્ગ નિર્માણ કરનાર ઠેકેદારની જુગલબંધીએ હૃદયમાં બદદાનતનો ભાવ રાખીને ગુણવત્તા વિહીન રોડ-રસ્તા બનાવ્યા હોવાના આક્ષેપો મનપામા બેઠેલા વિપક્ષના સભ્યો તેમજ શહેરીજનોમાંથી ઉઠતા રહ્યા છે.

title: ‘Emily in Paris,’ ‘The Union’ debut at No. 1 on Netflix; ‘Love Next Door,’ ‘Lolo and the Kid’ in top 10
creator: N/A (Jonathan Hicap)
content: Season 4 of “Emily in Paris” and the Halle Berry film “The Union” debuted at No. 1 on Netflix’s weekly Global Top 10 of the most watched shows and movies. Netflix announced that “Emily in Paris” season 4 grabbed the top spot on the English TV list with 19.9 million views from Aug. 12 to 18. It entered the top 10 in 93 countries and regions. Meanwhile, Berry and Mark Wahlberg’s “The Union” debuted at No. 1 on the English films list with 33.1 million to become the most watched title on Netflix for the chart period. "Emily in Paris" and "The Union" (Netflix) “The Union” is about high school sweethearts who reunite to fight an international crime syndicate. It is No. 1 in 63 countries and regions. On the non-English films list, the Korean movie “Mission: Cross” maintained its No. 1 spot for the second week with 8.9 million views. The Filipino film “Lolo and the Kid” rose to No. 2 with 8.1 million views from No. 4 last week. The film stars Euwenn Mikaell, Joel Torre and Juan Karlos Labajo. The cast also includes Iza Calzado, Meryll Soriano, Joem Bascon, Nico Antonio, Markki Stroem, Shaina Magdayao, and Alfred Vargas. On the non-English TV List, the Korean drama “Romance in the House” rose to No. 1 with 2.6 million views. It stars Ji Jin-Hee, Kim Ji-Soo, Son Na-Eun, Yoon Sanha and Minho. The Korean drama “Love Next Door,” starring Jung Hae-In and Jung So-Min, debuted at No. 5 with 1.1 million views. (Netflix) Here are Netflix’s top 10 shows and films for Aug. 12 to 18: (Netflix)

title: 서울 오피스텔 가격 22개월 만에 ‘보합’...월세는 7개월 연속 올라
Atedo’s Final Tribute To Mum
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: Atedo Peterside In this Final Tribute to my Mum (Ama as I called her), I can “confess” that I knew the end was near for my Mum since December 2023 and I told same immediately to my two sisters and to my wife. Of course, we all hoped that I was wrong, but my head and heart told me that I was right. My Mum was always very strong spiritually and she lived her life in accordance with the written word in the Bible. It was the physical frailty and her total acceptance of it that made me realise that the inevitable call was near. I decided therefore that I would visit my Mum in Port Harcourt every month going forward without fail – and so I saw her in January, in February and in March 2024. Each visit was like a last Supper. Indeed, the very last “Supper” we had together was on Friday, 08 March 2024, when I came visiting. In early April, I went to London and intended to come back home to visit her in mid-April. My phone failed to ring at 9am on Wednesday, 10 April 2024 and so I guessed my Mum had passed on. I waited until it rang just after 10am and it was my Mum’s Doctor on the line telling me what I “knew” already – that my Mum had passed on. My Mum was so reliable that I knew instinctively that, if she was not on the telephone at 9am, as promised, then it meant she had answered the call from her Maker. She was not one for tardiness or lateness. Since my Mum passed on, the only emotion that I have entertained has been one of immense gratitude to God for granting Mum’s 3 great...

The Issue in the Protests
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: Magnus Onyibe Five years ago, on October 11, when Nigeria celebrated its 59th anniversary, I wrote a piece titled “The Call for a National War on Poverty,” which was published in Thisday newspaper and several other traditional and online news platforms. The motivation for writing the article stemmed from the excessive focus on fighting corruption, which had created a hostile environment for foreign investors. This focus led to economic recessions between 2015-2023, with Nigeria plunging into recession twice in those eight years. Today, nearly five years after that article, Nigeria and its citizens continue to grapple with corruption and poverty. Instead of moving from poverty to prosperity, the standard of living has worsened, leading to the #EndBadGovernance protests by angry and hungry Nigerians, which regrettably resulted in significant unrest and destruction. The four days of protests before President Bola Tinubu’s national address wreaked havoc on the nation so much so that our beleaguered country and its struggling economy suffered further damage, with about 13 lives lost and properties worth billions of naira destroyed. The situation was so dire that the presumed convener of the protest, popular lawyer Olu Adegberuwa, reportedly expressed regret: “I appeal to the protesters to withdraw from their various protest grounds and suspend the protests immediately and indefinitely to give room for meaningful dialogue and engagement with the government.” In recognition of the...

title: 강풍과 폭우 끄떡없는 192개 살대의 3단 자동우산
Rishabh Pant : நெருப்புடா நெருங்குடா பாப்போம்... ரஜினியின் 'கபாலி' கெட்டப்பை ரீ கிரியேட் செய்த கிரிக்கெட் வீரர் ரிஷப் பண்ட்
creator: லாவண்யா யுவராஜ்
content: திரை பிரபலங்களை போலவே சர்வதேச அளவில் பிரபலமாக ஏராளமான ரசிகர்களை கொண்டவர்கள் கிரிக்கெட் வீரர்கள். இருப்பினும் இரு தரப்பினருக்கும் எதிர்தரப்பினர் மீது ஈர்ப்பு அதிகம். அந்த வகையில் கிரிக்கெட் வீரர்களின் பயோபிக் எடுப்பதில் நடிகர்கள் ஆர்வம் காட்டுவதும், நடிகர்களை போல ரீ கிரியேட் செய்வதும் வழக்கமான ஒன்று. அதிலும் குறிப்பாக கிரிக்கெட் வீரர்களுக்கு என்றுமே சூப்பர் ஸ்டார் ரஜினிகாந்த் மீது ஈர்ப்பு அதிகம். அவரை போலவே போஸ் கொடுக்கும் புகைப்படங்கள் எடுத்து அதை சோசியல் மீடியாவில் பகிர்ந்து லைக்ஸ்களை குவித்து விடுவார்கள். அந்த வகையில் இந்திய கிரிக்கெட் வீரர் எம்.எஸ்.தோனி, ரஜினிகாந்த் போல ஷோபாவில் அமர்ந்து இருக்கும் புகைப்படம் ஒன்றை ஷேர் செய்தது சோசியல் மீடியாவில் வைலானது. அதை தொடர்ந்து தற்போது கிரிக்கெட் வீரர் ரிஷப் பண்ட் தற்போது ரஜினிகாந்த் போல ரீ கிரியேட் செய்துள்ள புகைப்படம் ஒன்றை பகிர்ந்துள்ளார். 2016-ஆம் ஆண்டு பா. ரஞ்சித் இயக்கத்தில் வெளியான 'கபாலி' படம் பெரிய அளவில் வெற்றி பெறவில்லை என்றாலும் ரஜினிகாந்த் தோற்றம் மற்றும் ஸ்டைல் மிக பெரிய அளவில் வரவேற்பை பெற்றது. அப்படத்தில் நடிகர் ரஜினிகாந்த்தின் தெறிக்க விடும் லுக் ஒன்றை போல ரீ கிரியேட் செய்த புகைப்படத்தை தன்னுடைய சோசியல் மீடியா பக்கத்தில் பகிர்ந்து 'தலைவா' என கேப்ஷன் கொடுத்துள்ளார் கிரிக்கெட் வீரர் ரிஷப் பண்ட். தற்போது இந்த போஸ்ட் சோசியல் மீடியாவில் மிகவும் வைரலாக பகிரப்பட்டு வருகிறது Dho pharah👀🔥 #Rishabpant pic.twitter.com/2m3Em9DU4t — Tharun🐐 (@officialtharun_) August 20, 2024 தற்போது டெல்லி கிரிக்கெட் அசோசியேஷன் நடத்தி வரும் டி20 லீக் போட்டிகள் நடைபெற்று வருகின்றன. அந்த போட்டியில் புரணி டெல்லி அணி...

title: Próximo rival de América en el Apertura 2024| Jornada 5
content: El Club América fue el último equipo de la Liga BBVA MX que vio participación dentro de la Leagues Cup 2024 . Los dirigidos por el técnico brasileño, Andre Jardine , perdieron en la tanda de penales ante Colorado Rapids y con este resultado, los azulcremas se quedaron sin su boleto para las Semifinales del torneo. Te puede interesar: El GRAVE TEMOR del América con la lesión de Kevin Álvarez Así se concursa por la mejor baguette de Francia | Pasaporte Colosal con Toño Rosique El próximo sábado 24 de agosto, el América hará su reaparición en el Apertura 2024 cuando el equipo de Coapa reciba en la cancha del Estadio Ciudad de los Deportes al conjunto de Puebla ; el silbatazo inicial del partido está programado a las 21:05 horas, tiempo CDMX. Las Águilas están en la necesidad de mejorar su nivel futbolístico para meterse dentro de los primeros cuatro equipos, ya que actualmente se ubican en el décimo lugar al tener seis puntos de doce posibles. El estratega brasileño no podrá contar con plantel completo debido a que los futbolistas Alejandro Zendejas (ósea del peroné izquierdo), Kevin Álvarez , Javairo Dilrosun (muslo posterior derecho) y Rodrigo Aguirre (sobre carga muscular en la pantorrilla) son baja por lesión; es por eso que Jardine tendrá que en buscar opciones dentro de la plantilla para suplir estas duras bajas. Por su lado, Puebla también presenta un sensible baja luego de que su delantero estrella, Lucas Cavallini , sufriera una dura...

title: ભાસ્કર એક્સકલુઝિવ:સૌરાષ્ટ્રની જમીનમાં પાકને ઉપયોગી તત્વોનું પ્રમાણ પૂરતું જમીનને નુકસાન કરતી ભારે ધાતુનું પ્રમાણ ઓછુ મળ્યું
content: સારા પ્રમાણમાં ઉત્પાદન મેળવવા માટે જમીનમાં સુક્ષ્મતત્વો પૂરતા પ્રમાણમાં હોવા જરૂરી છે. સુક્ષ્મતત્વોએ છોડની વૃધ્ધી માટે ખૂબજ જરૂરી હોય છે. એવા સુક્ષ્મતત્વોની સૌરાષ્ટ્રની જમીનમાં કેટલુ પ્રમાણ છે તેનો અભ્યાસ જૂનાગઢ કૃષિ યુનિવર્સિટીના જમીન અને કૃષિ રસાયણ આ જિલ્લા અને તાલુકામાંથી નમુના લીધા ક્રમ જિલ્લા તાલુકા 1 જૂનાગઢ જૂનાગઢ, ભેંસાણ, કેશોદ, માળીયા, માણાવદર, માંગરોળ, વંથલી, વિસાવદર 2 ગીર સોમનાથ ગીર- ગઢડા, કોડીનાર, સુત્રાપાડા, તાલાલા, ઉના, વેરાવળ 3 અમરેલી બગસરા, જાફરાબાદ, રાજુલા, ધારી,બાબરા, ખાભા, લાઠી, સાવરકુંડલા 4 પોરબંદર પોરબંદર, કુતિયાણા, રાણાવાવ 5 ભાવનગર ઘોઘા, મહુવા, તળાજા, જેસર, સિહોર, ઉમરેલા, ગારીયાધર 6 રાજકોટ ધોરાજી, ઉપલેટા, જેતપુર, રાજકોટ, લોધીકા, જામકંડોળા,ગોડલ, જસદણ, વીંછીયા, કોટડાસાંગાણી 7 મોરબી મોરબી, ટંકારા, વાંકાનેર, હાલવડ 8 દેવભૂમી દ્વારકા દ્વારકા, ભાણવડ, જામ ખંભાળીયા 9 જામનગર જામનગર, જામજોધપુર, લાલપુર, કાલાવડ 10 સુરેન્દ્રનગર સુરેન્દ્રનગર, ચુડા, ચોટીલા, લીબડી, મુલી, પાટડી, થાનગઢ અભ્યાસ કરેલ તત્વો જમીનમાં કઇ રીતે ઉપયોગી કૃષિ યુનિવર્સિટીના બે પ્રોફેસરો દ્વારા અભ્યાસ કરેલ 4 સૂક્ષ્મપોષક તત્વો જેવા કે આયર્ન, મેંગેનીઝ, ઝીંક અને કોપર જમીનમાં કઇ રીતે ઉપયોગી છે તે નીચે મુજબ છે. { આર્યન : હરીતકણના ઉત્પાદનમાં, પાકના પ્રકાશસંશ્લેષણની ક્રિયા માટે જમીનમાં જરૂરી છે. { કોપર : પાકના શ્વસનની પ્રક્રિયાનુ નિયમન અને પ્રોટીનનુ બંધારણ તથા ઉત્સેચકોને સક્રિય કરે છે. { ઝીંક : છોડના ફલીનીકરણની પ્રક્રિયા અને અંતસ્ત્રાવો અને કોષરસના બંધારણ માટે જરૂરી છે. { મેગેનીઝ : નાઇટ્રોજનના ચયાપચયની ક્રિયામાં અને હરીતકણના બંધારણ માટે ઉપયોગી છે.

title: From 1999 to 2024, protests still Nigerians’ only resort to unfavourable govt policies
creator: Temilade Ayodele
content: In a nation where the voices of the marginalised are often silenced, Nigerians have consistently found solace in the power of protest. From the streets of Abuja to the cities of Lagos and Kano, the people have risen, demanding an end to the economic hardship and social injustice that has plagued their country for decades. The latest wave of protests tagged: “End Bad Governance in Nigeria,” is a testament to the unrelenting spirit of a people who refuse to be silenced. On August 1, 2024, thousands took to the streets, calling for an end to fuel subsidy removal and a reduction of fuel prices, as well as restoration of affordable electricity tariffs. The protests, which were marked by violence in some states, are a culmination of years of frustration with a government that seems disconnected from the needs of its people. Since the country returned to civilian rule in 1999, there have been many protests across Nigeria. The 2012 Occupy Nigeria protests, which lasted for 13 days, were a response to the removal of fuel subsidies and eventual price hikes by the Goodluck Jonathan government. Although the protest was met with violence, resulting in some deaths, it led to the reinstatement of the subsidy and a review of the Federal Government’s spending. In 2020, the #EndSARS protests brought international attention to the country, as Nigerians demanded an end to police brutality and the disbandment of the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS). Although the government initially responded...

title: Prevén protestas fuera de consulado de Israel en Chicago en el segundo día de la Convención Nacional Demócrata
creator: The Associated Press
content: En el centro de la ciudad había más medidas de seguridad de lo habitual, incluidos agentes policiales con armas largas afuera del edificio en el que se encuentra el consulado israelí 21 de agosto de 2024 - 9:18 PM Chicago — Decenas de agentes de la Policía de Chicago montaron guardia a las afueras de un rascacielos que alberga al consulado de Israel y donde se tiene prevista una manifestación a favor de los palestinos el martes, durante la segunda jornada de la Convención Nacional Demócrata . La policía había cerrado la mayoría de los puntos de acceso al edificio, dejando libre una sola entrada que también estaba resguardada por agentes armados. Muchas de las tiendas ubicadas en el edificio estaban cerradas . Martha Hill, portavoz del servicio de trenes de pasajeros Metra, dijo que el servicio opera sin afectaciones. Entre tanto, los lugares en donde se llevaron a cabo manifestaciones la noche previa se mantuvieron en calma. Trece personas fueron detenidas durante las protestas del lunes, la mayoría de ellas con relación a una “breve irrupción” de una valla de seguridad a poca distancia del United Center , sede de la convención, informó el superintendente de la policía de Chicago . En el centro de la ciudad había más medidas de seguridad de lo habitual , incluidos agentes policiales con armas largas afuera del edificio en el que se encuentra el consulado israelí y en un importante centro de transporte. Se instalaron barricadas metálicas y un agente dijo...

title: Corbin Carroll homers as the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1
creator: Canadian Press
content: Corbin Carroll homers as the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1 MIAMI (AP) — Corbin Carroll and Lourdes Gurriel Jr. homered to help Eduardo Rodriguez and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1 on Tuesday night. Canadian Press Aug 20, 2024 6:17 PM Aug 20, 2024 6:20 PM Share by Email Share on Facebook Share on X Share on LinkedIn Print Share via Text Message Arizona Diamondbacks' Lourdes Gurriel Jr. (12) flips his bat after hitting a solo home run during the sixth inning of a baseball game against the Miami Marlins, Tuesday, Aug. 20, 2024, in Miami. (AP Photo/Lynne Sladky) MIAMI (AP) — Corbin Carroll and Lourdes Gurriel Jr. homered to help Eduardo Rodriguez and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1 on Tuesday night. Arizona, which finished with four hits, improved to a major league-best 30-13 since July 1. Carroll also singled and scored on Joc Pederson's base hit, and Geraldo Perdomo walked twice. Rodriguez allowed one run and six hits over 5 1/3 innings in his third start of the season since being activated from the injured list on Aug. 7. Rodriguez (2-0) struck out five and walked one. Ryan Thompson, A.J. Puk and Justin Martinez combined for 3 2/3 innings of one-hit ball after Rodriguez departed. Martinez worked a perfect ninth for his fourth save in five opportunities. The Marlins hit five doubles, but they went 1 for 9 with runners in scoring position. The Associated Press See a typo/mistake? Have a story/tip? This has been shared 0...

title: Tackling Out-of-School Crisis in South-West to Improve Educational Outcomes
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: Developing effective models to enhance retention, transition and completion in secondary education to mitigate the challenges of out-of-school children in the six South-West states in Nigeria was the focus at the just concluded two-day regional stakeholders’ meeting, organised by UNICEF, in partnership with the Oyo State Ministry of Education. Funmi Ogundare reports The challenges of out-of-school children are complex and have severe implications for the individuals affected and the country. These challenges include early or child marriage, early pregnancy, economic barriers, conflict and insecurity, socio-cultural norms, inadequate policies and practices, insufficient infrastructure, and school-related gender-based violence, among others. Statistics from a 2021 Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey conducted by the Nigeria Bureau of Statistics (NBS) and presented by UNICEF reveal that nearly eight per cent of school-age children in six South-West states—Oyo, Ondo, Ekiti, Osun, Lagos, and Ogun—are out of school. Additionally, eight to 15 per cent of adolescents aged 10 to 18 are not completing their education, which has led to problems in retention, transition, and completion rates. Specifically, 31.5 per cent of children aged five to 17 are involved in child labour, and 24.9 per cent of lower secondary and 34.3 per cent of upper secondary school-age children are not attending school. In response to these issues, in collaboration with the Oyo State Ministry of Education, UNICEF...

title: Peso Pluma se vuelve víctima de la IA con video en donde habla de Anitta
creator: Miguel Ángel Escudero
content: El cantante mexicano Peso Pluma se convirtió en una nueva “víctima” de la Inteligencia Artificial luego de que se difundiera un video falso en donde habla sobre Anitta y su supuesta “relación”, la cual, mencionó, podría “ir más allá de una amistad”. En dicho material, viralizado en redes sociales en días pasados, se puede apreciar a Peso Pluma , vestido con las típicas prendas con las que se le suele ver pero con el antiguo corte de pelo que lo catapultó a la fama en años anteriores, en lo que parece un set de televisión o cine. Sin embargo, lo verdaderamente llamativo del material fue ver y escuchar a Peso Pluma revelar que, tras su ruptura con Nicki Nicole , recibió el apoyo de una sola persona. Cuando rompí con Nicki Nicole solo hubo una persona que me pudo ayudar y esa persona fue Anitta. Creo que ella y yo tenemos una química increíble que va más allá de la amistad”. title: US Private Military Company Operating in Kursk Was in Ukraine Conflict Zone for 2 Years
content: The group attracted media attention after it shared photos of its team members taking part in Ukraine's military incursion into Russia's Kursk Region last week. The group's official account on Instagram (owned by Meta, banned in Russia for extremism) shared a controversial photo showing three members of the group posing in front of a military vehicle, with the caption saying "The boys in Kursk" and the post’s geolocation tagged as "Kursk, Russia." On Tuesday, the Russian Foreign Ministry summoned US Charge d'Affaires Stephanie Holmes to lodge a protest in connection with the actions of US mercenaries in the Kursk Region. The Forward Observations Group, a US-based private mercenary firm, posts a picture tagged "The Boys of Kursk" on August 16, 2024. Published under fair use. © An Instagram account believed to belong to the group's founder, former US infantry soldier Derrick Bales, showed that FOG had been operating in the conflict zone in Ukraine for over two years. Bales uses "Raoul Duke" as a pseudonym for his personal account, under the handle "raoulduke_69," on Instagram. Public pictures of Bales show the same tattoos on both of his arms as the person appearing under the "raoulduke_69" account. Raoul Duke was the pseudonym Hunter S. Thompson used for his seminal gonzo journalism novel Bales' first post related to FOG’s activities in Ukraine dated back to as early as February 26, 2022, two days after Russia's special military operation began. In his post, Bales shared a...

title: Pune News : कैदी क्रमांक 1056 फरार; सुसंस्कृत पुण्यात चाललंय काय? खुनाच्या गुन्ह्यातील आरोपीचे येरवडा कारागृहातून पलायन
creator: नामदेव जगताप
content: Pune News : पुणे : सुसंस्कृत पुण्यात नेमकं चाललंय काय? असा प्रश्न गेल्या काही दिवसांतील घडामोडी पाहून आपल्यापैकी प्रत्येकालाच पडेल. ससून ड्रग्ज प्रकरण, पुणे पोर्शे अपघात प्रकरण आणि यासोबतच इतरही काही प्रकरणांनी विद्येचं माहेरघर असलेलं पुणं पुरतं हादरून गेलं. अशातच आता एक धक्कादायक बातमी समोर येत आहे. एका खुनाच्या गुन्ह्यातील आरोपीनं येरवडा कारागृहातून पलायन केल्याची माहिती मिळत आहे. खुनाच्या गुन्ह्यात येरवडा कारागृहात जन्मठेपेची शिक्षा भोगत असलेल्या एका कैद्यानं पलायन केल्याचा प्रकार 19 ऑगस्ट रोजी उघडकीस आला आहे. त्यामुळे नेमकं चाललंय काय? हा प्रश्न पुन्हा एकदा प्रत्येकाच्या मनात पाहायला मिळतोय. पुण्यातील (Pune News) येरवडा कारागृहात (Yerawada Jail) जन्मठेपेची शिक्षा (Life Sentence) भोगत असलेल्या एका कैद्यानं पलायन केल्याचा केल्याचा धक्कादायक प्रकार घडला आहे. 19 ऑगस्ट रोजी हा प्रकार उघडकीस आला. राजू पंढरीनाथ दुसाने (वय 43) असं पळून गेलेल्या कैद्याचं नाव असून हा कैदी मुळचा छत्रपती संभाजीनगर चा असून वैजापूरच्या महालगावचा आहे. तुरुंग पोलीस शिपाई अविनाश पवार यांनी याप्रकरणी तक्रार दिली आहे. त्यानुसार येरवडा पोलीस ठाण्यात गुन्हा दाखल करण्यात आला आहे. पोलिसांनी याप्रकरणाबाबत दिलेल्या माहितीनुसार, आरोपी राजू पंढरीनाथ दुसाने याला 2015 साली वारजे माळवाडी परिसरात झालेल्या एका खून प्रकरणात अटक करण्यात आली होती. या खून प्रकरणात त्याला फेब्रुवारी 2021 मध्ये अतिरिक्त सत्र न्यायालयानं जन्मठेपेची शिक्षा सुनावली होती. तेव्हापासून तो येरवडा कारागृहात होता. 2019 ऑगस्ट रोजी सायंकाळी नेहमीप्रमाणे येरवडा कारागृहातील कैद्यांची गिनती सुरू होती. यावेळी राजू दुसाने हा सापडला नाही. त्यानंतर संपूर्ण...

title: Bharat Bandh: ਕੀ ਅੱਜ ਸੱਚੀ ਬੰਦ ਹੈ ਭਾਰਤ ? ਸੋਸ਼ਲ ਮੀਡੀਆ 'ਤੇ ਵਾਇਰਲ ਹੋ ਰਹੇ ਮੈਸਜ ਦੀ ਕੀ ਹੈ ਅਸਲ ਕਹਾਣੀ
creator: ABP Sanjha
content: Bharat Bandh Update: ਐਸਸੀ-ਐਸਟੀ ਰਿਜ਼ਰਵੇਸ਼ਨ ਬਾਰੇ ਦੇਸ਼ ਦੀ ਸੁਪਰੀਮ ਕੋਰਟ ਦੇ ਫੈਸਲੇ ਦੇ ਵਿਰੋਧ ਵਿੱਚ 21 ਅਗਸਤ (ਬੁੱਧਵਾਰ) ਨੂੰ ਪੂਰਨ ਭਾਰਤ ਬੰਦ ਦਾ ਸੱਦਾ ਦੇਣ ਵਾਲੀ ਇੱਕ ਐਡਵਾਈਜ਼ਰੀ ਅਤੇ ਸੰਦੇਸ਼ ਸੋਸ਼ਲ ਮੀਡੀਆ 'ਤੇ ਵਾਇਰਲ ਹੋ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ। ਇਸ ਸਬੰਧੀ ਪੰਜਾਬ ਦੇ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਵਿੱਚ ਭੰਬਲਭੂਸਾ ਬਣਿਆ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ। ਪੰਜਾਬ ਦੇ ਕਪੂਰਥਲਾ 'ਚ ਵੀ ਮੰਗਲਵਾਰ ਨੂੰ ਪੁਲਸ ਅਧਿਕਾਰੀਆਂ ਨੇ ਇਸੇ ਮੁੱਦੇ ਨੂੰ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਸਬੰਧਤ ਭਾਈਚਾਰੇ ਦੇ ਆਗੂਆਂ ਨਾਲ ਮੀਟਿੰਗ ਕੀਤੀ। ਸਮਾਜ ਦੇ ਆਗੂ ਅਤੇ ਕਮਲੇਸ਼ਵਰ ਵਾਲਮੀਕਿ ਐਜੂਕੇਸ਼ਨਲ ਟਰੱਸਟ ਦੇ ਜ਼ਿਲ੍ਹਾ ਪ੍ਰਧਾਨ ਚਰਨਜੀਤ ਹੰਸ ਨੇ ਕਿਹਾ ਕਿ ਭਾਰਤ ਬੰਦ ਦੇ ਸੱਦੇ ਨਾਲ ਇਸ ਫੈਸਲੇ ਦੇ ਵਿਰੋਧ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਪੂਰਥਲਾ ਸ਼ਹਿਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਬੰਦ ਨਹੀਂ ਹੋਵੇਗਾ। ਇਸ ਸਬੰਧੀ ਜਥੇਬੰਦੀ ਦੇ ਆਗੂਆਂ ਨੇ 13 ਅਗਸਤ ਨੂੰ ਕਪੂਰਥਲਾ ਦੇ ਡਿਪਟੀ ਕਮਿਸ਼ਨਰ ਨੂੰ ਮੁੱਖ ਮੰਤਰੀ ਮਾਨ ਦੇ ਨਾਂ ਮੰਗ ਪੱਤਰ ਦਿੱਤਾ ਸੀ। ਇਸੇ ਤਰ੍ਹਾਂ ਜਲੰਧਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਵੀ ਵਪਾਰ ਮੰਡਲ ਨੇ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ ਦੁਕਾਨਾ ਖੋਲ੍ਹਣ ਦਾ ਫੈਸਲਾ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੈ। ਇਹਨਾਂ ਦੋ ਜ਼ਿਲ੍ਹਿਆਂ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਦਲਿਤ ਭਾਈਚਾਰੇ ਦੀ ਵਸੋ ਹੈ। ਇਸ ਲਈ ਇਹ ਦੋ ਜਿਲ੍ਹੇ ਪੂਰੀ ਤਰ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੇ ਨਾਲ ਖੁੱਲ੍ਹੇ ਹਨ। ਦੂਜੇ ਪਾਸੇ ਮੀਟਿੰਗ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਐਸਪੀ ਮਨਜੀਤ ਸਿੰਘ ਨੇ ਕਿਹਾ ਕਿ ਕੱਲ੍ਹ ਸਾਰੇ ਬਾਜ਼ਾਰ ਖੁੱਲ੍ਹੇ ਰਹਿਣਗੇ ਅਤੇ ਮਾਹੌਲ ਸ਼ਾਂਤਮਈ ਰਹੇਗਾ। ਇਸ ਦੌਰਾਨ ਦਲਿਤ ਸੰਗਠਨ ਦੇ ਆਗੂ ਜਿਆਲਾਲ ਨਾਹਰ ਨੇ ਕਿਹਾ ਕਿ ਉਹ ਇਸ ਭਾਰਤ ਬੰਦ ਦਾ ਸਮਰਥਨ ਨਹੀਂ ਕਰਨਗੇ। ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਸ਼ਹਿਰ ਦੇ ਦੁਕਾਨਦਾਰਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਅਪੀਲ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਉਹ ਆਪਣੀਆਂ ਦੁਕਾਨਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਅਦਾਰੇ ਆਮ ਵਾਂਗ ਖੋਲ੍ਹਣ। ਤੁਹਾਨੂੰ ਦੱਸ ਦੇਈਏ ਕਿ ਸੋਸ਼ਲ ਮੀਡੀਆ 'ਤੇ ਵਾਇਰਲ ਹੋ ਰਹੇ ਇੱਕ ਸੰਦੇਸ਼ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਹਾ ਜਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ ਕਿ ST-SC ਰਿਜ਼ਰਵੇਸ਼ਨ 'ਤੇ ਮਾਨਯੋਗ ਸੁਪਰੀਮ ਕੋਰਟ ਦੇ ਫੈਸਲੇ ਦੇ ਵਿਰੋਧ 'ਚ 21 ਅਗਸਤ ਨੂੰ ਪੂਰਾ ਭਾਰਤ ਬੰਦ ਰੱਖਿਆ ਜਾਵੇਗਾ। ਇਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਆਮ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਲਈ ਇੱਕ ਐਡਵਾਈਜ਼ਰੀ ਵੀ ਜਾਰੀ ਕੀਤੀ ਗਈ ਹੈ। ਇਸ ਭਾਰਤ ਬੰਦ ਦੇ ਸੰਦੇਸ਼ ਨੂੰ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਸਬੰਧਤ ਭਾਈਚਾਰੇ ਦੇ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਦੇ ਨਾਲ-ਨਾਲ ਆਮ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਵਿੱਚ ਵੀ ਭੰਬਲਭੂਸੇ ਦੀ ਸਥਿਤੀ ਬਣੀ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ। ਦੂਜੇ ਪਾਸੇ ਵਾਇਰਲ...

title: 김태리에 '옷소매' PD까지..최고 기대작 '정년이'가 핫한 이유
태풍이 몰고 온 ‘눅눅한 여름’...침수식품이 위험한 이유
content: 하천 범람으로 분뇨·퇴비 등 유출될 경우 지하수·채소 등 오염 강한 비 동반한 태풍으로 온도·습도 오르면 식중독 발생 위험 c뉴시스 폭염에 이어 태풍 종다리로 강한 비가 내리면서 상한 음식물로 식중독 발생 위험이 높아질 수 있어 주의가 필요하다. 특히 태풍 기간 동안 하천 등이 범람해 가축의 분뇨, 퇴비 등이 유출될 경우 지하수나 채소를 오염시켜 식중독이 발생할 수 있다. 21일 식중독 예측지도에 따르면 이날 전국 식중독은 주의단계다. 식약처는 “주의단계는 식중독 발생가능성이 중간 단계로 식중독 예방에 주의가 요망된다”라고 설명했다. 식중독 예측지도는 식약처를 비롯해 기상청, 국립환경과학원, 국민건강보험공단이 함께 개발한 것으로 관심, 주의, 경고, 위험 등 총 4단계로 구분한다. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1706856360384-0'); }); 여름철에 이번과 같이 태풍까지 겹치면 온도와 습도가 높아 식중독균이 증식하기 좋은 환경이 되고 원재료는 오염되기 쉬우므로 익히지 않고 섭취하는 채소류는 더욱 주의해야 한다. 특히 장마철 식중독 예방 요령으로 먼저 침수되었거나 침수가 의심되는 식품은 폐기해야 한다. 샐러드와 생채 무침 등 가열 조리하지 않는 채소는 염소 소독액(100ppm)에서 5분 이상 담근 후 3회 이상 수돗물로 충분히 헹군 다음 조리한다. 또한 조리한 채소는 바로 먹는데, 그렇지 못한 경우에는 냉장 보관해야 한다. 수박, 참외, 복숭아 등 과일은 과일·채소용...

title: Benue SUBEB Revives Early Childhood Education in Public Primary Schools
creator: George Okoh
content: George Okoh in Makurdi The Executive Chairman of Benue State Universal Basic Education Board (SUBEB), Dr. Grace Adagba, has called on education secretaries and Early Childhood Care Development Education (ECCDE) desk officers from the 23 Local Government Education Authorities to rejuvenate early childhood education programmes in all public primary schools across the state. During a meeting at the board recently, Adagba emphasised the importance of ECCDE in laying a solid foundation for future learning and underscored the need for improved educational opportunities for Benue children. She urged the education secretaries to actively publicise the board’s innovative efforts to establish ECCDE centres in all public schools. Highlighting a recent directive from the Universal Basic Education Commission (UBEC), Adagba mandated the establishment of ECCDE centres in all public schools. She also directed that headteachers begin admitting children aged two to five into ECCDE classes starting from the next academic session. To ensure the successful implementation of these directives, Adagba charged the education secretaries to convene emergency meetings with headteachers to sensitise them to the importance of ECCDE. She directed teachers to work during holidays to facilitate enrollment, admissions, and lesson plan preparations before the commencement of the new academic session. She also urged the education secretaries to launch campaigns to promote public schools, highlighting the high...

title: Delhi hospitals get bomb threat emails
creator: Purna Singh
content: New Delhi: Several hospitals, including AIIMS and Safdurjung, and a mall in Delhi on Tuesday received bomb threat emails, prompting authorities to launch searches on their premises, officials said. A call was received at 1.04 pm from a hospital in Nangloi and another from Primus Hospital at 1.07 pm in central Delhi's ChanakyaPuri informing that they had received bomb threats, a Delhi Fire Services (DFS) official said. Fire tenders, bomb detection teams and police rushed to the spots. A thorough checking is being conducted, the official said. The mailing list mentioned around 50 government and private hospitals, including AIIMS, Safdarjung, Apollo, Moolchand, Max and Sir Ganga Ram hospitals, police said. "We have placed many explosives inside your building. They are placed in black backpacks. The bombs are set to go off in a few hours," the email, sent through Gmail at 12.04 pm, stated. "You will end up in a pool of blood, none of you deserve to keep living. Everyone inside the building will lose their lives. I incessantly have nothing other than a scam for humanity. Today will be your last day on earth," it said. The email claimed that a "group named 'COURT' is behind this massacre". "We won't stop causing terror. Give out the group's name to News Outlets," it stated. A police officer said the pattern of these threat emails matches with those sent earlier to hospitals, schools, universities and other government buildings, where the sender did not mention the dateline in the...

title: He once poached the wild animals of Zimbabwe. Now he preaches against it
content: CHIREDZI, Zimbabwe (AP) — Tembanechako Mastick and a group of men scanned bushes near their village in southeast Zimbabwe, on the hunt for the den of hyenas that had recently attacked livestock. Scattered fragments of goat bones showed the way, and Mastick peeped cautiously into a deep hole in the earth. “They are probably gone from here, but not far because they see plenty of food in this area,” Mastick said. Some of his companions suggested sealing the hole, while others argued for trying to burn out any animals inside. In the past, Mastick, 47, might have been willing. He grew up hunting in his community's tradition, and though he grew crops and raised livestock in later years, turned to poaching when recurring droughts made farming less viable. But then he was caught late last year taking small game in the nearby Save Valley Conservancy, one of the largest private game reserves in Africa, and spent nearly three months in jail, where he said a program aimed at turning poachers into conservationists changed his outlook. At the hyena den, Mastick warned the others against killing animals, whether for meat or revenge. It's a message he's been giving since he was freed, urging his fellow villagers to rely on crops and livestock instead for food and income. “I began to realize that animals are for the benefit of the entire community, so poaching is a selfish act," Mastick said in an interview. “I can kill a zebra today and eat it or sell the meat, but I am the only one who...
