Kolkata Rape Case: कोलकाता में BJP का 5 दिनों का प्रदर्शन, रेप केस के विरोध में सड़क पर उतरेंगे सौरव गांगुली, पढ़ें लेटेस्ट अपडेट्स
creator: एबीपी लाइव डेस्क
content: Kolkata Rape-Murder Case: कोलकाता के आरजी कर मेडिकल कॉलेज एंड हॉस्पिटल में महिला डॉक्टर के साथ हुए रेप-मर्डर मामले पर देशभर के डॉक्टर्स प्रदर्शन कर रहे हैं. उनका कहना है कि जब तक पीड़िता को न्याय नहीं मिल जाता है और केंद्रीय सुरक्षा अधिनियम लागू नहीं हो जाता है, तब तक उनका प्रदर्शन जारी रहने वाला है. सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने भी कोलकाता रेप मामले पर सुनवाई की है और इस दौरान ममता सरकार को जमकर फटकार लगाई है. आइए इस मामले से जुड़े अपडेट्स जानते हैं. बीजेपी की पश्चिम बंगाल यूनिट आरजी कर मेडिकल कॉलेज एवं अस्पताल में महिला डॉक्टर के साथ कथित रेप और हत्या की घटना के खिलाफ आज से 5 दिन तक श्यामबाजार मेट्रो स्टेशन के पास धरना-प्रदर्शन करेगी. मंगलवार को कलकत्ता हाईकोर्ट ने प्रदर्शन की अनुमति दे दी. अदालत ने निर्देश दिया कि बुधवार से रविवार तक हर दिन दोपहर 12 बजे से रात 9 बजे तक प्रदर्शन में 300 से अधिक लोग नहीं होने चाहिए. यह स्थल आरजी कर हॉस्पिटल से करीब आधा किलोमीटर दूर है. बीसीसीआई के पूर्व अध्यक्ष व पूर्व क्रिकेटर सौरव गांगुली यानी दादा बुधवार (21 अगस्त) को कोलकाता की घटना के विरोध में और पीड़िता को न्याय दिलाने की मांग को लेकर सड़क पर उतरेंगे. आज दोपहर में कोलकाता मैदान में गोष्ठ पाल के प्रतिमा के नीचे पूर्व खिलाड़ी प्रदर्शन करेंगे. वहीं बुधवार शाम को सौरव की पत्नी डोना डांस स्कूल दीक्षा मंजुरी की ओर से जुलूस निकाला जाएगा. इंडियन मेडिकल एसोसिएशन ने कोलकाता रेप केस पर सुप्रीम कोर्ट के हस्तक्षेप का स्वागत किया है. आईएमए ने कहा कि वह रक्षा और सुरक्षा पर समिति के साथ काम करेगा. हेल्थकेयर प्रोफेशनल्स के साथ हिंसा के खिलाफ अध्यादेश लाकर केंद्रीय कानून लागू करने की मांग बरकरार है. आईएमए आज...

title: In India, PM Anwar hits out at international inaction over Gaza genocide; calls out hypocrisy
content: NEW DELHI, Aug 21 — Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has once again criticised the international community for inaction over the Gaza genocide, calling it sheer hypocrisy. He said there needs to be a clear message to put an end to this hypocrisy. “Some may talk about a genocide in Ukraine because of the bombing of some villages, but when 40,000 people are killed in Palestine, they treat it as an ‘impact of war’ and condoned it. “This is shocking and I call it sheer hypocrisy,” Anwar said during a question and answer session after he delivered the lecture titled “Towards a Rising Global South: Leveraging on Malaysia-India Ties” at the Indian Council of World Affairs (ICWA) think-tank in New Delhi. Earlier on Tuesday, the Prime Minister took to X to underscore that any meaningful progress toward peace must begin with the unconditional cessation of all military actions and acts of aggression against the Palestinian people by the Israelis. Anwar is on a three-day official visit to India from August 19. — Bernama

title: નોટિસ:જૂનાગઢ જિલ્લાના 22 શિક્ષકો 7 દિવસથી ફરજ પર નથી ગયા
content: જૂનાગઢ જિલ્લાના 22 શિક્ષકોનો પણ સમાવેશ થાય છે. 9 ઓગસ્ટ થી 16 ઓગસ્ટ સુધીનાં 7 દિવસથી ગેરહાજર શિક્ષકોને નોટિસ પાઠવવામાં આવી છે. જૂનાગઢ ડીપીઇઓ લતાબેન ઉપાધ્યાય જણાવ્યું હતું કે, જૂનાગઢ જિલ્લામાં 22 પ્રાથમિક શિક્ષકો 7 દિવસથી ગેરહાજર હોવાનું ધ્યાન ઉપર આવ્ય આ 22 શિક્ષકો સાત દિવસથી ગેરહાજર બાબરીયા વર્ષાબેન એલ., ગોવિંદભાઈ એમ. બામરોટીયા, ચુડાસમા જ્યોતિબેન રમેશભાઈ, મકવાણા મનીષકુમાર નારણભાઈ, દેવળીયા જીતેન્દ્ર સવજીભાઇ, પાસલીયા શહેનાઝબેન એચ., વાઢેર ભરતકુમાર અમરશીભાઈ, પરબત ડી. ખેર, ગિરીશ ડી. ધાંધલીયા, જયન્તકુમાર આર. પરમાર, દિપક એમ. નાથજી, જલ્પા જી. વનાર, રાજેશકુમાર કે. પરમાર, જયંતિ વી. પરમાર, ગોપાલભાઈ જી. લાડાણી, સુવા નરેન્દ્રભાઈ નાથાભાઈ, સંજયભાઈ એન. રૂપારેલ, તેરૈયા ધર્મિષ્ઠા સંજયગીરી એ. ગોસ્વામી, ત્રિવેણીબેન આર. રામ નો સમાવેશ થાય છે.

title: Ada BREN dan UNVR, Cermati 10 Saham Net Sell Terbesar Asing Kemarin
Nebraska Prep Football Classification Changes for the 2024/2025 Cycle
creator: 1000ydguy@gmail.com (Bobby Mills)
content: In the past month, several high school football fans have asked me about some of the high school football classification changes for the next 2 year cycle and frankly they are so numerous I just could not recall many of those changes. So, let’s list those changes for you and it sure seems as though there are an extraordinarily large number of schools changing classes this time around. In addition, there are always those few “shockers” that grab your attention when the NSAA releases those numbers. Falling into that “shocking" category (for me anyway) are. *Omaha Brownell-Talbot rising from Class D-1, 8-Man to Class C-1, 11-Man football. That is a HUGE jump. *David City High and Centennial dropping down from 11-Man to 8-Man football and Centennial’s boy enrollment number of 46 making them immediately eligible for the D-1 playoffs (Cutoff number is 47). *Equally as shocking is the fact that David City Aquinas (boy enrollment of 46), Fremont Bergan (45) and Hastings St. Cecilia (38) would ALL have been eligible to play 8-Man football this next 2-year cycle. Oakland-Craig (48) was just one boy away, and perennial powerhouse Norfolk Catholic (54) seven boys above the 8-Man cutoff of 47. Where has the time (or the boy numbers) gone? Here are all the changes for the 2024/2025 NSAA Football cycle *Classification Changes for Class A/11-Man Football UP from Class B to Class A, Omaha Westview *Classification Changes for Class B/11-Man Football Drops from Class A to Class B, Gretna High...

title: Ringgit rises as US$ index declines on Fed rate cut hopes
content: KUALA LUMPUR: The ringgit continued to strengthen against the US dollar, driven by a decline in the US Dollar Index (DXY), as investors anticipated potential rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, according to an analyst. At 8 am, the ringgit improved to 4.3755/3840 against the US dollar, up from 4.3780/3850 at Tuesday's close. Bank Muamalat Malaysia Bhd chief economist Dr Mohd Afzanizam Abdul Rashid said the DXY index fell to 101.441, its lowest in seven months, as major currencies gained strength against the greenback. "The two-year US Treasury yield, which is most sensitive to US central bank policy, dropped seven basis points to 3.99 per cent. "On that note, the ringgit is expected to be well supported today on account of the interest rate cut prospects in the US, which will result in narrower interest rate differentials between the Fed Funds Rate and the Overnight Policy Rate," he told Bernama. Mohd Afzanizam also identified RM4.30 as the immediate support level for the ringgit against the US dollar. Meanwhile, the ringgit traded lower against a basket of major currencies. It weakened against the Japanese yen to 3.0103/0164 from 2.9917/9967 at Tuesday's close, slipped vis-a-vis the euro to 4.8686/8781 from 4.8491/8568, and depreciated against the British pound to 5.7026/7137 from 5.6927/7018 previously. Additionally, the ringgit showed mixed performance against ASEAN currencies. It edged up slightly against the Indonesian rupiah to 283.4/284.1 from 283.5/284.2 yesterday, and...

title: Lee County softball mistake helps Houston County win 5-0
creator: By Joe Whitfield Sports Editor
content: LEESBURG—A costly first-inning error doomed the Lee County Lady Trojans in their first region contest of the season, resulting in a 5-1 loss to Houston County on Tuesday afternoon. With two outs in the top of the first inning, the Bears loaded the bases and capitalized on a single, driving in two runs. It seemed as though Lee County pitcher Christina Benton had struck out the next batter to end the inning, and the Lady Trojans began heading toward the dugout. title: SC raps Mamata govt over doc's rape-murder
creator: The Hans India
content: New Delhi: Amid spiralling nation-wide protests over the rape and murder of a trainee doctor at Kolkata’s RG Kar Medical College and Hospital, the Supreme Court on Tuesday constituted a 14-member National Task Force (NTF) to formulate a protocol for ensuring the safety and security of doctors and other health care professionals. Terming the incident as “horrific”, the apex court excoriated the state government over the delay in filing the FIR and allowing thousands of miscreants to vandalise the state-run facility. It also asked the West Bengal government to not unleash the “power of the State” on peaceful protesters and to deal with them with “great sensitivity in this moment of national catharsis”. The 10-member task force headed by Vice Admiral Arti Sarin has been asked to submit its interim report within three weeks. The Supreme Court, which directed the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) to submit a status report on the progress made in its investigation into the killing, also asked the state government to submit a report on the action it has taken against the vandals. The court also expressed its deep concern over the name of the victim, her photographs and video clips showing her lifeless body having been splashed all over the media. Taking a serious note of mob violence in the hospital and the allegation that the Kolkata police fled the scene, the top court ordered deployment of Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) at the hospital to enable doctors to resume...

title: AU’s irregularities come under scanner
creator: Vasu Potnuru
content: A view of Andhra University in Visakhapatnam. Visakhapatnam: Six committees have been formed by the Andhra University authorities to investigate accusations made against various decisions, approvals and implementation of departments in the varsity. The committees will investigate AU Centre for Distance and Online Education, Centre for Defence Studies, RUSA Phase-II, School of International Business, Skill Development Centre and the AU TDR hubs. Along with AU professors, experts from other universities were appointed as members of the committee. They will directly examine various issues and submit a report to the AU Vice Chancellor (in-charge) G Sasibhushan Rao. A seven-member committee was appointed to inquire into the AU Transdisciplinary Research Hub (AU TDR Hub). The committee will examine and report on the TDR Hub admissions, fees, supervision-management, utilisation of fee, auditing, examination-results, records management, etc., At Skill Development Centre, the committee members will focus on short-term courses, management, auditing, records etc., before submitting a report on the same. The committee will monitor and report on the use of fees, management, auditing, examinations conducted, results, records management etc., in the AU School of International Business (AU SIB). A detailed inquiry will be conducted on the utilisation of RUSA phase-II funds. The members will investigate into the utilisation of funds, projects, management, auditing, records etc. As part of...

title: Shettima, Jonathan, Osinbajo Expected at Book Launch in Abuja
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: Many distinguished Nigerians, including Vice-President Kashim Shettima, former president Goodluck Jonathan and former Vice-President Yemi Osinbajo, are expected to attend the launch of a book co-authored by Dr. Shamsuddeen Usman on September 26 at the Musa Yaradua Centre, Abuja. The vice president will be the special guest of honour, while Jonathan will chair the occasion. Usman was finance minister (2007-2009), minister of national planning (2009-2013), and Central Bank of Nigeria’s deputy governor (1999 to 2007). He was also the pioneer director-general of TCPC (now BPE), among other positions he has held. According to the Chairman of the Media Sub-Committee, Etim Etim, the book, ‘Public Policy and Agent Interests: Perspectives from the Emerging World’, is a unique publication on both the impetus for and impediments to growth and development in emerging economies. It provides a fascinating and penetrating insight into the workings of government and the boardroom in terms of policy formulation and implementation, economic management, and the overall growth paradigm in the developing world, with Nigeria as a case study. It also accounts for the interactions between the government, its agencies, and the private sector and how such engagements impact national growth, investments, and the economy’s overall performance. “The book will, therefore, be a veritable reference material for policymakers, technocrats, business leaders and public officials on the workings of government...

title: Corbin Carroll homers as the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1
creator: AP
content: MIAMI (AP) — Corbin Carroll and Lourdes Gurriel Jr. homered to help Eduardo Rodriguez and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Miami Marlins 3-1 on Tuesday night. Arizona, which finished with four hits, improved to a major league-best 30-13 since July 1. Carroll also singled and scored on Joc Pederson's base hit, and Geraldo Perdomo walked twice. title: Libya's instability has 'quite rapidly' deteriorated and will worsen if no elections, says UN envoy
creator: By EDITH M. LEDERER - Associated Press
content: UNITED NATIONS (AP) — The top U.N. official in Libya warned Tuesday that the political, military and security situation in the oil-rich north African country has deteriorated “quite rapidly” over the past two months – and without renewed political talks leading to a unified government and elections there will be greater instability. Stephanie Khoury painted a grim picture to the U.N. Security Council of rival government forces unilaterally moving toward each other in July and August, sparking mobilizations and threats to respond, and unilateral attempts to unseat the Central Bank governor and the prime minister in the country’s west. title: Libya's instability has 'quite rapidly' deteriorated and will worsen if no elections, says UN envoy
creator: By EDITH M. LEDERER - Associated Press
content: UNITED NATIONS (AP) — The top U.N. official in Libya warned Tuesday that the political, military and security situation in the oil-rich north African country has deteriorated “quite rapidly” over the past two months – and without renewed political talks leading to a unified government and elections there will be greater instability. Stephanie Khoury painted a grim picture to the U.N. Security Council of rival government forces unilaterally moving toward each other in July and August, sparking mobilizations and threats to respond, and unilateral attempts to unseat the Central Bank governor and the prime minister in the country’s west. Libya plunged into chaos after a NATO-backed uprising toppled and killed longtime dictator Moammar Gadhafi in 2011. In the chaos that followed, the country split, with rival administrations in the east and west backed by rogue militias and foreign governments. The country’s current political crisis stems from the failure to hold elections on Dec. 24, 2021, and the refusal of Prime Minister Abdul Hamid Dbeibah — who led a transitional government in the capital of Tripoli in the west — to step down. In response, Libya’s east-based parliament appointed a rival prime minister who was replaced, while the powerful military commander Khalifa Hifter continues to hold sway in the east. Khoury warned the council that “Unilateral acts by Libyan political, military and security actors have increased tension, further entrenched institutional and political...

title: Suspeito de matar homem a facadas no interior da Bahia é preso
content: O crime ocorreu dia 15 de junho de 2024 e o investigado, que tem 43 anos e não teve nome divulgado, teve mandado de prisão cumprido no bairro Brasília, na cidade de . A Polícia Civil não detalhou as circunstâncias da prisão. Conforme a PC, o suspeito e a vítima estavam consumindo bebida alcoólica em uma rua, quando houve uma discussão entre eles, por razões desconhecidas. O suspeito se armou com uma faca e desferiu vários golpes contr Francisco. O homem passou pelos exames de lesão corporal e está à disposição do Poder Judiciário. title: 面試都過了卻倒在這裡!他誤按「婉拒」台積電工作 業內人:會被註記
content: 進入 台積電 工作,是不少人的夢想。近日卻有網友發文,表示自己因為一個小失誤,可能丟失到手的台積電工作,讓他十分不安。 原PO在 Dcard 以「 台積電offer letter不小心按到婉拒 」為題發文,表示自己有幸拿到了台積電的offer,但在點開信件查看時,不小心點到了「拒絕」。由於是第一次發生這種事,原PO當下十分慌張。雖然事後有致電 人資 確認,表明自己願意接收工作機會,人資也表示蠻多人都不小心點錯,但後來似乎也沒有告知更改成功。原PO擔心自己會因為「手殘」而失去機會,並發文詢問是否有網友有相關經驗。 文章引出大量網友留言,不少人認為他實在是太粗心,「沒救了啊,HR應該認定你是很不細心的人,還好你按到拒絕」、「沒機會了吧,還沒入職就操作失誤」、「這也是 面試 ,篩選人才的一環」、「按個按鍵都按錯,怎麼放心幾千萬的lot經手」。 也有網友安慰原PO,表示工作還是會有的,不用太擔心,「恭喜加入神山,人資好不容易媒合成功,不會因為這種小事就不讓你加入。再次恭喜」、「我遇到跟你一樣的問題,寄信跟人資說你要接受offer,這樣有個依據,人資後來就回信幫我改了,然後歡迎我加入台積電,也有收到on board上傳資料的連結,不用緊張」、「這種HR一律註記,還是會給offer,但被判定是容易出錯者」。 也有人質疑台積電信件設計有問題,「按鍵設在信裡面,按下去也沒有再度確認的訊息跳出來,確實蠻容易誤按的吧」、「台積IT開信按錯都不會考慮進去嗎?不然一年報到兩千人中有10%按錯,HR就要接200通電話耶」。

title: Maximizing Efficiency in Endoscopic Procedures: The Importance of the Biopsy Channel
creator: Ethan Lee | Prime Star
content: Share Tweet Share Share Email Introduction to Endoscopic Procedures Endoscopic procedures have revolutionized the way healthcare providers diagnose and treat various medical conditions. These minimally invasive techniques allow for a closer look inside the body, enabling doctors to make informed decisions with precision. One critical component of these procedures often goes unnoticed but plays a vital role in ensuring their success: the biopsy channel. The biopsy channel is an essential feature that provides access to tissue samples, enhancing diagnostic capabilities during endoscopy. However, understanding its importance can significantly impact efficiency and outcomes in clinical practice. Let’s delve into how this seemingly small element can lead to big changes in your endoscopic workflow and patient care. The Role of the Biopsy Channel in Endoscopy The biopsy channel is a critical component of endoscopic procedures. It serves as the conduit for taking tissue samples, allowing physicians to diagnose conditions accurately. This narrow passage enables access to hard-to-reach areas within the body. By facilitating precise sampling, it enhances diagnostic capabilities and informs treatment plans. Additionally, the design of the biopsy channel can influence procedural outcomes. A well-constructed channel minimizes risks such as contamination or complications during sample collection. Its integration into endoscopes has revolutionized how medical professionals approach various...

title: Education excuses
content: At a news conference last Monday, Education Minister Dr Nyan Gadsby-Dolly decided to “take in front” in case all schools aren’t opened when the new academic year starts on September 2. “We can say that all schools are ready and, on the night before school reopens, a sewer system goes down, a pipe burst, and that will make that school not ready to open,” Minister Gadsby-Dolly asserted. However, nobody would blame the minister if such unexpected events occur. What the public expects, and never gets, is an efficient programme of school maintenance and repairs. Figures from the Education Ministry show that it oversees 610 primary and secondary schools and 32 Early Childhood Care and Education Centres (ECCEs). Every year, the ministry has the ­July-August vacation to undertake major repairs without disrupting students, while minor maintenance is supposed to be ongoing. Yet planning and coordination seem always to be lacking. This year, critical infrastructural works at 27 schools, which have been ongoing since 2023, are only 50% completed. Minister Gadsby-Dolly blamed this on a lack of money. “We don’t have all of the funding that is required to fix every school up to the level that we would like to,” she said. “For that, we would need more than $2 billion at this time.” However, even when energy dollars were overflowing, school repairs and renovations were never carried out efficiently. In any case, it remains an open question whether the Education Ministry, which on average...

title: Buy 7,895 Shares of This Top Dividend Stock for $500/Month in Passive Income
content: A top dividend stock is like the golden goose of your investment portfolio. It just keeps laying those golden eggs! The key ingredients? Consistency, growth, and a solid financial foundation. You want a company that’s been paying dividends like clockwork for years — even better if they’ve been raising those dividends regularly. This shows the stock is not only reliable but also growing. Look for companies with low payout ratios (the percentage of earnings they dish out as dividends), as this means the stock is not overextending and can sustain payments even in tougher times. Now, for that sweet monthly passive income, it’s all about the payout frequency. Some stocks pay quarterly, but if you mix in those juicy monthly dividend payers, you can smooth out your cash flow. REITs (real estate investment trusts) and certain income-focused funds often lead the charge here. They’re built to funnel a chunk of their profits back to shareholders every single month. This makes them ideal for those looking to cover regular expenses or just wanting to watch their account balance grow steadily. Now, let’s get into one stock that looks primed to power your passive income. Choice Properties REIT ( ) has been a steady player in the Canadian dividend scene. Since its inception, CHP.UN has consistently rewarded its shareholders with regular dividend payments. While it might not be the flashiest stock on the TSX, it’s certainly one of the more reliable ones. The company has managed to keep its...

title: Woman pleads guilty to manslaughter in husband’s 2022 shooting death in Denton
creator: By Brooke Colombo Staff Writer
content: A Sanger woman set to be tried for murder for her husband Jeffrey McBride’s shooting death instead pleaded guilty to manslaughter on Friday. Amber Rosales, 32, accepted a plea deal of five years in prison for the lesser offense of second-degree felony manslaughter. She received about two years and three months of jail credit for the time she served while awaiting trial. Amber Rosales Had Rosales gone forward with a trial, she could have faced 5 to 99 years or life in prison. Manslaughter has a punishment range of 2 to 20 years. Her defense attorney, Caroline Simone, said a jury would not have been allowed to consider manslaughter in lieu of a murder conviction had Rosales gone to trial. During a docket call Friday, Simone said Kailey Gillman, a special prosecutor from Collin County, brought a new deal to the table. Rosales rejected it. Then, Simone said, Gillman returned with five years for a manslaughter plea. Simone declined to say what the previous offer was. “There are things we could put on as the defense team that we believe are strong pieces of evidence and would be powerful to a jury, but there’s always some risk [with a trial],” Simone said. “It’s one of those offers that’s just too good to refuse with the type of risk, especially on a murder charge.” A trial date has been set for a Sanger woman accused of murdering her newlywed husband in April 2022. Some Denton County murder and assault cases filed in the last year or so are still working their way through the...

title: કોલેજના 180 છાત્રો નાપાસ:બહારની યુનિવર્સિટીમાં પેપર ચેક કરવા જતાં એકજ કોલેજના 180 છાત્રો નાપાસ
content: જૂનાગઢની બહાઉદ્દીન સાયન્સ કોલેજનાં બીએસસીના પ્રથમ સેમેસ્ટરનાં 180 વિદ્યાર્થીઓ એબિલિટી એન્હેન્સમેન્ટ કોર્સ (એઇસી) ના પેપરમાં નાપાસ થયા છે. બહારની કોલેજમાં પેપર ચેક કરવા મોકલાયા હોવાને લીધે આ સ્થિતિ સર્જાઇ હોવાનું જાણવા મળ્યું છે. ભક્ત કવિ નરસિંહ મહેતા યુનિવર્સિટી હેઠળની કોલેજોમાં પ્રથમ સેમેસ્ટરમાં એઇસીનું પેપર ફરજિયાત હોય છે. તેમાં કોઇ એક ભાષાની પસંદગી કરવાની હોય છે. સાયન્સ ફેકલ્ટીમાં બહાઉદ્દીન સાયન્સ કોલેજેમાં મોટાભાગનાએ અંગ્રેજી પસંદ કર્યું હતું. આ પેપર 50 માર્કનું હોય છે. એ પૈકી અડધા માર્ક તો વર્ષ દરમ્યાન કરેલી પ્રવૃત્તિને લગતા હોય છે. 18 માર્કે તેમાં પાસ થવાય છે. પણ આ કોલેજમાં બધાને 6 થી 7 જ માર્ક આવ્યા છે. પ્રશ્નો પણ મોટાભાગે એમસીક્યુ અને ખાલી જગ્યા પૂરો એ પ્રકારના હોય છે. હવે તેમાં ગ્રેસીંગ માર્ક પણ નથી મળતા. આથી વિદ્યાર્થીઓ રજૂઆત માટે પહોંચ્યા હતા. અંગ્રેજીના એમસીક્યુ પ્રકારના પેપરમાં પૂરા 18 માર્ક પણ ન મેળ્યા બહાર ચેક કરવા મોકલાયા હતા: કુલપતિ આ વખતે એઇસીનાં પેપર બહારની યુનિવર્સિટીમાં ચેક કરવા માટે મોકલાયા હતા. જ્યાં સ્વાભાવિકપણેજ તેઓ વધુ કડકાઇથી ચેકીંગ કરતા હોય છે. સાયન્સ ફેકલ્ટીમાં 5 હજાર વિદ્યાર્થીઓ હોય છે. એમાંથી 180 ફેલ થયા છે. આમ છતાં અમે વધુ વિગતો મેળવી રહ્યા છીએ. - ડો. ચેતન ત્રિવેદી, કુલપતિ, ભક્ત કવિ નરસિંહ મહેતા યુનિવર્સિટી

Oyeweso Calls for Recruitment Facility Upgrade at OAU
creator: Funmi Ogundare
content: Funmi Ogundare The Pro-Chancellor and Chairman of Council at Obafemi Awolowo University (OAU), Professor Siyan Oyeweso, has expressed concerns over government policies that hinder the recruitment and retention of top talent in the university sector. He stated that these policies have created both entry and exit challenges, exacerbating staff shortages. Oyeweso who said this at the inauguration of the committee for the university’s fourth strategic plan, lamented that the shortage of staff has adversely affected the institution. He noted that many departments are now either empty or nearly so, despite efforts to address accreditation needs. He emphasized the importance of recruiting the best candidates and avoiding narrow or irrelevant considerations in this process to maintain the university’s tradition of excellence. He also stressed the need for staff development through proper mentoring, training, and preparation, with senior academic staff and university management playing crucial roles in these areas. Oyeweso pointed out that some of the university’s facilities are deteriorating. “The university is no longer producing the clean water it once did, and its distribution system is inadequate, leading to multiple boreholes and wells that risk weakening the land and causing tremors. “The university’s roads are aging and prone to flooding, with many needing urgent repairs. There is uncontrolled increase in motorcycle riders intended for neighborhood security, which has...

title: Público acredita que ex de Vitão está em "A Fazenda" após pistas de Carelli
creator: Pipoca Moderna
content: Faltando menos de um mês para a estreia da 16a temporada de "A Fazenda", o diretor do reality, Rodrigo Carelli, começou a divulgar pistas sobre os participantes do programa. Em uma publicação no X (antigo Twitter) nesta terça (20/3), Carelli levantou especulações ao dar detalhes sobre uma futura participante: "Mais uma dica sobre participantes de 'A Fazenda': A moda uniu a futura peoa a um cantor. Após este affair, ela teve uma gravidez polêmica. Quem é?", questionou o diretor. A postagem rapidamente gerou uma enxurrada de palpites entre os internautas. A maioria apostou na modelo Suelen Gervásio, que se envolveu em um affair com o cantor Vitão. A especulação ganhou força por um detalhe: ela engravidou e o cantor chegou a ser apontado como o pai da criança, mas um teste de DNA desmentiu a paternidade. Suelen Gervásio, por sinal, está numa lista que "vazou" nas redes sociais, com os 20 supostos nomes de integrantes de "A Fazenda 16". A relação decepcionou os internautas por exagerar no sub das subcelebridades, listando vários exes de famosos e só duas celebridades de verdade: o ex-jogador de futebol Edilson e a humorista Gorete Milagres. Ele tem 53 anos e ela 60. Com a estreia marcada para 17 de setembro, em breve os nomes oficiais serão revelados.

奔驰与云游戏平台 Boosteroid 合作,将 PC 游戏引入车内
content: IT之家 8 月 21 日消息,梅赛德斯-奔驰今日宣布与云游戏平台 Boosteroid 合作,将为其配备第三代 MBUX 信息娱乐系统的车型提供云游戏功能。从明年开始,车主们将能够在车内享受 1000 多款高质量游戏,包括《堡垒之夜》和《盗贼之海》。 据IT之家了解,Boosteroid 平台提供对高端 PC 游戏的访问,可通过 PC、笔记本电脑、平板电脑、 Android 电视甚至手机使用。通过与微软的合作, Boosteroid 会员能够访问通过 Steam 或 Epic Games Store 购买的 PC 游戏 。今年早些时候,微软还增加了对通过 Windows 上的 Microsoft Store 购买或通过 Game Pass 订阅获得的精选游戏的支持。 梅赛德斯-奔驰表示,Boosteroid 应用将作为 MBUX Entertainment Package Plus 的一部分提供,这意味着车主们可以随时随地享受 PC 游戏体验。除了微软的游戏之外,梅赛德斯-奔驰的车辆还将能够玩来自 Epic Games Store、育碧等平台的游戏。 Boosteroid 云游戏应用将于 2025 年在欧洲以及北美和南美通过梅赛德斯-奔驰车内应用商店提供 。出于安全考虑,游戏仅在车辆停放时可玩,需要连接蓝牙手柄或手机来玩。 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

FBM KLCI continues pullback as profit-taking emerges
content: KUALA LUMPUR: An opportunity for further profit-taking presented itself on the domestic market as Wall Street retreated overnight ahead of the Jackson Hole Symposium on Friday. After snapping a seven-day winning streak yesterday, the FBM KLCI continued to exhibit selling pressure on Wednesday by opening 1.05 points weaker at 1,641.72. The raft of corporate results that are due to be released over the coming days are keeping investors on their toes, although any declines on the market are expected to be cushioned by an overall positive mood over the country's economic performance. The technical charts are also offering support for a more optimistic view as the readings on the key index remained positive, said Malacca Securities Research. The research firm said the MACD histogram was forming another positive bare while the relative strength index continued to rend above 50 points. "The resistance is envisaged around 1,657-1,662 and the support is set at 1,622-1,627," it added in its review. On the local sectors, Malacca Securities said the slight pullback in US markets could put pressure on local technology stocks. Additionally, the stronger ringgit could dampen interest in local tech companies. "Attention may shift to the consumer, building material, construction, property, renewable energy, and shipping sectors, given expectations of steadier earnings ahead of corporate results. "Besides, the Monkeypox situation may be monitored for potential trading opportunities within...

title: CTC board breezes through multiple item agenda Tuesday
creator: By Madeline Oden | Herald
content: The Central Texas College Board of Trustees met for its monthly workshop Tuesday and covered a range of topics of discussion. Before getting into the agenda, Chancellor Michele Carter introduced the newest member of the team, Vice Chancellor of Instruction and Workforce education Tamara Clunis, to the board. The board then received the proposed budget for the fiscal year 2024, which includes a proposed 8% increase in hourly wages and 4% in salary wages for CTC staff. Board members agreed to go over the budget in their own time and discuss it further at the next meeting. The board also discussed its annual 50K vendor list for the FY 24-25 budget and sponsorship requests from local businesses and organizations. Other items the board discussed included renewing multiple insurance lines, reviewing the 2012-2024 Texas School Safety Audit and receive a report on the tax reinvestment zone report. The next meeting will be held Tuesday, Aug. 27. There will be a special meeting at 12:30 p.m. and the regular meeting at 1 p.m.

title: 아일릿 ‘Magnetic’, 韓日 틱톡 뜨겁게 달군 ‘올해의 여름 노래’
Diplomacy during a crisis in Venezuela
creator: Jarrel De Matas
content: Last Saturday, I was invited to a meeting with His Excellency Álvaro Sánchez Cordero, Venezuelan Ambassador to Trinidad and Tobago. The theme of the meeting, “For peace and against fascism”, was an ­unambiguous position to adopt. Our politicians, however, have less flexibility when taking such a position. An often-cited quote defines diplomacy as the art of saying “nice doggie” until you can find a rock. With the prospect of what activist Sofia Figueroa-Leon is calling “another exodus” of Venezuelan citizens on the horizon for Trinidad and Tobago, our diplomatic stance, summed up by Prime Minister Dr Keith Rowley, will be put to the test as other nations mount pressure on Maduro’s administration to be transparent and accountable. Immediately following the results of the Venezuela election, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken expressed “serious concerns” about the result. Since 2017, the US has progressively imposed sanctions on the Maduro administration. These sanctions have not only failed to unseat Maduro’s government, but worsened the humanitarian and economic crises in Venezuela. These crises have continued to affect Trinidad and Tobago. At a PNM event in early August, Dr Rowley affirmed that his Cabinet would not take a position on the Venezuela election result. In April 2024, Dr Rowley also said T&T is “not immune to what goes on between Venezuela and the US”. By Dr Rowley’s own admission, no position—as he has attempted to explain—is in fact a position. It might be...

title: UNILAG VC, Fakorede Describe Failure as Integral Part of Running Business
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: The Vice-Chancellor, University of Lagos, Prof. Folasade Ogunsola has described failure as an integral part of running any business. Ogunsola stated this at the presentation of the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) business certificates to students of the institution by the Ignite Career Initiative recently in Lagos. The Ignite Career Initiative is a non-governmental organisation initiative, aimed at empowering young people with admirable and lofty entrepreneurial ideas, by providing a veritable platform to actualise their ideas with sustainable results. In September 2022, Ignite Career Initiative registered several businesses for students of the university. This year, 350 CAC business certificates have so far been presented to students. According to Ogunsola, failure will always occur in any human endeavour, therefore, the need to always embrace it as a friend, rather than foe. “We must strive to embrace and learn from failure and never to give up. We must keep moving forward,” she said. The VC urged the “student-preneurs” that graced the occasion to imbibe honesty, ethics and integrity, when running their businesses. “Approach every business ethically. What is in your mind is what you express. Guard your mind, as it shapes your actions and character,” Ogunsola said. Also speaking, Aare Bashir Fakorede, Founder, Aare Bashir Fakorede Foundation, encouraged students to uphold ethics and integrity in their business endeavors. The founder, who was represented by his wife, Mrs....

title: 国内最大汽车经销商广汇暴雷:旗下宝马奔驰等多家 4S 店提车难,有门店 40 台车被抵押
content: IT之家 8 月 21 日消息,据蓝鲸新闻报道,国内最大汽车经销商广汇汽车暴雷,出现提车难、拖欠工资、门店关闭等情况。 近期陆续有消费者称,他们在广汇旗下 4S 店购车后遇到了无法提车的情况,仅其中一名消费者买车的 4S 店就有 四十多台车无法提走 。 江苏、山东、广东、辽宁、安徽等多地都出现了提车难的情况,涉及奔驰、宝马、沃尔沃、捷豹路虎等多个品牌。 涉事 4S 店均为广汇汽车旗下经销商 ,提车难问题主要集中在 7 月与 8 月。 消费者透露,门店给出的回应大多为“财务处理、银行问题、资金困难”等,但实际原因多为 车子合格证被拿去抵押了 。 此外,上述多地广汇旗下的门店均存在 拖欠工资 的情况,波及范围较广。虽然现在这些欠薪的门店还未闭店,但 有的门店已无法正常经营 ,处于濒临闭店的状态。 据IT之家此前报道,今年 7 月 17 日, 广汇汽车开盘即一字跌停 ,跌幅 10.34%,封单价 0.78 元 / 股。因其连续 20 个交易日低于 1 元, 触发面值退市条款 。 广汇汽车于 7 月 12 日晚间披露的业绩预告显示,预计 2024 年上半年归属于上市公司股东的 净利润亏损 5.83 亿元至 6.99 亿元 ,上年同期盈利 6.01 亿元;归属于上市公司股东的扣除非经常性损益的净利润亏损 7.56 亿元至 8.72 亿元,上年同期盈利 3.33 亿元。 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

title: Actress Alicia Silverstone forced to debunk death rumours after posting video eating ‘mildly poisonous’ fruit
creator: Morgan de Smidt
content: Clueless star Alicia Silverstone sparked serious concerns for her wellbeing after posting a TikTok which has since gone viral. The American actress posted a video to social media after discovering a plant she could not identify and deciding to eat it while out on a stroll in England. The short clip captioned “What the heck is this!? I’m in England and can’t figure it out” opens with Silverstone giving viewers a good look at the small, seedy, orange-coloured fruit that already had a bite taken out of it. “I just bit into it because I was on the street and we were discussing whether this was a tomato or not,” she said. “It is definitely not because look at these leaves... so what the heck is this? “I don’t think you’re supposed to eat this but it’s almost like a pepper, does anyone know what this is?” Silverstone’s Instagram comments reflected a mixture of shock, alarm and confusion. “Imagine looking outside your window and Alicia Silverstone is eating your plants. 😂😍” one user joked. “ALICIA! Stop eating mystery veggies out of someone else’s street garden!” another warned. “Are you just eating out of random people’s yards????” a third probed. Social media users identified the mystery plant, suggesting it was the Jerusalem Cherry also known as Solanum pseudocapsicum. According to the Queensland Poisons Information Centre all parts of the plant are poisonous, especially the unripe fruits. “If plant or fruit is eaten, early symptoms can include fever, sweating, vomiting, stomach...

title: ‘Taking basket’ from Rowley
content: “Clothes basket! Clothes basket!” That was the cry of the basket sellers when I was a child. It is difficult to “take basket” from a politician. Prime Minister Dr Keith Rowley on Sunday dramatically announced the removal of Christopher Columbus’ three ships from our coat of arms to be replaced with the steelpan. Let us take a quick review of what the symbols on the coat of arms represent. This information is taken from the website of the President of the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago. “The Coat of Arms with the accompanying motifs which represent indigenous features of Trinidad and Tobago were selected and formally agreed to be used as the Coat of Arms of Trinidad and Tobago in 1962, in a design approved by the College of Arms. The Birds represented on either side of the Coat of Arms of Trinidad and Tobago are the Scarlet Ibis and the Cocrico (native to Tobago), which are shown in their natural colours. The three ships represent the Trinity as well as the re-discovery of Trinidad by Columbus’ three ships. The three Peaks were principal motifs of Trinidad’s early British Colonial Seals and Flag-Badges. They commemorated both Columbus’ decision to name Trinidad after the Blessed Trinity and the three peaks of the Southern mountain range, called the ‘Three Sisters’, which a sailor on Columbus flagship saw on the horizon. The fruited Coconut Palm dates back to the great seals of British Colonial Tobago in the days when the island was a separate administrative unit. Our Motto...

title: Man arrested over suspicious death of woman
creator: Rachael Ward
content: A man has been arrested over the suspicious death of a woman in Darwin. Police were called to a home at Magdelene Court in Malak, in the city's north, just after midnight over reports a 43-year-old woman had died. Emergency services tried to resuscitate the woman but she was declared dead shortly after they arrived. Police have described her death as suspicious, but not revealed any further details about her. A 57-year-old man known to the woman was then arrested at a different location in the same suburb. The man remains in police custody as investigations continue. Anyone with information about the woman's death or footage from Magdelene Court has been asked to contact investigators.

title: El colombiano que ganó premio por contar cómo es vivir con un trastorno esquizoafectivo
content: Michael Vargas Arango cuenta que, desde que tiene memoria, ha sentido "presencias extrañas" cuando entra a determinados sitios o está en presencia de ciertas personas. "Mucha gente empezó a decir que yo tenía un don, porque a mí, ciertas personas y ciertos sitios me producen unas energías malucas, muy malucas", le cuenta a BBC Mundo el joven colombiano de 22 años, estudiante de psicología en la ciudad de Miami, Estados Unidos. Pero lo que para los más fervorosos a su alrededor parecía ser un regalo divino, para él empezó gradualmente a convertirse en una pesadilla: "Cuando tenía un bajón emocional empezaba a sentir como si hubiera una presencia, sentía como si alguien me estuviera apuñalando la columna, es algo muy raro de explicar". En su momento más oscuro, esa pesadilla lo llevó a intentar acabar con su propia vida: "Yo me tomé un tarro de pastillas y estoy vivo porque me vomité, la verdad". El diagnóstico de Michael es una doble bomba: el de un trastorno esquizoafectivo, una condición mental en la que se mezclan síntomas de la esquizofrenia -alucinaciones y delirios- con síntomas de los trastornos del estado de ánimo -como la depresión y la manía-, y el de trastorno de personalidad emocionalmente inestable. Hoy, con un mejor entendimiento de su propia mente, y motivado a ayudar a los demás, Michael dice que quiere tumbar los estigmas que la sociedad aún mantiene frente a los trastornos mentales y a términos como "esquizofrenia". Estigmas...

title: વહીવટીદા શાસનથી મામલદારને રજૂઆત:રાજુલામાં શાકમાર્કેટમાં ગંદકીથી વેપારીઓ પરેશાન
content: રાજુલામાં શાકમાર્કેટમાં ગંદકીથી વેપારીઓ પરેશાન બન્યા છે. અહીં મચ્છર અને માખીનો ઉપદ્રવ વધ્યો હતો. જેના કારણે રોગચાળો ફેલાવાની ભીતિ સેવાઈ રહી છે. શાકમાર્કેટમાં 108 બાકડાની નગરપાલિકાએ હરરાજી કરી હતી. અહીં વેપારીઓ ગંદકીથી ત્રાહિમામ પોકારી ઉઠ્યા છે. આમ આદ રાજુલાની શાકમાર્કેટમાં રેઢીયાર પશુના આંટાફેરા જોવા મળે છે. બાકડાની ચારે તરફ ગંદકી જ નજરે ચડે છે. જેના કારણે લોકો માર્કેટની અંદર ગ્રાહકો ખરીદી કરવા જતા નથી. બહારથી ખરીદી કરી જતા રહે છે. અહીં આમ આદમી પાર્ટના જિલ્લા ઉપ પ્રમુખ ભરતભાઈ બલદાણીયાએ સ્થળ ઉપર નિરીક્ષણ કર્યું હતું. પાલિકામાં વહિવટદાર શાસન હોવાથી મામલતદારને આ અંગે રજૂઆત કરી હતી. ઉપરાંત યોગ્ય સફાઈ નહી કરવામાં આવે તો કચરો પાલિકા કચેરી ખાતે ઠાલવવાની ચિમકી પણ ઉચ્ચારી હતી. આમ આદમી પાર્ટના શહેર પ્રમુખ કિરીટભાઈ પંડયા અને લઘુમતી સેલના પ્રમુખ હુસેનભાઈ જાખરા વિગેરે ઉપસ્થિત રહ્યા હતા. રાજુલાની શાકમાર્કેટમાંથી ગંદકી હટાવવાની માંગણી કરી હતી.

title: Child allegedly raped at knifepoint in Sydney park
creator: Jessica McSweeney
content: A child under the age of 14 has allegedly been lured from a Sydney train station and raped at knifepoint in a park by a man in a white van, police say. Police allege the child between the age of 10-14 was waiting at Mount Druitt train station last Thursday, just after 1am, when they were approached by the unknown man who had been driving around the area. Mount Druitt train station. Credit: Google Maps The 33-year-old allegedly took the child away to a nearby park where he threatened the youth with a knife and sexually assaulted them. He then left the scene in the white van, police said. Police were called and sex crimes detectives began an investigation under Strike Force Blaina, with the man arrested on Duke Street, Mount Druitt, on Tuesday. He was taken to the local police station where he was charged with aggravated sexual intercourse with a child between 10 and 14 and intentionally sexually touch a child between 10 and 16. He was refused bail by police and is expected to face Mount Druitt Local Court on Wednesday. As the investigation continues, Detective Superintendent Jayne Doherty said any victims of sexual assault will be supported by the police. “I want to continue to urge the community to stay vigilant and look out for children,” the commander of the sex crimes squad said. “If you’re a victim of sexual violence please reach out to police or support services. You will be supported during this difficult time. “If you decide to report your assault to police, we will...

title: Competition close at both ends of NASCAR Cup Series playoff standings
creator: Field Level Media
content: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla. - A dramatic race at Michigan International Speedway over the weekend has meant that for the second consecutive week, the NASCAR Cup Series playoff outlook has undergone a major change -- both atop the standings and on the all-important cutoff line as the series heads to Daytona International Speedway for Saturday night's Coke Zero Sugar 400 (7:30 p.m. ET, NBC, MRN, SiriusXM NASCAR Radio). 23XI Racing's Tyler Reddick earned his second trophy of the year. His dogged work in the No. 45 Toyota -- along with a rare "off" day for a couple of his closest regular-season championship contenders -- has thrust the 28-year-old Californian atop the standings for the first time in his young career. Only two races remain to decide the regular-season champion and which 16 drivers will qualify for the playoffs. Reddick now holds a 10-point advantage over Hendrick Motorsports' Chase Elliott (804) in the standings. Joe Gibbs Racing's Denny Hamlin (786) moved up to third place -- 28 points back -- thanks to an inspired ninth-place drive at Michigan despite an early race spin. Hendrick's Kyle Larson -- who has led the championship a series-best 14 weeks on the season, including the last two weeks and boasts a series-best four wins -- dropped to fourth place (782), 32 points behind Reddick after triggering a seven-car crash mid-race that parked him with a 34th-place finish on Sunday. It all sets up a tight, competitive bid for that 15-point bonus paid to the regular- season...

title: ASX dips as Wall Street’s winning streak ends; WiseTech leaps
creator: Penry Buckley
content: The Australian sharemarket opened weaker on Wednesday after US stocks ticked lower, bringing an end to Wall Street’s eight-day winning streak, the longest of the year. The ASX dropped 46.20 points, or 0.6 per cent, to 7,951.50 as of 11.08am AEST, with most sectors tracking down slightly, led by energy (down 1.9 per cent), while real estate and industrials edged higher, and technology stocks jumped 3.8 per cent. The morning’s decline ended the local bourse’s own eight days of gains after having seen its worst two-day sell-off since the pandemic at the beginning of the month. Wall Street has climbed back close to its record highs. Credit: AP With earnings season in full swing, WiseTech Global was by far the biggest large cap advancer, soaring 15.2 per cent in early trading. The logistics software developer reported revenue growth of 28 per cent to just over $1 billion, on the lower side of its earnings forecasts but enough to put a rocket under its shares. Pallet maker Brambles was up 8.4 per cent after reporting an 8 per cent rise in sales, to $US6.5 billion ($9.6 billion), followed by Cleanaway, up 2.4 per cent. The waste management group said its net profit improved to $158.2 million from $23.5 million last year and flagged it was on track to deliver its earnings targets. Sleep apnoea devices manufacturer ResMed fell 2.9 per cent, followed in the large caps by Whitehaven Coal, which dropped 2.7 per cent at the open. Santos was down 2.2 per cent after reporting an 18 per...

title: Chicharito muestra su preparación para el regreso del Apertura 2024... y así reaccionó la afición
content: El Apertura 2024 de la Liga BBVA MX reanudará su actividad el próximo viernes 23 de agosto con tres emocionantes partidos luego del parón por la Leagues Cup 2024 . Uno de los enfrentamientos más llamativos dentro de la jornada 5 es el de Tigres en contra de Chivas , el cual se llevará a cabo el próximo sábado 24 de agosto; toda la cobertura de este duelo la vas a poder seguir a través de la pantalla de Azteca 7. Este martes 20 de agosto, el máximo goleador de la Selección Mexicana , Javier ‘Chicharito’ Hernández , subió a sus redes sociales un video en donde se le ve al ariete entrenado y poniéndose en forma para su compromiso frente a los Tigres . Luego de que el futbolista publicara el video, varios aficionados expresaron sus opiniones y hay varias de ellas que están a favor de este y otros en contra al mostrar su inconformidad con el rendimiento sobre el terreno de juego del delantero en este Apertura 2024 : Una publicación compartida por Javier “Chicharito” Hernández (@ch14_) A pesar de no atravesar por su mejor momento futbolístico, el delantero no deja de trabajar para retomar el nivel que una vez mostró con los colores del Rebaño Sagrado . title: Chiquita Canyon attorneys express concern over AQMD abatement modifications
content: Waste Connections attorneys have criticized the proposed modification order from the South Coast Air Quality Management District to install remote monitoring systems for approximately 240 gas collection wells at Chiquita Canyon Landfill. Megan Morgan of Beveridge & Diamond, attorney for landfill operator Waste Connections, stated during the AQMD hearing on Tuesday morning that imposing a requirement to install monitoring systems on all the landfill’s gas collection wells within the initial chemical reaction area would strain Chiquita Canyon Landfill’s ability to meet the deadline to complete the West Toe excavation project. The landfill has been experiencing an increase in noxious odors since May 2022 because of a chemical reaction from within an inactive portion of the landfill, according to the California Environmental Protection Agency. The west slope specifically, according to Chiquita Canyon’s website , has seen an increase in production of leachate, liquids that seep out of waste. Morgan previously attributed these increased levels of the liquids and the reaction odors to elevated landfill temperature reactions, or ETLFs. As a response to mitigate and control the leachate levels, Chiquita Canyon began excavation work on Aug. 8. Morgan contested AQMD’s proposal for Chiquita Canyon to have completed installation of the monitoring system in all affected wells by Nov. 22, and instead proposed that the company initially install the systems in six wells to serve as a sample....

title: લોકમેળાનું આયોજન:જાફરાબાદમાં જન્માષ્ટમીના લોકમેળાનો વિધિવત પ્રારંભ
content: જાફરાબાદમાં કામધેનુ ગૌ શાળા દ્વારા જન્માષ્ટમીના લોકમેળાનું આયોજન કરવામાં આવ્યું છે. આ લોકમેળાનો રક્ષાબંધનથી પ્રારંભ કરવામાં આવ્યો છે. અહીં મોટી સંખ્યામાં મેળામાં લોકો ઉમટી પડશે. જન્માષ્ટમી નિમિત્તે જાફરાબાદમા કામધેનું ગૌશાળા દ્વારા લોકમેળાનું દર વર્ષે આયોજન કરવામાં આવે છે. ત્યારે જન્માષ્ટમીના તહેવારને ગણતરીના દિવસો બાકી છે. ત્યારે ધારાસભ્ય હીરાભાઈ સોલંકીના પ્રયાસોથી આ વર્ષે પણ કામધેનું ગૌશાળા દ્વારા લોકમેળાનું આયોજન કરવામાં આવ્યું છે. અહીં રક્ષાબંધનના દિવસે અગ્રણીઓની ઉપસ્થિતિમાં લોકમેળાને ખુલ્લો મુકાયો હતો. મેળામાં જે આવક થશે તે ગૌશાળામાં વાપરવામાં આવશે.ઉદ્ધાટન સમયે ચેતનભાઇ શિયાળ, ભાવેશભાઈ સોલંકી, હર્ષદભાઈ મહેતા, ગોમતીદાસ બાપુ , યોગેશભાઈ બારૈયા, મનોજભાઈ ચુડાસમા, બાલકૃષ્ણભાઈ સોલંકી, વિકીભાઈ સોલંકી, કમલેશભાઈ બારૈયા વિગેરે ઉપસ્થિત રહ્યા હતા.

title: ¿Cuándo se podrá volver a ver el fenómeno de la superluna azul en la Tierra?
content: El fenómeno astronómico de la superluna azul se pudo ver la noche del 19 de agosto en diferentes partes del mundo, incluida Colombia, y los espectadores y amantes de estos fenómenos dejaron registros fotográficos en diferentes plataformas digitales. Este fenómeno astronómico ocurre cuando la Luna llena está en el perigeo, el cual es su punto de órbita más cercano a la Tierra; cuando esto ocurre, se ve más grande y brillante de lo normal. Además, su color es azul. Lo que hay que saber de la superluna azul ¿Cuándo se volverá a ver? Según la Nasa, estos fenómenos ocurren con cierta regularidad; sin embargo, es probable que esta sea la última oportunidad de ver una superluna azul en esta década. Estas lunas están compuestas por ciclos irregulares, pero según la Nasa, la próxima aparición de una superluna azul podría producirse hasta enero de 2037. ¿Cómo ver el fenómeno? Tenga en cuenta las condiciones climáticas y meteorológicas en su ciudad o país para vivir la experiencia plenamente. Que su lugar esté alejado de todo tipo de contaminación para que la Luna pueda brillar y resaltar más en tamaño es ideal. E s importante que se encuentre en un campo de visión despejado, sin árboles o edificios que le impidan ver el fenómeno. ¿Por qué se llama luna azul si no es azul? La luna puede verse en algunas ocasiones de color azul, dependiendo de las circunstancias, de la presencia del polvo o el humo de cenizas en la atmósfera, más cuando se trata de...

title: Arrogant rejection of reform proposals
content: The significance of what occurred last Sunday evening must not be lost on us as a country. The reason why, as a country, we have not yet taken the leap of faith to say goodbye to the Privy Council and run to the embrace of the Caribbean Court of Justice is trust, or a lack of it—a lack of trust in, among other things, the Government and the manner in which it wields the power entrusted to it under the Constitution. This is power that runs so deep and that is so all-encompassing that it can be exercised in very subtle ways behind the scenes and buried in darkness with explosive effect—for example, to cause a president to return a merit list that had been entrusted to her, in accordance with expressed constitutional provisions that made no provision for such return; or to cause the police to unlawfully go into another country to arrest one of our citizens and drag him back to Trinidad. It is ironic that on Sunday evening, at the Prime Minister’s political party convention, the decision was made to reject proposals that are intended to limit, in the public’s interest, some of the power that the Government and Prime Minister are able to wield over us. Specifically, these proposals were for: • two-term limits for a prime minister • fixed dates for general elections • proportional representation. And that decision was made while the Prime Minister informed us, with despotic arrogance, that: • he had made the decision to change our national coat of arms • this was part of his plan...

title: Fertiliser scarcity hits kharif activities in Srikakulam
creator: Chowdari Lakshmana Rao
content: Paddy transplantation in Amadalavalasa mandal Srikakulam: Fertiliser scarcity is hampering the kharif agriculture activities in the district. From this year, the state government has decided to distribute fertilisers to farmers through primary agricultural cooperative societies (PACS) instead of Rythu Bharosa Kendras (RBK). Infact, PACShave no trade licences for selling fertiliser since the YSRCP government distributed them through RBKs and trade licences of PACS have lapsed. In this backdrop the state government decided to distribute manure through RBKs during the current kharif season. But even this decision is yet to materialize. In addition, the minimum quantity of the manure is not available in the district. Farmers in Amadalavalasa, Ponduru, Ranastalam, Laveru, G.Sigadam, Sarubujjili, Hiramandal, Kotturu, Bhamini, Burja, Etcherla, Gara and other mandals in the district are looking for fertilisers. But at the same time, private dealers are procuring the fertilisers from the manufacturing companies and cashing in on the situation by selling the same at high price.

title: 美獨立參選人小羅勃甘迺迪「考慮退選」! 川普樂回:願給官職
content: 美國總統大選獨立參選人小羅勃甘迺迪(Robert F. Kennedy Jr.)的副手沙納漢(Nicole Shanahan)20日表示,兩人正考慮退選,轉而支持 川普 。對此川普表示,若是當選,他將考慮延攬甘迺迪加入新政府。 沙納漢20日接受洛杉磯媒體「Impact Theory」播客節目專訪時透露,她與小羅勃甘迺迪正考慮兩個選項,一是留下來,二是離開、並與川普聯手,但選擇退選並向選民交代原因並不容易,但她並未說明他們將何時做出決定。 針對小羅勃甘迺迪可能考慮退選,川普20日接受CNN專訪時表示樂意獲得支持,肯定會為對方未來在其政府發揮作用持開放態度,又稱「我喜歡他,我尊重他」。 當被問及此事時,小羅勃甘迺迪的競選團隊發言人分享小甘迺迪同日在網上的發言,稱一如既往,他樂與任何政黨的領導人對話,以進一步實現他職業生涯的目標。

title: Jhovanoty no se dejó intimidar de Westcol y le mandó contundente mensaje por llamarlo rata: “Eso es censura”
content: Luis Villa, más conocido como Westcol, es uno de los influencers colombianos más reconocidos del momento y cuenta con millones de seguidores que lo apoyan en cada uno de sus proyectos. El paisa ganó visibilidad gracias a las transmisiones que hacía en vivo por plataformas, una forma en la que poco a poco fue construyendo su comunidad. Villa ha estado inmerso en distintas polémicas y, hace poco, ‘cazó' una nueva pelea con otra de las personalidades públicas más reconocidas: Jhovanoty, quien saltó a la fama principalmente por el gran talento que tiene para imitar figuras públicas, especialmente en lo relacionado con su tono de voz, casi que lo hace a la perfección. La pelea entre el creador de contenido y el humorista inició por una entrevista que el segundo le hizo a Cris Valencia, un joven que ha cogido fama después de que sus videos cantando se viralizaran por TikTok y Westcol lo arropara y apoyara. En el diálogo, el expresentador de ‘ Día a Día ’ imitó al paisa y lo comparó con ‘Kiko’, uno de los personajes más icónicos de la serie ‘El Chavo del 8′. Valencia desde el principio no estuvo de acuerdo, pero dejó ver que era una simple broma y no le prestó mayor atención. Sin embargo, Westcol no lo vio de la misma manera y días después, en medio de una transmisión en vivo, le reprochó al cantante por dejar que se burlaran de él. “Si usted hubiera tenido criterio, parce, usted no deja que se burlen de mí (...) No mencione a esa rata. Una vez, por...

title: Simak Begini Prediksi Rupiah Hingga Akhir Tahun Nanti
મુશ્કેલી:રાજુલાના હવેલી ચોકમાં ગટરના ગંદા પાણી ઉભરાઇને માર્ગો પર
content: રાજુલામા હવેલી ચોકમા પાછલા કેટલાક સમયથી ગટરના ગંદા પાણી ઉભરાઇને માર્ગો પર વહી રહ્યાં છે. જેના કારણે અહીથી પસાર થતા રાહદારીઓ અને દર્શનાર્થે જતા ભકતોને પારાવાર મુશ્કેલી પડી રહી છે. તહેવાર ટાણે જ રાજુલામા હવેલી ચોક વિસ્તારમા ગટરના ગંદા પાણી ઉભરાઇ રહ્યાં છે. અહી પાલિકા દ્વારા ગટર સફાઇ બાબતે કોઇ કામગીરી કરાતી ન હોય આ સ્થિતિનુ નિર્માણ થઇ રહ્યું છે. આ વિસ્તારમા અનેક દુકાનો આવેલી છે. ગટરના પાણી ઉભરાઇને માર્ગ પર જમા રહેતા હોય આખો દિવસ દુર્ગધના કારણે વેપારીઓને પણ મુશ્કેલી પડી રહી છે. આ વિસ્તારમાથી પસાર થઇ દર્શનાર્થે જતા લોકોને પણ આ ગંદા પાણીમાથી ચાલવા મજબુર થવુ પડી રહ્યું છે. આવી ગંદકીના કારણે કોઇ રોગચાળો ફેલાય તે પહેલા પાલિકા દ્વારા સફાઇની કામગીરી હાથ ધરાઇ તેવુ લોકો ઇચ્છી રહ્યાં છે.

title: Serum working on vaccine for Mpox
creator: The Hans India
content: New Delhi: Serum Institute of India on Tuesday said it is currently working to develop a vaccine for monkeypox, with positive outcomes expected in a year's time. The World Health Organisation on August 14 declared the Mpox outbreak a public health emergency of international concern. The move came after a sudden increase in cases was recorded in parts of Africa. In India, around 30 Mpox cases have been detected since 2022. The most recent case in the country was reported in March 2024. "In view of the global health emergency declared due to Mpox outbreak, Serum Institute of India is currently working on developing a vaccine for this disease to cater to millions of lives that might be at risk," Serum Institute of India CEO Adar Poonawalla said in a statement. Hopefully, with the ongoing progress, the Pune-based vaccine major will have more updates and positive news to share within a year's time, he added.

title: 라이즈 앤톤→원빈 성숙미 대폭발...소년에서 남자로 [화보]
content: 라이즈 앤톤→원빈 성숙미 대폭발...소년에서 남자로 [화보] 그룹 라이즈(RIIZE)가 패션 라이프스타일 매거진 에스콰이어의 표지를 장식했다. 미국의 웨스턴 컬처를 레퍼런스로 한 콘셉트를 소화한 이들은 부츠컷 팬츠, 자수로 꾸민 데님 재킷, 웨스턴 페도라 등을 룩으로 선보였다. 맏형인 멤버 쇼타로는 바쁜 스케줄 속 자신의 일상에 대해 말했다. 그는 “가끔 '주위엔 상냥하게 자신에겐 엄격하게'라는 좌우명을 떠올린다. 여전히 나에게 엄격한 편이지만 활동 끝날 때마다 스스로를 격려할 줄도 알게 됐다”고 밝혔다. 쇼타로는 최근 빠진 것에 대해 “필름 카메라로 사진을 찍는다. 해외에 가져가 멤버들을 찍기도 한다”고 전했으며, “영어가 늘었으면 좋겠어서 휴가가 생기면 짧은 유학을 하고 싶다. 잘 배워서 해외 팬분들과 자유롭게 소통하고 싶다”는 바람도 드러냈다. 멤버 은석은 팬과 그룹의 관계에 대한 자신의 견해를 밝혔다. 그는 “팬들과 라이즈는 서로가 서로에게 행복을 주면서 서로의 삶은 바꾸는 존재”라며 “서로 동기를 부여하고 서로의 덕으로 뭔가를 성취하는 이런 관계는 흔치 않다”고 말했다. 이어 그는 “데뷔 전까지는 연습만 해와서 잘 몰랐다”라며 “활동을 시작하고 나를 좋아해주는 팬들의 존재를 확인하고 만나고 나니 이 일에 대한 즐거움이 생겼다. 뭔가를 해나가고 있다는 실감, 시간이 지나면 우리의 노력이 쌓여서 뭔가가 될 것이라는 믿음이 생겼다”라고 말했다. 성찬은 대기실에서 가장 조용한 아이돌이라는 소문에 대해 밝혔다....

title: Leave symbols, statues as reminders
content: Replacing Columbus’ ships with the steelpan arguably would present for an emblem that is more nationally well-rounded. But does this mean that the other colonial elements, such as the helmet and ship’s wheel of the coat of arms, will also be replaced? We should not pick and choose the history we want represented. Let the colonial relics, statues, images and the like remain as a reminder of how far we have come since the days of imperialism and exploitation. Of similar import is the call to rename Piarco International Airport to Eric Williams International Airport. The name “Piarco” is an indigenous word. Trinidad’s airport is the last in the Caribbean, to my knowledge, that is indigenously named. Why are we willing to change the coat of arms from the ships that brought the slavers who tortured and killed our indigenous peoples (before the arrival of the Africans), but ready to change an indigenous name? Doesn’t Dr Williams already have the Eric Williams Financial Complex and the Eric Williams Medical Sciences Complex? Does he need an airport, too? Trent Ali Chaguanas

title: Why not rename QRC, Columbus Channel?
content: This is the usual trick from the PNM’s (People’s National Movement’s) playbook: to rally its supporters by stirring up colonial matters, thereby instigating racial tensions. Columbus is part of our history, and whether we like it or not, we have suffered, but we have also benefited from colonial rule. Columbus gave us the name Trinidad. Perhaps the Prime Minister should’ve considered renaming our country to “Eric Williams and Tobago”—the PNM loves Eric Williams. This is a waste of time, money and resources. Now we may have to do over all of our birth papers, passports, buildings, schoolbooks, all of the dollar bills; anywhere you could think the coat of arms is used, it will have to be redone. The money to do that isn’t coming out of the Prime Minister’s wallet—it will be from the taxpayers. So, why the announcement at a PNM convention? The PNM and the Government are not the same. This announcement should have been done at a Government news conference. This is very similar to when Eric Williams had his members in Parliament wear PNM-embroidered ties, slyly portraying the PNM as government. Was that recommended in the constitutional reform report? Did the committee that was set up to evaluate and report on the placement of statues, monuments and other historical signage and recognition in Trinidad and Tobago recommend this, or submit it at all since last year? No public consultation? No lateral decision-making? Any motion presented in Parliament? Rowley said so, so it goes? I...

title: દેશી દારૂ વેચવા અંગે પોલીસને જાણ કરતા'તા:અમરેલીમાં નારાયણનગરના આધેડ પર પાઇપ વડે હુમલો
content: અમરેલી શહેરના નારાયણનગરમાં રહેતા આધેડ પર નાના કણકોટના શખ્સે પાઇપ વડે હુમલો કર્યો હતો. મળતી વિગત મુજબ, અમરેલીમા નારાયણનગરમા રહેતા એક નિવૃત આધેડે દેશી દારૂ વેચવા અંગે પોલીસને જાણ કરતા નાના કણકોટના શખ્સે બોલાચાલી કરી પાઇપ વડે હુમલો કરી ઇજા પહોંચાડી ધમકી મુળ લીલીયાના નાના કણકોટ અને હાલ અમરેલીમા રહેતા વાડીયાભાઇ કાથડભાઇ ખુમાણ (ઉ.વ.57) નામના આધેડે દેશી દારૂ વેચવા અંગે પોલીસને જાણ કરતા પોલીસે નાના કણકોટમા રણજીત મંગળુભાઇ ખુમાણની દુકાને દરોડો પાડયો હોય તેનુ મનદુખ રાખી રણજીત ખુમાણે બોલાચાલી કરી હતી. આ શખ્સે લોખંડના પાઇપ વડે મારમારી ઇજા પહોંચાડી હતી તેમજ મારી નાખવાની ધમકી પણ આપી હતી.આ બનાવની વધુ આગળની ધોરણસરની તપાસ હેડ કોન્સ્ટેબલ એલ.એન.પઠાણ ચલાવી રહ્યાં છે.

title: Scotland clearly understood
content: I listened with rapt attention as Keith Scotland delivered the PNM’s (People’s National Movement’s) findings and proposals on constitutional reform at the PNM convention last Sunday, never failing to underscore the importance and value of this exercise. To my great satisfaction and that of my reluctant, sceptical 17-year-old grandson, unlike other undertakings of this nature, he spoke in a language which was like music to the layman’s ears, without taking away from the substance (substance being subjective, of course). To use one of his choice words, he was pellucidly clear in rationalising the proposals, aligning them with reality. For a constitution to be intentional, it must first be understood. I await the presentation of “We the People”. Kudos to the Honourable Minister. Ann Marie & Jeremiah Davidson San Fernando

title: Cam Davis dreams big at second FedEx Cup playoff event
creator: Darren Walton
content: After a hat-trick of frustrating near misses, Cam Davis has no plans on limping in to the PGA Tour's obscenely rich Tour Championship in Atlanta. Davis already only scraped in to this week's BMW Championship, the second round of the $US100 million ($A148 million) FedEx Cup playoff series in Colorado as the 49th of 50 qualifiers. The 29-year-old joins heavyweight fellow Australians Jason Day and Adam Scott in the scramble to make the elite 30-man field for East Lake, where the winner will pocket a cheque for $US18 million ($A26.7 million). Even last place in Atlanta will walk away with $US500,000 ($A740,000). To have any mathematical chance of progressing to the season's mega-money climax, Davis must finish at least tied for 10th this week. Realistically, he will need a much higher finish than that. And after being eliminated at the penultimate stage of the playoffs for the past three seasons, Davis is intent on taking matters into his own hands and simply winning the tournament rather than hoping for a series of scenarios having to fall his way. "That's probably the easiest scenario," he said on a Zoom call from the US on Wednesday. "I don't have an exact number. Probably top five, top three would be enough, but setting your sights a bit higher than that would be the best way to go about it. "I'm going to give everything I've got. I know there's not much to lose at this point. "The big thing for me was getting through last Sunday and now, yeah, just to be here in Colorado,...

title: Unicef le da una palmadita a AMLO: La pobreza infantil se redujo al 36.3% durante el sexenio
creator: Redacción
content: El Fondo de las Naciones Unidas para la Infancia ( ) dio el visto bueno al sexenio del presidente pues aseguró que el Gobierno ha hecho grandes esfuerzos para De acuerdo con el informe ‘Un Buen Sexenio para la Niñez’, , al pasar de 43.9 por ciento, en 2020, a 36.3 por ciento, en 2022. Además, entre la infancia y la adolescencia cayó de 52.6 por ciento a 45.8 por ciento en el mismo periodo. “Sin embargo, la pobreza continúa estando más arraigada en las niñas, niños y adolescentes (NNA) que en la población. Actualmente, hay aproximadamente 17 millones de NNA que viven en situación de pobreza y que presentan múltiples carencias sociales”, detalla el informe publicado este martes 20 de agosto. Pese a estos datos, el representante de la organización en México, Fernando Carrera, señaló retos pendientes en el país en materia de pobreza y bienestar infantil. “En México que por cáncer infantil”, declaró Carreras, quien denunció que todavía muchos niños fallecen por enfermedades prevenibles causadas por la También criticó la desigualdad existente al subrayar que México registra una renta per cápita equivalente a la del Reino Unido en la década de 1980 “y ningún niño moría de hambre allí en ese tiempo”, además de hacer énfasis en la falta de acceso a la educación. Durante el acto, se expuso la labor que ha realizado en el país en 2023, presentación que corrió a cargo de la responsable de protección infantil en México, Rocío Aznar. Destacó la...

title: Council Chairman Awards Bursary to over 400 Undergraduates in Rivers
creator: Blessing Ibunge
content: Blessing Ibunge in Port Harcourt The Chairman, Caretaker Committee of Ogu/Bolo Local Government Area, Evans Bipi, has awarded bursary to over 400 undergraduates of the local government in tertiary institutions across the country. The beneficiaries who are indigenes of the area, were drawn from over 16 universities, polytechnics, and colleges of health sciences. They constitute the first batch of the bursary scheme by the chairman. The gesture which is anchored on the policy of the caretaker chairman on education development, aims to promote academic excellence; ease the financial burden of tertiary education on parents and guardians; and reduce the rate of school dropouts by indigent students of Ogu/Bolo LGA. The disbursement of the bursary to the students is an intervention to salvage the effect of the current economic crunch in the country where school authorities are in dire straits to maintain the standard of education, while parents and guardians struggle financially to sustain the education of their children and wards in higher institutions. Bipi had in his inaugural speech, expressed commitment to the welfare of the student community, just as he has earlier promised robust youth development policy of empowering young people with education and skills development to enable them reach their full potential. Bipi said he considered bursary payment as a valuable investment in the future leaders of Ogu/Bolo LGA and a deliberate step towards securing the future of young...

title: સ્પર્ધામાં રાજ્યકક્ષાએ પસંદ:અમરેલીની વિદ્યાસભાનો ખેલાડી સ્કેટિંગ સ્પર્ધામાં રાજ્યકક્ષાએ પસંદ
content: અમરેલીની વિદ્યાસભાના ખેલાડી સ્કેટિંગ સ્પર્ધામાં રાજ્યકક્ષાએ પસંદગી પામ્યો હતો. અહીં જિલ્લાકક્ષાએ સ્કૂલ ગેમ ફેડરેશન ઓફ ઈન્ડિયા દ્વારા આયોજીત સ્પર્ધામાં સિદ્ધી મેળવી હતી. શાળાનું ગૌરવ વધાર્યું હતું. અમરેલીમાં અખિલ ભારતીય રમતાેત્સવમાં જિલ્લાકક્ષાએ સ્કૂલ ગેમ ફેડરેશન ઓફ ઈન્ડિયા દ્વારા યુ-11 સ્કેટિંગ સ્પર્ધાનું આયોજન કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું. એસ.એચ.ગેજરા સ્કૂલના ખેલાડીઓ સહિતના જુદી જુદી શાળાના ખેલાડીઓએ આ સ્પર્ધામાં ભાગ લીધો હતો. આ સ્કેટિંગ સ્પર્ધામાં શાંતાબેન હરિભાઈ ગજેરા સ્કૂલના વિશ્વ રાઠોડે યુ-11 સ્પર્ધામાં જિલ્લાકક્ષાએ સિદ્ધી મેળવી હતી. વિશ્વ રાઠોડ રાજ્યકક્ષાએ સ્કેટિંગ સ્પર્ધામાં પસંદ પામ્યો હતો. સંસ્થાના પ્રમુખ વસંતભાઈ ગજેરા, મંત્રી ચતુરભાઈ ખૂંટ, મનસુખભાઈ ધાનાણી અને ડાયરેકટર વસંતભાઈ પેથાણીએ વિદ્યાર્થીને બિરદાવ્યો હતો.

title: തിരുവനന്തപുരം ജില്ലയിൽ ഇന്ന് (21-08-2024); അറിയാൻ, ഓർക്കാൻ
City won’t challenge ruling on solar panels
content: Despite years of legal wrangling and appeals, the Santa Clarita City Council seems to have exhausted all its efforts to take down more than 6,000 solar panels on the hillside facing Soledad Canyon Road in Canyon Country, following Tuesday’s closed session meeting. After the brief 4:30 p.m. closed-door discussion behind Council Chambers prior to the council’s 5 p.m. public meeting, City Attorney Joe Montes reported there was no action taken. The City Council called the special meeting to discuss the lawsuit after a three-judge panel for the 2nd District in the Court of Appeal of the state of California found that 99.8% of the panels were not an abatable nuisance, which was the original ruling of the L.A. Superior Court Judge Steven Pfahler. He ruled that while the panels were an abatable nuisance, a legal principle known as estoppel applied, with the practical outcome being if the city wanted the property destroyed, it would have to compensate the owner, a cost estimated at about $5 million. Last week, the court reversed the nuisance finding, which also meant the city could only have 0.2% of the panels taken down. Kerry Seidenglanz, the property’s owner, said he planned to file a permit request to the city for the remaining 0.2% of the panels. When asked about the possibility of an appeal, Montes said he was not able to speak to any details of the discussion or any instructions from the City Council, only as to whether the discussion resulted in any action taken by the...

title: വാഹനമിടിച്ച് 2 പേർ മരിച്ച സംഭവം: പ്രതി 9 വർഷത്തിന് ശേഷം പിടിയിൽ
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: 정한용 “생후 6개월 첫 아이 떠나보내”... 가슴아픈 사연
장준, 유빈 품에? “대표님의 충실한 개 되겠다”(‘아이돌스토어’)
El Megaland MusicFest está de regreso: Wisin y Danny Ocean harán parte del gran show musical
content: El 30 de noviembre se llevará acabo este gran evento musical conocido por llevar a grandes artistas de diferentes géneros musicales. La edición de este año tiene la intención de continuar la tradición de un line-up con lo mejor del pop latino y la música urbana. Uno de los artistas imperdible es la gran leyenda de reguetón Wisin quien vuelve a los escenarios colombianos después de años. Junto a él estará Danny Ocean, quien vuelve con sus temas más recientes y sonados por todos sus fanáticos. Los otros artistas que ya han confirmado su asistencia es Lola Indigo, Farina, Emilia, Piso 21. Dentro de la programación también estarán de invitados Lasso, Juan Duque, Kapo, Esteban Rojas. Horarios de apertura al gran show musical El Megaland MusicFest ofrecerá la mejor vivencia musical y abrirá las puertas al público a las 11:00 a.m. en el Parque Simón Bolívar. Para adquirir la entrada al show musical estará disponible en TuBoleta.com , por un valor desde 70.000 pesos. Solo podrán asistir al evento mayores de 14 años de edad y quienes carguen su documento de identidad. Las personas que quieran asistir al evento podrán estar sintonizados con La Mega quien es una de las organizadoras del evento. Entradas VIP y General: La general tiene un valor de 70.000 pesos más el servicio que ofrece el festival, permitiendo a los asistentes a participar en cada acto musical durante la jornada. Quienes estén interesados el ingreso por la parte VIP el evento ofrecerá...

title: El GRAVE TEMOR del América con la lesión de Kevin Álvarez
content: América vuelve a la Liga MX con el duelo ante Puebla , pero el cuadro que dirige André Jardine no habría recibido las mejores noticias respecto a una de sus joyas en la defensiva, quien no disputó la Leagues Cup y amenaza con quedar fuera de los siguientes partidos de la Liga MX . Te puede interesar: Se burlan de Marchesín tras la eliminación el Gremio en la Copa Libertadores Tigres vs Chivas por Azteca 7 | jornada 5 del Apertura 2024 Club América podría sufrir más la ausencia de Kevin Álvarez , quien no ha logrado recuperarse de sus lesiones, el exjugador de Pachuca no ha logrado recuperarse de la pubalgia que lleva varios meses afectando su rendimiento en el equipo bicampeón. Kevin Álvarez fue operado hace seis meses por el mismo tema, sin embargo, su recuperación no ha sido como se esperaba, motivo por el que no jugó la Leagues Cup y se perdería, al menos, los siguientes partidos correspondientes en la Liga MX. De acuerdo a diversas fuentes, América no presionara al regreso de Álvarez ya que en Coapa estarían temiendo una recaída en la lesión del jugador de 25 años, por lo que su regreso al cuadro titular de los azulcremas sigue siendo una duda. La pubalgia, es conocida como la hernia del deportista y genera dolor en la zona del pubis, algo que sufrió Raúl Jiménez y que ahora aqueja a Kevin Álvarez. América regresa a la actividad en la Liga MX en el duelo de la Jornada 5 en donde Las Águilas enfrentarán al Puebla el próximo sábado 24 de...

title: અધિક જિલ્લા મેજીસ્ટ્રેટે જાહેરનામું પ્રસિદ્ધ કર્યું:અમરેલી જિલ્લામાં સભા સરઘસ અને હથિયારબંધી
content: અમરેલી જિલ્લામાં આગામી દિવસોમાં તહેવારોમાં કાયદો-વ્યવસ્થાની સ્થિતિ જાળવવા માટે અધિક જિલ્લા મેજીસ્ટ્રેટે 1 સપ્ટેમ્બર સુધી સભા-સરઘસ અને હથિયારબંધી માટે જાહેરનામું પ્રસિદ્ધ કર્યું હતું. જેમાં વિવિધ પ્રતિબંધાત્મક આદેશ કરવામાં આવ્યા હતા. અમરેલી જિલ્લામાં કાયદો, વ્યવસ્થાની સ્થિતિ જળવાઈ રહે તેવા હેતુથી પ્રતિબંધાત્મક આદેશ કરતું જાહેરનામું પ્રસિદ્ધ કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું. અમરેલી જિલ્લામાં શસ્ત્રો, દંડા, તલવાર, ભાલા, સોટા, બંદૂક, ચપ્પુ, લાકડી, લાઠી અને શારીરિક ઈજા પહોંચાડવામાં ઉપયોગ થઈ શકે તેવી વસ્તુઓ લઈ જવા પર મનાઈ ફરમાવવામાં આવી હતી. ઉપરાંત છટાદાર ભાષણ આપવા સહિતની કૃતિઓ પર પ્રતિબંધ ફરમાવ્યો હતો. ઉપરાંત જિલ્લામાં સંબંધિત સબ ડિવિઝનલ મેજિસ્ટ્રેટની પૂર્વ મંજૂરી કે પરવાનગી સિવાય કોઈ સભા મંડળી ભરવાની કે મંજુરી વગર લાઉડ સ્પીકર વગાડવા પર મનાઈ હુકમ કર્યો હતો. જાહેરનામાંનું ઉલ્લંઘન કરનાર સામે કાયદેસરની કાર્યવાહી કરવામાં આવશે.

title: തിരുവനന്തപുരം– കന്യാകുമാരി പാത ഇരട്ടിപ്പിക്കൽ: 575 കോടി കൂടി അനുവദിച്ചു; ഈ വർഷം ലഭിച്ചത് 940 കോടി

title: Democrats turn their roll call into a dance party with celebrities, state-specific songs and Lil Jon
creator: By JOSH BOAK - Associated Press
content: CHICAGO (AP) — Convention roll call votes can be staid and cheesy, but Democrats turned theirs into the ultimate dance party on Tuesday. DJ Cassidy stood onstage in what appeared to be a double-breasted satin suit of royal blue, spinning a special song for each state and territory awarding their delegates to Vice President Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention . What America got was a mashup of an elite karaoke night: Detroit native Eminem's “Lose Yourself” for Michigan and Dropkick Murphys' “I'm Shipping Up to Boston” for Massachusetts. title: Arizona Supreme Court clears way for voters to decide on constitutional right to abortion
creator: AP
content: PHOENIX (AP) — The Arizona Supreme Court ruled Tuesday that a 200-word summary that advocates used to collect signatures is valid, clearing the way for voters to decide on the constitutional right to an abortion. Under the measure, abortions would be allowed until an embryo or fetus could survive outside the womb, typically around 24 weeks. There are some exceptions for later-term abortions to save the mother’s life or to protect her physical or mental health. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: Pertinence Supports 1,000 Parents with N10m Back-to-school Aid
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: In a demonstration of its corporate social responsibility, Pertinence Group, through the Pertinence Foundation, has distributed back-to-school support worth N10 million to 1,000 parents, alleviating the financial burden of preparing their children for the new school session. During the 2024 Wealth Summit in Maryland, Lagos, the first 1,000 parents to attend the event received an armband that qualified them for various packages of back-to-school support. According to co-founders Sunday Olorunsheyi and Wisdom Ezekiel, the packages included school fees, school bags, stationery items, school uniforms, and shoes, all distributed in cash. In an interview after the summit, Ezekiel emphasised the foundation’s commitment to supporting parents during these challenging economic times. “Schools are currently on holiday, and our children will be returning to school from September, so we thought it good to support parents in their efforts,” he stated. “During these hard economic times, every bit of support that parents can get would go a long way. So we have distributed the N10,000,000 in the best way we could so that more people could benefit.” On his part, Olorunsheyi stated that the initiative was part of activities marking the company’s 12th anniversary. “This year marks 12 years of Pertinence Group’s journey, and we wanted to give back in a way that directly impacts families,” Olorunsheyi said. He disclosed that the foundation gave out N100,000 each to 10 parents, N50,000 each to 20...

title: Kamala Harris oficializa su candidatura presidencial: Obtiene respaldo de delegados de 50 estados
creator: EFE
content: Los delegados de los 50 estados de Estados Unidos dieron verbalmente su apoyo este martes a la durante la convención demócrata que se celebra esta semana en Chicago. En una votación amenizada con música y un espectáculo de luces, los representantes de cada estado , quien ya se había hecho con el puesto el pasado 7 de agosto tras la histórica renuncia del presidente Joe Biden a la candidatura del partido. La votación en la que normalmente fue atípica este martes 20 de agosto, ya que únicamente se votó por la de Kamala Harris; sin embargo, tuvo el respaldo de todos los estados del país.
