title: Malvern Prep football team returns strong cast from last fall’s Inter-Ac champions
creator: Bruce Adams
content: Malvern Prep comes into the 2024 football season with a strong returning cast from last year’s Inter-Ac champions. Leading the way among the key returnees is the 2023 Inter-Ac ‘s Most Valuable Player, senior Andrew Pellicciotta, who last fall ran for 656 yards in 63 carries, grabbed 20 passes for 261 yards, scored nine touchdowns and provided airtight defense at free safety. “Andrew is an elite playmaker on both sides of the ball,” said Malvern head coach Dave Gueriera, who guided the Friars to a 9-1 record last fall, with their only loss to PIAA 5A state champ Imhotep Charter. Malvern posted a 5-0 record in the Inter-Ac for their 36th league title (26th outright). The 5-foot-11, 190-pound Pellicciotta, who has committed to play football for the U.S. Naval Academy next fall, said, “Last year, we were in the hunt for an Inter-Ac championship, not having won it the year before that. ... We’ve been working hard all pre-season to stay on top, and we’re still hungry for more. We’re up for the challenge (of repeating).” Offensively, the Friars have good depth at running back with junior Zeke Bates (5-11, 195), who carried 83 times for 461 yards last fall, grabbed seven passes for 78 yards and scored eight touchdowns. “Zeke has a great combination of strength and speed, and has great vision,” said Gueriera. Malvern also has Chris Smith (5-9, 185), who ran 66 times for 274 yards last year. At quarterback, the Friars feature two players — senior Skyler Smith (6-1, 190), who completed...

title: Grrr OTT: మద్యం మత్తులో సింహం బోనులోకి.. ఆ తర్వాత ఏమైందంటే? ఓటీటీలోకి వచ్చేసిన సూపర్ హిట్ మూవీ.. ఎందులోనంటే?
creator: Basha Shek
content: ఓటీటీలో మలయాళ చిత్రాలకు ఉండే క్రేజ్ వేరు. ఈ మాలీవుడ్ నుంచి వచ్చే సినిమాలపై చాలా మంది ఆసక్తి చూపిస్తుంటారు. రియాలిటీకి దగ్గరగా ఉండడం, కొత్త రకమైన కాన్సెప్ట్‌, సరికొత్త టేకింగ్‌తో తెరకెక్కే మలయాళ సినిమాలంటే ఇప్పుడు అన్ని భాషల వారు ఇష్టపడుతున్నారు. అందుకు తగ్గట్టుగానే పలు ఓటీటీ సంస్థలు కూడా మలయాళంలోని సూపర్ హిట్ సినిమాలను ఆయా భాషల్లోకి అనువాదం చేసి స్ట్రీమింగ్ కు తీసుకొస్తున్నాయి. తాజాగా అలాంటి ఒక సూపర్ హిట్ సినిమానే డిజిటల్ స్ట్రీమింగ్ కు వచ్చేసింది. అదే మలయాళం వెర్సటైల్ యాక్టర్లు కుంచకో బోబన్‌, సూరజ్‌ వెంజరమూడు ప్రధాన పాత్రల్లో నటించిన ‘గర్ర్‌’. సింహగర్జన శబ్దమే టైటిల్‍గా పెట్టిన ఈ సర్వైవల్ కామెడీ మూవీ జూన్ 14న మలయాళంలో విడుదలై మంచి విజయాన్నిసాధించింది. మాలీవుడ్ బాక్సాఫీస్ వద్ద ఓ మోస్తరు వసూళ్లు రాబట్టింది. ఇప్పుడీ సూపర్ హిట్ సినిమా ఓటీటీలోకి వచ్చేసింది. ‘గర్ర్‌’ సినిమా డిజిటల్ స్ట్రీమింగ్ హక్కులను ప్రముఖ ఓటీటీ ప్లాట్ ఫామ్ డిస్నీ ప్లస్ హాట్ స్టార్ సొంతం చేసుకుంది. ఈ నేపథ్యంలో ఆగస్టు 20న ఈ మూవీని స్ట్రీమింగ్‌కు తీసుకొస్తున్నట్లు ఇదివరకే అధికారికంగా ప్రకటించింది. అందుకు తగ్గట్టుగానే మంగళవారం అర్ధరాత్రి నుంచే ఈ సూపర్ హిట్ కామెడీ ఎంటర్ టైనర్ స్ట్రీమింగ్ కు వచ్చింది. మలయాళంతో పాటు తెలుగు, తమిళ, కన్నడ భాషల్లోనూ గర్ర్ సినిమా స్ట్రీమింగ్ అవుతోంది. ఈ గర్ర్ సినిమాకు జై కే దర్శకత్వం వహించారు. ఈ మూవీలో సూరజ్ వెంజరమూడ్, కుంచాకో బోబన్‌తోపాటు శృతి రామచంద్రన్, అనఘ, రాజేష్ మాధవన్, మంజు పిళ్లై, శోభి తిలకన్, సెంథిల్ కృష్ణ తదితరులు ప్రధాన పాత్రల్లో నటించారు. ఆగస్టు సినిమా బ్యానర్‌పై షాజీ నదేశన్, ఆర్య కలిసి నిర్మించిన ఈ సినిమాకు డాన్ విన్సెంట్, కాళిదాస్ మీనన్, టోనీ టార్జ్ స్వరాలు...

title: 제니퍼 로페즈, 벤 애플렉에 이혼 소송..'20년만 재결합' 러브스토리 끝 [Oh!llywood]
Man accused of sexually assaulting child at knifepoint
creator: Peter Bodkin
content: A man has been accused of taking a child he accosted at a local train station to a park before sexually assaulting them at knifepoint. The 33-year-old is due to face court on Wednesday after being arrested on a street in Mt Druitt, in Sydney's west, the previous afternoon. Police allege he approached a youth at the local train station early on Thursday morning and took them to a nearby park before threatening them with a knife. The man then allegedly sexually assaulted the victim before leaving the scene in a white van. He was subsequently charged with aggravated sexual intercourse with a child aged between 10 and 14 and intentionally sexually touching a child. The man was refused bail to appear in Mt Druitt Local Court. Sex Crimes Squad commander Jayne Doherty urged the public to look out for children in their communities and report anyone acting suspiciously. "If you're a victim of sexual violence please reach out to police or support services," she said. "You will be supported during this difficult time." 1800 RESPECT (1800 737 732) National Sexual Abuse and Redress Support Service 1800 211 028

title: Celebration of Excellence as Starfield College Graduates 84
creator: Uchechukwu Nnaike
content: Uchechukwu Nnaike The 23rd valedictory service for the 2024 graduating class of Starfield College, Lagos, was more of a celebration of the graduands’ outstanding performance in internal and external examinations. The school honoured graduands who made seven and eight As in the West African Senior School Certificate Examination (WASSCE) and those who scored 293 and above in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME). Miss Temidayo Brielle Tinuoye was also the valedictorian with the highest score of 313 in UTME. She attributed her performance to the dedication, care and support of the management and staff, saying that the school’s mentorship programme is a refreshing addition that helps boost students’ confidence. Tinuoye said she plans to study medicine and surgery at the University of Lagos and will start studying for the post-UTME screening. She hopes to be admitted later this year. The school’s principal, Mrs. Sara Oyinloye, who applauded the students’ outstanding performance, said the school recorded a 100 per cent pass in WASSCE. She added that they are getting scholarship opportunities from several universities around the world. She thanked parents for entrusting the school with their children’s education and for their support and partnership. According to her, the school supported the students beyond academics through its mentorship moral and character-building programme. She appealed to parents to encourage them not to deviate from the norm, as education...

title: Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi 'misses' the years when her son needed her the most
creator: BANG - Entertainment News
content: Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi "misses" the years when her son needed her the most. The 35-year-old reality star - who is best known for being a cast member of the MTV reality show 'Jersey Shore' - has Lorenzo, 11, Giovanna and five-year-old Angelo with her husband Jionni LaValle and has noticed that her eldest "definitely doesn't need Mommy anymore" now that he is growing up. She told People: "He definitely doesn't want Mommy anymore. I miss him being like cuddly and like always like wanting Mommy. "There's still moments where he'll hug me or whatever, but he's definitely growing into himself and starting to like girls and stuff like that. It makes me upset, but at the same time, I'm so proud of him and seeing him grow and excel in sports and everything. But I definitely do miss Lorenzo being four years old and wanting me." The MTV star also noted that it is "crazy" in her house trying to get her brood through the summer holidays and is looking forward to back-to-school season so she can enjoy some time to herself as she admitted she has to be "careful" with her cleaning duties when they are at home. She said: "It's a little crazy getting everybody together, I am excited for them to get back to school, so that I have the time to go get my nails done and have some mommy time. "It's always so crazy in my house. I'm careful with what I use in the house, especially with cleaning stuff. I love Green Gobbler because of the bleach and odor-free products. It's perfect to use around my...

title: Africa’s talent pool: Ready to power the global economy
creator: Eyitayo Ogunmola and Babajide Aregbesola Kehinde
content: Over the past decade, I have had the privilege of developing over 110,000 African talents, and what I have seen is nothing short of remarkable. Africa is on the cusp of a major transformation, and its talent pool is not just ready, but perfectly positioned to power the global economy. As international investors look to tap into new markets and access a dynamic, skilled workforce, Africa presents an unparalleled opportunity. The most fascinating subject about the African pool of talents is that despite this growing interest, only a fraction of the continent’s talent has been fully harnessed on a global scale. One can only imagine the gravity of positive impacts a larger base would make. A thriving middle class: The backbone of talent It is highly imperative to understand how crucial the existence of the middle class is to the social and economic stability of any society. With ample research and observations, it is safe to say that they have a significant level of influence in spheres ranging from economic growth and social stability to political influence, innovation and entrepreneurship, education and skill’s development, to name a few. Without the middle class, the cycle of growth, innovation, and progress would slow down, affecting the overall development of societies around the globe. Africa’s middle class has experienced explosive growth over the last 30 years, tripling to over 313 million people, accounting for more than 34 percent of the continent’s population. This...

title: BERBA GROŽĐA ZBOG SUŠE POČELA RANIJE: Tomići na Kablaru imaju velićanstvene vinograde (FOTO)
content: ČAČAK - Zbog tropskog leta i sušnog perioda , u pojedinim delovima Srbije ranije je počels berba grožđa , pa tako i u kablarskom selu Rošci kod porodice Tomić koji se odmah nakon Preobraženja Gospodnjeg pripremaju za ovogodišnju berbu vinskih sorti tog voća. Prema prvim utiscima iz vinograda prinos i kvalitet ovogodšnjeg roda grožđa je zadovoljavajuć. - Imajući u vidu da nam je ova godina donela dosta izazova, najpre smo imali blagu zimu sa malo padavina, pa nam je vegetacija rano krenula, a u poslednje vreme sušan period i veoma toplo vreme, možemo reći da na osnovu parametara koje pratimo u ovom momentu kvalitet grožđa je zadovoljavajuć”, rekao je za RINU Vladimir Tomić. On je istakao da je sve spremno za berbu, u jednom od vinograda uzgajaju dve autohtone vinske sorte grožđa, jedna je Tamjanika, a druga Prokupac. - Odlučili smo se da nastavimo tradiciju i da čuvano naše autohtone sorte. Grožđe je trenutno dobrog kvaliteta, kiša bi mogla samo da nam odloži trenutak berbe, ali bi za vinovu lozu veoma značilo”, rekao je Vladimir. Ovaj vinogradar je istakao da kada je u pitanju krajnji proizvod, on i brat sa svojim porodicama uradiće sve što je potrebno u vinogradu, dok će enolozi sve što je do njih da se dobije proizvod koji će biti vrhunskog kvaliteta. - Za sada proizvodimo četiri vrste vina Prokupac, Tamjanika, Šardone i Pino noar. Naziv Tamjanike smo stavili „Igra 650”, zato što smo porodično posmatrali kao igru, a 650 je naddmorska...

title: TACKLING VANDALISM IN THE POWER SECTOR
creator: Adeyinka Salami
content: It’s in our enlightened self-interest to expose the criminals Critical stakeholders in the power sector have lately been worried about the activities of vandals. The latest victims are many residents of Bayelsa State who have been without electricity supply for several weeks after vandals destroyed 13 towers on the Ahoada-Yenagoa 132kV Double Circuit transmission line on 29 July. The state Commissioner for Information, Orientation and Strategy, Ebiuwou Koku-Obiyai, said it was an “attack on the social and economic well-being of the residents of the state and a sabotage on government’s investment drive”. Described by the Transmission Company of Nigeria (TCN) Managing Director, Sule Abdulaziz, as a “national disaster”, those who vandalised the towers, according to Koku-Obiyai, did it deliberately to “make life difficult” for the residents. But the problem is not restricted to Bayelsa State, it is national. So endemic is the incidence of vandalism of electricity equipment that except drastic action is taken to contain the menace, it may cripple the power sector in the country. The Enugu Electricity Distribution Company (EEDC) reported recently that no fewer than 170 incidents of electrical installation vandalism occurred within two years in the South-east. According to the company, about 135 of the suspected vandals were arrested and handed over to the police at different stations, out of which over 100 had been charged to court from January 2022 till date. Following a recent...

title: સત્તાધારમાં ધર્મસભા યોજાશે:સાવરકુંડલાથી સત્તાધાર સુધીની અલખયાત્રા 5મી સપ્ટેમ્બરે યોજાશે
content: દરવર્ષે યોજાતી અનોખી યાત્રા. ધર્મજાગરણ સમન્વય સૌરાષ્ટ્ર વિભાગ દ્વારા સાવરકુંડલાથી સતાધાર સુધીની અલખ યાત્રા વાહન યાત્રાનું ભવ્ય આયોજન આગામી તારીખ 5ને ગુરૂવારે કરવામાં આવ્યુ છે. સતાધાર આપાગીગાની જગ્યાના મહંત પૂજય વિજયબાપુ તેમજ વિવિધ જગ્યાઓના અન્ય સંતો સાવરકુંડલાથી પ્રસ્થાન થઈને નેસડી, ઈગોરાળા, કમી, કેરાળા, ચલાલા, મીઠાપુર, ડુંગરી, ઝર, મોઝર, છતડીયા, ધારી, પ્રેમપરા, માલસીકા, વેકરીયા, લાલપુર, જેતલવડ, ખીસરી, કાલસારી, વિસાવદર, જીવાપર થઈને સતાધાર બપોરે ચાર કલાકે પહોંચશે. જેમાં સાવરકુંડલા ઉપરાંત રસ્તામાં આવતા 21 ગામોનાં યુવાનો તથા ધર્મપ્રેમી લોકો પોતાના વાહનો લઈને આ અલખયાત્રામાં જોડાશે. આપાગીગાની જગ્યાના વિશાળ પટાંગણમાં એક દિવ્ય ધર્મ સભાનું આયોજન થશે. જેમાં પૂ. વિજયબાપુ ઉપરાંત 100 કરતા વધુ સંતો મહંતો સાધુ ભારતીય સંસ્કૃતિ અને પરંપરા તથા રાષ્ટ્રની એકતા અને વિકાસ માટે પ્રેરક આશીર્વચન આપશે. પૂજ્ય આપાગીગાની ગુરૂગાદી ચલાલા પ.પૂ. દાનબાપુની જગ્યામાં મહંત વલકુબાપુના આશિષ લઈને યાત્રા આગળ વધશે. આ વિશાળ વાહન યાત્રાના રૂટ ઉપર ઠેર ઠેર પીવાનું પાણી, ચા, શરબત, નાસ્તો તેમજ ભોજન પ્રસાદની વ્યવસ્થા કરવામાં આવશે. યાત્રાને સફળ બનાવવા ધર્મ જાગરણ સમન્વય સૌરાષ્ટ્ર પ્રાંતના સંયોજક ભીખુભાઈ અગ્રાવત, યાત્રા સંયોજકો, અગ્રણીઓ, કાર્યકર્તાઓ તેમજ રમેશભાઈ ગોહિલ, રસિકભાઈ વેકરિયા, સલીમભાઈ રાઠોડ, ભીમભાઈ લાડવા, ધર્મેન્દ્રભાઈ ચૌહાણ, ભીખાભાઈ કાબરીયા સહિતની સમગ્ર ટીમ સાથે જહેમત ઉઠાવી રહ્યા છે.

title: Em reunião, troca de farpas e piadas
content: Segundo um dos participantes, a reunião começou tensa e foi aos poucos se suavizando. Foram cerca de três horas de encontro entre as cúpulas do Senado e Câmara dos Deputados, ministros do governo — o chefe da Casa Civil, Rui Costa, e o advogado Geral da União, Jorge Messias — e os 11 integrantes do STF. Um dos participantes contou que houve momentos áridos, como uma troca de farpas entre o presidente da Câmara, , e o chefe da Casa Civil. Rui Costa reclamou de como as emendas cresceram de valor de um ano para o outro e como elas tomam o espaço livre dos recursos, para os chamados gastos discricionários do governo. Três poderes chegam a acordo e mantêm as Emendas Pix Lira, em troca, disse que o governo precisava explicar como ministros mandavam grande parte do recurso dos seus ministérios para seus estados de origem. Além disso, Lira também citou que há falta de transparência do Executivo na decisão de quais projetos são prioritários. Mesmo com as falas ríspidas, o clima foi cordial, segundo outros integrantes. Um ministro do STF disse que houve algumas “alfinetadas”, mas que o importante foi o resultado, que afastou o aprofundamento de uma crise institucional. Antes da reunião, Lira se encontrou com quatro deputados próximos, com membros da oposição e com dois candidatos à sua sucessão. Do encontro, onde se concluiu que o fim das emendas PIX era inaceitável, mas que algo precisava ser entregue como forma de boa vontade da Casa, saiu a ideia do fim...

title: Mumbai: Congress Leaders, Led By Mallikarjun Kharge, Criticise PM Modi On Rajiv Gandhi's Birth Anniversary; Urge Revival Of MVA Government (VIDEO)
content: Mumbai: On the occasion of Rajiv Gandhi’s birth anniversary, Congress leaders launched a strong critique against Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his government at a "Sadhbhavna Day" and resolution meeting held at Shanmukhanand Hall. Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge accused Modi of arrogance, stating that while Rajiv Gandhi led Congress to a historic 415-seat victory without any arrogance, Modi’s government, despite its promises of securing over 400 seats, remains a minority administration. राजीव गांधींच्या काळात लाखो मुलांना BCG, TB, OPV ( पोलियो ), DPT लसींनी संरक्षित केले होते. पण नरेंद्र मोदींनी जसा फोटो लावला होता तसा त्यांनी लसीच्या प्रमाणपत्रावर कधीही आपला फोटो लावला नाही. : काँग्रेस अध्यक्ष श्री @kharge जी 📍मुंबई #Mumbai pic.twitter.com/K89Y3Mb8bR Kharge claimed that Modi is more interested in consolidating power than working for the country's welfare, and noted that Maharashtra’s rejection of Modi’s agenda in the Lok Sabha elections highlighted this issue. He urged for unity in the upcoming Assembly elections to restore the Mahavikas Aghadi (MVA) government and criticized Modi for focusing on self-promotion rather than substantive issues. Sharad Pawar, President of the Nationalist Congress Party (NCP), emphasized Rajiv Gandhi’s significant role in the country’s development and criticized current leaders for not acknowledging the contributions of the Nehru-Gandhi family. Pawar defended Gandhi’s efforts to modernize India and stated that the family’s...

title: [단독] ‘23억 자산’ 김경진 “부동산보다 2세 먼저..이혼 예능 정중히 고사” (직격인터뷰)
Jennifer Lopez files for divorce from Ben Affleck after 2 years of marriage
content: Jennifer Lopez has filed for divorce from Ben Affleck following months of speculation that the couple’s marriage was on the brink of coming to an end. The superstar singer and actress filed the papers on Tuesday (Aug 20) herself in LA County Superior Court, without an attorney, TMZ reported. The filing comes on the two-year anniversary of a large reception the two held in Georgia, United States, after tying the knot in Las Vegas on July 16, 2022. The two were previously engaged in the early 2000s before calling off that wedding. They reunited in 2021 and wed the following year. According to court documents obtained by multiple outlets, the divorce filing lists the date of separation as April 26, 2024, despite insiders in May claiming the pair were not planning to go their separate ways. The couple reportedly did not have a prenup agreement in place, meaning any earnings they’ve made from acting, producing or other ventures during the course of their marriage would be considered community property. The two have reportedly been attempting to hash out a settlement for several months via their respective business managers. According to the documents, Lopez has waived spousal support and is asking the judge to deny Affleck spousal support as well. Their marital home in Beverly Hills is currently up for sale, while Affleck has already bought a new home in the Pacific Palisades – which closed escrow on J.Lo’s 55th birthday. He officially moved out of their shared home in late June....

title: EUA pressionam Hamas para que aceite proposta de trégua em Gaza
content: Blinken, que chegou na terça-feira (20) ao Catar após sua passagem por Israel e Egito, assegurou aos jornalistas, antes de deixar o aeroporto de Doha, que o tempo "urge" para alcançar um cessar-fogo. Segundo ele, os Estados Unidos se opõem a uma ocupação israelense "a longo prazo" de Gaza. O Exército israelense anunciou nesta terça qu , durante o que desencadeou a guerra. Nas últimas semanas, Israel e Hamas se acusaram mutuamente de bloquear um acordo por um cessar-fogo e pela troca de reféns por palestinos presos em Israel, o que poria fim a uma guerra que já deixou milhares de mortos no território palestino. Blinken, que concluiu sua nona viagem ao Oriente Médio desde o início do conflito, reuniu-se em Doha com o ministro de Estado do Catar, Mohammed bin Abdelaziz al-Kulaifi. No entanto, não se encontrou com o emir Tamim Bin Hamad al Thani, como estava previsto. Antes, Blinken se encontrou na cidade egípcia de El Alamein com o presidente egípcio, Abdel Fatah al Sisi, que defendeu um "cessar-fogo em Gaza". O secretário de Estado americano avaliou na segunda-feira (19), depois de reuniões em Israel, que esta poderia ser "talvez a última oportunidade de trazer os reféns de volta para casa" e "obter um cessar-fogo". Segundo Blinken, o primeiro-ministro israelense, Benjamin Netanyahu, confirmou a ele que seu governo . title: Blinken ends latest Mideast visit without a cease-fire, warning 'time is of the essence'
creator: By JULIA FRANKEL and MATTHEW LEE - Associated Press
content: JERUSALEM (AP) — U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken ended his ninth visit to the Middle East since the war in Gaza began without securing any major breakthrough for a cease-fire deal, warning on Tuesday that “time is of the essence” even as Hamas and Israel signaled that challenges remain. After meetings in fellow mediating countries Egypt and Qatar, Blinken said that because Israel has accepted a proposal to bridge gaps with the militant group, the focus turns to doing everything possible to “get Hamas on board” and ensure both sides agree to key details on implementation. title: શખ્સે યુવકની માતાને પણ માર માર્યો:ઉછીના પૈસા ન આપતા યુવક પર પાઇપ વડે હુમલો
content: રાજુલા તાલુકાના મોટા આગરીયામા રહેતા એક યુવકે ઉછીના પૈસા ન આપતા અહી જ રહેતા એક શખ્સે પાઇપ વડે મારમારી ઇજા પહોંચાડતા આ બારામા તેની સામે રાજુલા પોલીસ મથકમા ફરિયાદ નોંધાવાઇ છે. આ અંગેની પોલીસમાંથી પ્રાપ્ત વિગત મુજબ, રેખાબેન પોપટભાઇ સોલંકી (ઉ.વ.45) નામના મહિલાએ રાજુલા પોલીસ મથકમા નોંધાવેલી ફરિયાદમા જણાવ્યું હતુ કે ગઇકાલે બપોરના એકાદ વાગ્યે તેનો દીકરો દિનેશ ખેતીકામ માટે સનેડો વાહન લેવા માટે વાડીએ ગયો હતો ત્યારે રસ્તામા રજની જાદવભાઇ સાંખટ નામના શખ્સે તેની પાસે ઉછીના રૂપિયા 500 માંગ્યા હતા. જો કે દિનેશે તેને ના પાડી હતી. બાદમા રજની તેના ઘરે ધસી આવ્યો હતો અને પાઇપ વડે દિનેશને મારમારી ઇજા પહોંચાડી હતી. આ શખ્સે દિનેશની માતાને પણ પાઇપ વડે ઇજા પહોંચાડી હતી. આ બનાવની વધુ આગળાની ધોરણસરની તપાસ પીઆઇ આઇ.જે.ગીડા ચલાવી રહ્યાં છે.

title: A distinguished partnership delivering exceptional education
content: For those looking to enhance their knowledge, skills and career prospects in business, Kaplan Higher Education Academy and Aston University in Birmingham have teamed up to offer postgraduate programmes that blend academic excellence with real-world relevance. Dr Sam Choon Yin, dean of Academic Partnerships at Kaplan Higher Education Academy , said that Aston University was chosen as a partner for its innovative teaching methods, focus on employability and commitment to quality education. Aston Business School’s Triple-Crown accreditation speaks volumes about its standards. Globally, only 1 per cent of business schools hold Triple-Crown accreditation from the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business , the Association of MBAs and the European Quality Improvement System . In addition, Aston University is ranked 66th for Business and Management Studies in the QS World University Rankings by Subject 2024 . Besides its consistent high rankings in university league tables, Aston University offers a wide range of master’s degree programmes tailored to industry needs, shared Dr Sam. “The programmes equip students with the knowledge and skills required to excel in today’s competitive job market,” he said. At Kaplan Higher Education Academy, Aston University offers part-time master’s degree programmes in digital marketing and strategy, strategic business analytics and strategic supply chain management, and a Doctor of Business Administration (DBA) programme. “Aston...

title: México dejó en el terreno a Cuba en la Serie Mundial de Pequeñas Ligas
content: El equipo de México consiguió este martes una emocionante victoria que le permite mantenerse con vida en la Serie Mundial de Pequeñas Ligas 2024 después de dejar en el terreno a Cuba con pizarra de 6 carreras por 4 gracias a una espectacular remontada que completaron en el sexto episodio. Con un par de cuadrangulares en el cierre del partido el equipo de las Ligas Pequeñas de Matamoros logró darle vuelta al encuentro que la novena antillana dominaba producto de sus anotaciones en las primeras entradas del duelo disputado este martes en Williamsport, Pennsylvania. La reacción mexicana comenzó en el quinto episodio con la primera rayita para los aztecas que de esta manera dejaron la mesa servida para su épica reacción en un cierre del partido que estuvo lleno de emociones para el equipo de Matamoros. 😱 LOCURA TOTAL EN #LLWSxESPN 😱 🇲🇽🔥 ¡QUÉ REGRESO DE LA NOVENA MÉXICANA! 🇲🇽🔥 😎 Ulises Ortíz se convirtió en el héroe tricolor y conectó un cuadrangular para dejar tendidos a Cuba Mañana enfrentarán a Venezuela pic.twitter.com/1CRU4JJWv3 Primero fue el turno para Antonio Guerrero, una de las principales figuras del equipo azteca, quien despachó un cuadrangular de tres carreras entre el jardín izquierdo y el central manteniendo la esperanza de la remontada mexicana que buscaba seguir con vida en el campeonato. Pero el clímax del encuentro llegó cuando habían dos outs en la pizarra con un corredor mexicano en circulación y le llegó el turno a Ulises Ortíz. El...

title: 울산 임직원, 혹서기 취약계층 지원 물품 포장 봉사활동 진행
Stree 2 Box Office Collection Day 6: स्त्री 2 का जादू, 6 दिनों में 250 करोड़ क्लब में एंट्री, जानें फिल्म का डे वाइज कलेक्शन
creator: एबीपी एंटरटेनमेंट डेस्क
content: Stree 2 Box Office Collection Day 6: श्रद्धा कपूर और राजकुमार राव की फिल्म स्त्री 2 ने एक हफ्ते में ही कई रिकॉर्ड बना डाले. फिल्म को लेकर फैंस में जबरदस्त क्रेज है. पहले दिन मूवी ने 51.8 करोड़ की कमाई की थी. आइए जानते हैं फिल्म ने अब तक टोटल कितनी कमाई की है. Sacnilk की रिपोर्ट के मुताबिक, स्त्री 2 ने 6th डे 25 करोड़ का नेट कलेक्शन किया है. ये फिल्म का अबतक का सबसे कम कलेक्शन हैं. कमाई में 31.84 प्रतिशत की गिरावट देखने को मिली है. हालांकि, इसी के साथ फिल्म के लिए एक गुड न्यूज भी है. स्त्री 2 ने 250 करोड़ क्लब में एंट्री कर ली है. बता दें कि 6th डे के अभी तक ऑफिशियल आंकड़े सामने नहीं आए हैं. मगर फिल्म 25 करोड़ कमाती है तो इसका टोटल कलेक्शन 254.55 करोड़ हो गया है. स्त्री 2 का डे वाइज कलेक्शन मूवी ने प्रीव्यू और ओपनिंग डे को मिलाकर टोटल 60.3 करोड़ का नेट कलेक्शन किया था. दूसरे दिन फिल्म ने 31.4 करोड़, तीसरे दिन 43.85 करोड़, चौथे दिन 55.9 करोड़, पांचवे दिन 38.1 करोड़ का नेट कलेक्शन किया था. View this post on Instagram A post shared by RajKummar Rao (@rajkummar_rao) इस फिल्म को अमर कौशिक ने बनाया है. मूवी में श्रद्धा कपूर, राजकुमार राव, पंकज त्रिपाठी, अपारशक्ति खुराना, अभिषेक बनर्जी जैसे स्टार्स हैं. ये 2018 में आई फिल्म का सीक्वल है. स्त्री को भी फैंस ने काफी पसंद किया था और अब स्त्री 2 पर तो जमकर प्यार लुटा रहे हैं. इन फिल्मों के साथ है स्त्री 2 का क्लैश बता दें कि स्त्री 2 का अक्षय कुमार की खेल खेल में और जॉन अब्राहम की वेदा के साथ क्लैश था. लेकिन स्त्री 2 ने दोनों ही फिल्मों को पीछे छोड़ते हुए रिकॉर्ड तोड़ कमाई की है. अक्षय कुमार की खेल खेल में को खराब रिस्पॉन्स मिला. वहीं...

title: 保瑞正式完成美國無菌針劑廠併購案
content: 保瑞 (6472)21日宣布,已順利完成向美國公司Emergent BioSolutions收購旗下子公司位於馬里蘭康登鎮(Camden, Maryland)的無菌針劑製造廠區。本次收購不僅使得保瑞集團在已經擁有生產 生技 藥品無菌製劑原料藥的能力下,進一步取得無菌針劑藥品成品生產的製造能力,更為旗下持續深根大分子代工服務業務的保瑞生技增添競爭利基,後續可運用該針劑廠產能,協助客戶進行生技藥品開發及商業化產品量產應用。 此座新加入的廠區約87,000平方英尺,共有4條無菌針劑產線,可支援實驗試製及商業量產所需之冷凍乾燥、玻璃瓶(Vials)充填與預填充注射器充填等各式技術製程與代工服務。 保瑞集團董事長盛保熙表示,繼上一季順利完成交接美國百年藥廠USL後,這次收購的Camden廠區進一步強化了保瑞在北美的業務能力,並大幅地提升了保瑞為生物製劑客戶所能提供的產品範圍與服務技術。盛保熙強調,非常期待能與新加入的團隊攜手合作,持續強化該廠區特殊的製程技術,以保瑞集團引以為傲的服務品質,支持現有客戶的專案進度,並且同步開發更多新客戶需求;再次歡迎Camden廠區的全體團隊加入保瑞的全球大家庭。 保瑞集團於2024年4月完成收購明尼蘇達州最大藥廠Upsher-Smith Laboratories,取得其在明尼蘇達州當地兩座工廠,增加口服固體劑型的產能。而完成此一針劑廠區的收購後,保瑞集團在全球擁有十座經多個先進國家藥監機構查核通過的製造廠區,不僅能為全球客戶提供各種劑型與藥物釋放技術,更能全力搶攻持續成長的全球代工業務需求,為集團旗下CDMO業務創造更多價值。

title: મોટી સંખ્યામાં ખેડૂતો જોડાયા:આત્મા પ્રોજેક્ટ|પરંપરાગત કૃષિ છોડી ગૌ આધારિત પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિ અપનાવો
content: બગસરાના નાના મુંજીયાસરમાં ફિલ્ડ ડે કાર્યક્રમ અંતર્ગત આત્મા પ્રોજેક્ટ દ્વારા ખેડૂતોને ગૌ આધારિત પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિ વિશે સમજણ માટે તાલીમ આપવામાં આવી હતી. અમરેલી જિલ્લાના ખેડૂતો પરંપરાગત કૃષિ છોડીને ગૌ આધારિત પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિ તરફ અપનાવી રહ્યા છે. ફિલ્ડ ડે કાર્યકમ અંતર્ગત આત્મા પ્રોજેક્ટ દ્વારા બગસરાના નાના મુંજીયાસરમાં ખેડૂતોની તાલીમ યોજાઈ હતી. ખેડૂતોને ગૌ આધારિત પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિ વિશેની વિગતો આપવામાં આવી હતી. તાલીમમાં ખેડૂતો જોડાયા હતા. અહીં ખેડૂતોને પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિનું મહત્વ, તેની જરૂરિયાત અને વિવિધ પાકોના વાવેતર અંગે માર્ગદર્શન આપવામાં આવ્યું હતું. સાથે પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિમાં ગાયના મહત્વ અને જીવામૃતનું માર્ગદર્શન પણ આપવામાં આવ્યું હતુ. અમરેલી જિલ્લામાં પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિનો વ્યાપ વધે તે માટે ખેડૂતો માટે નાના મુંજીયાસરમાં તાલીમનું આયોજન કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું. જેમાં આસપાસના વિસ્તારમાંથી ખેડૂતો ઉપસ્થિત રહ્યા હતા અને ગૌ આધારિત થતી પ્રાકૃતિક કૃષિ અંગે માહિતી મેળવી હતી.

title: Doctor accused of slapping nurse
content: A doctor at Mae Lao district hospital in Chiang Rai province has been accused of assaulting a nurse, leading to other staff wearing black in protest. Caretaker Public Health Minister Somsak Thepsutin on Tuesday ordered the accused doctor transferred to Chiang Rai Hospital and the setting up of a panel to consider punishment . He set a three-month deadline for the probe. The move followed the posting of hospital security camera footage on social media on Monday. It showed a doctor, whose name has not been released, standing behind a nurse working at a computer and slapping her twice on the back. The incident happened about 10pm on Saturday, while other employees were also in the room. Nurses and other staff at the hospital in Mae Lao district wore black on Monday in a protest aimed at the doctor. Mae Lao hospital's director on Monday acknowledged the incident, while saying the hospital was against all forms of violence . The accused doctor was now on leave and had been ordered to submit a report on his actions upon his return to work, the director said. He said the nurse had been shocked by the two slaps and remained stressed as a result of the incident.

title: Anna Kendrick thử sức đạo diễn trong phim ‘Woman of the Hour’
creator: Nhất Anh
content: – Minh tinh Anna Kendrick, nổi tiếng với vai diễn Beca Mitchell trong bộ phim “Pitch Perfect,” nay thử sức với vai trò đạo diễn trong bộ phim đầu tay mang tên “Woman of the Hour.” Theo tin của trang mạng Collider, bộ phim thuộc thể loại tâm lý tội phạm, dựa trên câu chuyện có thật ngoài đời, xoay quanh nhân vật Rodney Alcala, một kẻ hiếp dâm và giết người hàng loạt đã phạm nhiều tội ác nhưng bằng cách nào đó trốn thoát trong nhiều năm. Giả vờ là một nhiếp ảnh gia đang tìm người mẫu, Rodney Alcala đã thao túng và dụ dỗ những cô gái trẻ ngây thơ, sau đó tấn công, cưỡng hiếp dã man và giết chết họ. Đặc biệt, giữa lúc đang là một kẻ giết người hàng loạt, Rodney Alcala còn tự tin xuất hiện trên chương trình hẹn hò thập niên 1970 mang tên “The Dating Game” với trò chơi hẹn hò giấu mặt để ghép đôi một thí sinh nữ với ba người chơi nam giới độc thân. Từ đây, thí sinh nữ trở thành một con mồi “béo bở” để Rodney Alcala giở trò mánh khóe đồi bại của mình. Không chỉ đóng vai trò là đạo diễn mà Anna Kendrick còn đóng vai nữ chính Cheryl Bradshaw, một nữ diễn viên bị công ty đại diện ép tham gia trò chơi để “hâm nóng” tên tuổi, trở thành con mồi của Rodney Alcala. “Women of the Hour” không chỉ tập trung vào những tội...

title: Ukraine has destroyed or damaged all 3 bridges over Russia's Seym River, Russian sources say
creator: By ILLIA NOVIKOV - Associated Press
content: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Ukrainian forces have either destroyed or damaged all three of the bridges over the Seym River in western Russia, according to Russian sources, as Kyiv's incursion into western Russia entered its third week Tuesday. Kyiv's incursion into Russia's Kursk region is changing the trajectory of the war and boosting morale among Ukraine's war-weary population, though the ultimate outcome of the incursion — the first attack on Russia since World War II — remains impossible to predict. Even as Ukraine hails its success on Russian territory, the Russian push in eastern Ukraine is poised to claim another key center, the city of Pokrovsk. Ukraine's attacks on the three bridges over the Seym River in Kursk could potentially trap Russian forces between the river, the Ukrainian advance and the Ukrainian border. Already they appear to be slowing down Russia’s response to the Kursk incursion, which Ukraine launched on Aug. 6. Over the weekend, Ukraine’s Air Force commander posted two videos of bridges over the Seym being hit, and satellite photos by Planet Labs PBC analyzed Tuesday by The Associated Press confirmed that a bridge in the town of Glushkovo had been destroyed. A Russian military investigator confirmed Monday that Ukraine had “totally destroyed” one bridge and damaged two others in the area. The full extent of the damage remained unclear. “As a result of targeted shelling with the use of rocket and artillery weapons against residential buildings and civilian...

title: Protesters confront police outside Israeli consulate on 2nd night of Democratic convention
creator: By SOPHIA TAREEN, JOEY CAPPELLETTI and LEA SKENE - Associated Press
content: CHICAGO (AP) — Police handcuffed at least four people and led them away from a pro-Palestinian demonstration after protesters charged a line of officers on the second night of the Democratic National Convention. A small crowd of a few dozen protesters chanted “Let them go!” outside a Chicago skyscraper that houses the Israeli consulate while police penned demonstrators in on the street, preventing them from marching. Officers with wood clubs pushed protesters back, shouting “move." Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: Các hoạt động quan trọng tại giáo xứ Chính Tòa Chúa Kitô

content: – Linh Mục Thái Quốc Bảo, viện trưởng (rector) giáo xứ Chính Tòa Chúa Kitô (Christ Cathedral), Garden Grove, hôm Thứ Ba, 20 Tháng Tám, vừa gởi thông báo mời gọi đồng hương và giáo dân tham dự các hoạt động quan trọng từ nay đến cuối năm. title: Buscan a hombre reportado como desaparecido en San Juan
creator: Andrea Guemárez Soto
content: José Enrique Ramos Quiñones, de 30 años, fue visto por última vez el 10 de agosto en los predios del Hogar Crea en el Centro Médico de Río Piedras 21 de agosto de 2024 - 9:02 PM Agentes del Cuerpo de Investigaciones Criminales de San Juan (CIC) solicitaron, este martes, la ayuda de la ciudadanía para encontrar un hombre que fue visto por útlima vez, el pasado 10 de agosto, en los predios del Hogar Crea, en el Centro Médico de Río Piedras . De acuerdo con la requisitoria especial del Negociado de la Policía , José Enrique Ramos Quiñones, de 30 años, fue reportado como desaparecido por su tío Isaac Manzano . Ramos Quiñones fue descrito con una estatura de cinco pies y 10 pulgadas (5′10′′), con un peso de 210 libras, de tez blanca, ojos azules y cabello negro. Como señas particulares, la Uniformada indicó que el hombre luce un tatuaje en la muñeca izquierda que lee “Elisa”. También tiene un tatuaje en su espalda con el nombre “Clarissa”. Cuando fue visto por última vez, vestía un pantalón negro largo, una camisa roja y sandalias. Si usted posee información que conduzca al paradero de esta persona, puede llamar a la línea confidencial de la Policía en el teléfono 787-343-2020. También puede enviar mensajes directos mediante la red social X (antes conocida como Twitter) a la cuenta @PRPDNoticias , o en la cuenta de Facebook de la Uniformada en www . facebook.com/prpdgov .

title: हरियाणा बिजली विभाग के लाइनमैन ने दी जान, SDO पर लगाए गंभीर आरोप
creator: News18 Hindi
content: सोनीपत . हरियाणा के सोनीपत में उस समय सनसनी फ़ैल गई, जब बिजली विभाग में लाइनमैन के पद पर तैनात कर्मचारी ने पैसेंजर ट्रेन के आगे कूदकर अपनी जीवनलीला समाप्त कर ली. मृतक अजीत राठी सोनीपत का रहने वाला था और उसके पास से पुलिस को एक नोट भी बरामद हुआ है, जिसमे उसने आपने एसडीओ विक्की गहलावत पर मानसिक तौर पर तंग करने के आरोप लगाए हैं, सोनीपत पुलिस ने अब मामले की गंभीरता से जांच शुरू कर दी है. दरअसल, सोनीपत के रहने वाला अजीत नाम का एक युवक बिजली विभाग में लाइनमैन के पद पर कार्यरत था, लेकिन मंगलवार को उसने सोनीपत से गुजरने वाली ट्रेन के सामने कूदकर अपनी जीवनलीला समाप्त कर ली. उसने ये खौफनाक कदम उठाने से पहले देश के पीएम और हरियाणा के मुख्यमंत्री के नाम एक नोट भी छोड़ा और अपनी मौत का जिम्मेदार बिजली विभाग में कार्यरत एसडीओ विक्की गहलावत पर लगाया. उसने नोट में लिखा कि विक्की गहलावत काफी लंबे समय से उसे मानसिक रूप से प्रताड़ित कर रहा है और इसके लिए अब वह अपनी जान दे रहा है. लाइनमेन ने लिखा कि एसडीओ से पूरा दफ्तर परेशान है और इसके कार्यकाल में जो भी नए कनेक्शन और बिल करेक्शन हुए हैं उनकी जांच की जाए. घटना की जानकारी मिलते ही सोनीपत जीआरपी थाना पुलिस मौके पर पहुंची और शव को कब्जे में लेकर पोस्टमार्टम के लिए सिविल अस्पताल में भिजवा दिया और परिजनों को इसकी सूचना दी गई. एसडीओ के खिलाफ केस ः जीआरपी जीआरपी थाना प्रभारी महावीर सिंह ने बताया कि सोनीपत से गुजरने वाली पैसेंजर ट्रेन के सामने कुदकर एक युवक ने जान दी है युवक की पहचान अजीत राठी लाइनमैन बिजली विभाग के रूप में हुई है, अजीत के पास से एक नोट भी बरामद हुआ है. विक्की गहलावत के खिलाफ मुकदमा दर्ज किया जा रहा है और मामले की गंभीरता से जांच की जा...

title: यूपी-बिहार की सीमा पर हाईअलर्ट, स्टेशन, बस स्टैंड निकलने से पहले पढ़ लें यह खबर
creator: News18 Hindi
content: रिपोर्ट- गाेविंद कुमार गोपालगंज. अनुसूचित जाति (एससी) और अनुसूचित जनजाति (एसटी) के आरक्षण को सब कैटेगरी बनाने वाले सुप्रीम कोर्ट के फैसले को लेकर सियासी संघर्ष तेज हो गयी है. आरक्षण पर सुप्रीम कोर्ट के फैसले के खिलाफ 21 अगस्त यानी बुधवार को भारत बंद का ऐलान किया गया है, जो सोशल मीडिया पर लगातार ट्रेंड कर रहा है. बहुजन समाज पार्टी (बीएसपी) से लेकर तमाम दलित संगठन और सामाजिक संगठनों ने 21 अगस्त को भारत बंद के समर्थन कर दिया है. इस तरह छह साल बाद एक फिर से दलित समाज की लोग सड़क पर उतरने जा रहे हैं. इधर, भारत बंद के आह्रवान को लेकर बिहार पुलिस भी हाई अलर्ट है. गोपालगंज एसपी स्वर्ण प्रभात ने जिलेभर के पुलिस को अलर्ट करते हुए मंगलवार की रात से ही अपने-अपने इलाके में निगरानी बढ़ाने के निर्देश दिये हैं. यूपी-बिहार के सीमावर्ती इलाकों से लेकर जिले की सभी सीमाओं पर पुलिस अलर्ट है. आने-जानेवाले लोगों पर पुलिस निगरानी रख रही है. आंदोलन में किसी तरह का उपद्रव या लोगों को परेशान करनेवाले गतिविधि होने पर पुलिस सख्ती से निपटेगी. वज्र वाहन, क्यूआरटी, डायल-112, अग्निशमन समेत सभी टीम को अलर्ट किया गया है. भारत बंद के आंदोलन में शामिल होने के लिए बड़ी संख्या में लोग बाहर से पहुंचे हुए हैं. बताया जा रहा है कि आंदोलनकारी ट्रेन, एनएच-27 व एनएच-531 पर परिचालन को बाधित कर सकते हैं. हालांकि आंदोलन को लेकर रेल पुलिस भी अलर्ट है. रेलवे स्टेशन के अलावा पटरियों पर कड़ी निगरानी रखी जा रही है. आम लोगों से भी अपील की जा रही है कि वे लोग अफवाहों पर ध्यान न दें. रेलवे स्टेशन और बस स्टैंड पर निगरानी बढ़ा दी गयी है. पुलिस के अनुसार किसी भी तरह की हिंसा करने वालों के खिलाफ सख्त कार्रवाई की जाएगी. भारत बंद को...

title: Dangote refinery: Unveiling the newborn Albatross of Colonial Oligarchies
creator: Maxwell Adeyemi Adeleye
content: After the Nigerian government’s numerous promises to give Nigerians a working refinery and her failure to fulfil it, notwithstanding our status as the largest producer of crude oil in Africa, the current antagonisation of Dangote refinery, the largest private refinery in the world, is not a shock to me. I predicted earlier that it is likely that those who ensured Nigeria has no working refinery may not let Dangote refinery reign long, and my prediction is gradually becoming a reality that I pray otherwise. Dangote Refinery is currently facing hindrances and antagonists from external forces and their agents within the sovereign Nigeria. I feel like only one thing remained constant over the years: the realisation that some powerful people don’t want Nigeria to be liberated from their claws. Hence, the frustration and setup to ensure this new refinery owned by Dangote fail. Recently, I have read many opinion articles and columns written by veterans giving credibility to the accusations of the NNPC leadership against Dangote. This writing mostly revolves around Dangote’s monopolistic business in Nigeria, which I am also vehemently against. But you don’t say your child is bad and throw him out to be swallowed by enemies. Regardless of the monopolistic ambition of Dangote and those administrative blunders committed by his team, it is my opinion that the sovereign Nigeria and Nigerians would be the losers if Dangote refinery is shut down. Some people are of the opinion that Dangote...

title: El superyate de la muerte: el viaje festivo por Europa del 'Bill Gates británico' que acabó en tragedia
content: "No la vimos venir" . Ni siquiera James Catfield, el capitán del superyate Bayesian , pudo prever que una implacable tormenta acabaría hundiendo en la madrugada de este lunes esta embarcación de lujo frente a las costas del puerto siciliano de Porticello. Él tuvo suerte. Es uno de los 15 supervivientes de este naufragio , que se ha cobrado, de momento, la vida de un miembro de la tripulación mientras se busca a contrarreloj a seis desaparecidos , todos ellos millonarios, entre ellos el magnate tecnológico Mike Lynch, conocido como el ' Bill Gates británico ', y un ejecutivo de Morgan Stanley. Tras trece años de lucha judicial contra el gigante Hewlett-Packard , y uno de arresto domiciliario en San Francisco a la espera del juicio, Lynch fue absuelto de fraude el pasado junio. Sobre él pesaban hasta 17 cargos que, de haber sido considerado culpable, le hubieran costado hasta 25 años en prisión. Después de pensar que moriría en una cárcel de EEUU debido a sus problemas de salud, el empresario decidió celebrar su victoria judicial junto a sus más allegados con una travesía este verano por varios países europeos a bordo de este velero de lujo. Nunca se esperó que estas vacaciones que debían haber sido una celebración acabarían en una tragedia en forma de naufragio. El Bayesian , un superyate de 56 metros de largo con bandera británica, zarpó de Róterdam (Holanda), y tras cruzar varios países europeos -entre ellos Bélgica, Francia, Reino Unido, España...

title: Hooghly News: ভোর রাতে চৌকিতে ঘুমিয়ে, আচমকাই ধারালো অস্ত্রের কোপ হুগলির বাসিন্দাকে..
creator: ABP Ananda
content: সৌরভ বন্দ্যোপাধ্যায়, হুগলি: ভদ্রেশ্বর খুঁরিগাছি এলাকায় ঘুমন্ত অবস্থায় যুবককে ধারালো অস্ত্র দিয়ে 'খুন'! মৃতের নাম গুড্ডু যাদব।বয়স ২৫ বছর। ইতিমধ্য়েই ঘটনার তদন্তে চন্দননগর পুলিশ। পুলিশ ও স্থানীয় সূত্রে জানা গিয়েছে,ভদ্রেশ্বর পুরসভার ২১ নম্বর ওয়ার্ড খুঁরিগাছি এলাকায় খাটাল রয়েছে যাদবদের।গুড্ডু তাদের খাটালের ভিতর চৌকিতে ঘুমিয়ে ছিলেন প্রতিদিনের মত। মঙ্গলবার ভোর রাতে তাকে ধারালো অস্ত্র দিয়ে কুপিয়ে মারা হয়।চন্দননগর হাসপাতালে নিয়ে গেলে যুবককে মৃত বলে ঘোষণা করেন চিকিৎসক।ভদ্রেশ্বর থানার পুলিশ চন্দননগর পুলিশের গোয়েন্দারা ঘটনাস্থলে যান।তদন্ত শুরু হয়।পুলিশের প্রাথমিক অনুমান ব্যাক্তিগত শত্রুতার জেরে এই খুন হতে পারে।স্থানীয়রা জানিয়েছেন খাটালে বহিরাগতদের আনাগোনা ছিল।চন্দননগর পুলিশ কমিশনার অমিত পি জাভালগি জানান,পরিবার এলাকার বাসিন্দাদের সঙ্গে কথা বলে কিছু সূত্র পাওয়া গেছে।তদন্ত সব দিক খতিয়ে দেখা হচ্ছে। রিজেন্ট পার্ক এলাকায় খাল থেকে বস্তাবন্দি মহিলার দেহ উদ্ধারের ঘটনায় সামনে এল চাঞ্চল্যকর তথ্য। পুলিশ সূত্রে দাবি, ময়নাতদন্তের প্রাথমিক রিপোর্টে উল্লেখ রয়েছে, জলে ফেলার সময়ও জীবিত ছিলেন মহিলা। এই পরিস্থিতিতে মহিলার পরিচয় জানার চেষ্টা করছে পুলিশ। শরীরে তখনও প্রাণ রয়েছে। সেই অবস্থাতেই প্রথমে দেহ ঢুকিয়ে দেওয়া হয় বস্তায়। বেঁধে দেওয়া বস্তার মুখ এরপর জীবন্ত অবস্থায় মহিলাকে ফেলে দেওয়া হয় জলে। রিজেন্ট পার্কে মহিলার বস্তাবন্দি দেহ উদ্ধারের ঘটনায় ময়নাতদন্তের প্রাথমিক রিপোর্টে এমনই তথ্য সামনে এল। পুলিশ সূত্রে খবর, মৃতের মাথার পিছনে আঘাত রয়েছে। তবে তা কোনও মারের আঘাত নয়। বিকেলের দিকে রিজেন্ট পার্ক থানা এলাকার শান্তিনগর ব্রিজের ঠিক তলায় খালের মধ্যে একটি বস্তা...

title: Bloqueo por indígenas en la Panamericana: reclaman al Gobierno Petro la demora en reconocerlos como autoridad tradicional
content: Nuevos bloqueos sobre la vía Panamericana en la altura de Cajibío, entre Cali y Popayán, se presentaron este martes, 20 de agosto, por parte de las comunidades indígenas. El bloqueo se registra desde las horas de la tarde, al parecer porque el gobierno de Gustavo Petro no ha entregado el decreto al movimiento Aiso que los reconoce como autoridad indígena tradicional. Por medio de redes sociales se conocieron varios videos en los que se observa cómo dos volquetas están sobre la vía con su carga, tras ser obligados por las mismas comunidades que realizan el bloqueo. “El taponamiento de la vía Panamericana será de manera indefinida hasta la entrega formal del decreto. Responsabilizamos al Gobierno nacional por las violaciones a los derechos humanos que se puedan presentar en contra de nuestras comuneras, comuneros, autoridades, adultos mayores, niños, en el intento de desalojo a través del Punto de Mando Unificado Nacional organizado por el Ministerio del Interior”, expresó la lideresa Mercedes Tumbalá en diálogo con El País de Cali. Tumbalá dijo: “ No aceptamos la presencia de delegados o funcionarios que lo único que han hecho es demostrar la poca capacidad política y técnica para sostener un diálogo serio con las autoridades de nuestro movimiento”. Nuevo bloqueo en la vía Panamericana a la altura de Cajibío, entre Cali y Popayán. https://t.co/if1kX8qDUN pic.twitter.com/LOL5rzjRt2 Por su parte, Gerardo Arroyo, exdirector ejecutivo del Consejo Gremial y...

title: Eala gets first US Open qualifier win
creator: Aric John Sy Cua
content: MANILA, Philippines — Alex Eala of the Philippines on Wednesday (Manila time) tallied her first win of the US Open qualifiers in a three-set victory to start her campaign. title: 기저귀만 차고 울던 3살 아이...탐문 수색해 엄마 찾아준 경찰

title: Jennifer Lopez solicita el divorcio de Ben Affleck tras dos años de matrimonio
content: Luego de meses de acaparar titulares sobre su separación y rumores de crisis , la cantante y actriz Jennifer Lopez (54 años) solicitó el divorcio de su marido Ben Affleck (51) tras dos años de matrimonio. Según el portal de espectáculos TMZ , la estadounidense de origen puertorriqueño presentó este martes los documentos pidiendo su divorcio en el Tribunal Superior del condado de Los Angeles (California, EEUU). Destaca que la 'diva de El Bronx' no presentó los documentos a través de un abogado, sino que hizo el trámite ella misma. De acuerdo con el portal, Lopez estableció en el documento legal la fecha de la separación de su pareja el pasado 26 de abril , poco más de una semana antes de la Gala del 6 de mayo del Museo Metropolitano, a la que acudió sola, dando pie a rumores sobre su matrimonio. El último evento público al que asistieron juntos fue un partido de Los Angeles Lakers el 16 de marzo. De hecho, en el segundo aniversario de matrimonio, el pasado julio, no hubo celebración porque ya estaban separados. Según estas informaciones, la separación definitiva se produjo en mayo, cuando se publicó que el actor y director había dejado la residencia de 60 millones de dólares que compartía con López. Una publicación compartida de Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) Según trascendió, presuntamente Affleck prefiere una vida tranquila, alejado de los medios , mientras que a su esposa le gusta la atención mediática. Tras dejar el hogar, Affleck alquiló una...

title: '女포켓볼 최강' 서서아, SOOPER리그 레이디스 나인볼 '초대 챔프' 등극
Reunião tensa sobre emendas teve queixa de Lira sobre dobradinha Planalto-STF
creator: Catia Seabra, Julia Chaib, Renato Machado, Victoria Azevedo
content: O encontro desta terça-feira (20) para tratar do impasse sobre emendas parlamentares que reuniu ministros do STF (Supremo Tribunal Federal), representantes do governo Lula (PT) e os presidentes da Câmara, Arthur Lira ( PP -AL), e do Senado , Rodrigo Pacheco ( PSD -MG), foi marcado por um clima de tensão e críticas do alagoano, de acordo com relatos. Representaram o governo federal os ministros Rui Costa (Casa Civil), que é o chefe da JEO (Junta de Execução Orçamentária), e Jorge Messias (Advocacia-Geral da União). Segundo um participante, o encontro foi "tudo menos tranquilo". De acordo com essa autoridade, a todo momento algum participante rebatia o que o outro falava. Na sua primeira intervenção, Lira afirmou que a sociedade e a imprensa estavam dizendo que o placar do encontro era 2 a 1 ou 14 a 2, em alusão a uma suposta dobradinha entre os Poderes Judiciário e o Executivo nas decisões que brecaram os repasses das emendas parlamentares. Ele então afirmou que representa 513 deputados e que, portanto, não estava sozinho na reunião. Há uma avaliação entre os parlamentares que representantes do governo Lula tiveram participação nas decisões do ministro Flávio Dino , do STF , e que depois foram chanceladas pelo plenário da corte , suspendendo o pagamento de emendas. Dino é aliado de Lula, foi ministro de seu governo e, depois, indicado pelo petista para ocupar uma cadeira do STF. Essa suposta dobradinha também foi tema de conversa entre Lira e o...

title: La peña más internacional de UD Las Palmas cumple 10 años
creator: José Luis Jiménez Mendoza
content: El presidente de la peña ' Amarillos por el Mundo' , Sergio Macanti , está de enhorabuena por dos razones: la entidad de apoyo a UD Las Palmas cumple 10 años y porque puede hacerlo con un sueño nacido cuando se creó: disfrutar del equipo amarillo en LaLiga EA Sports. Ese mares recordó, en una entrevista a 'Hora UD' de UD Radio, que en la temporada 2014-15 nació este grupo de aficionados por la frustración producida por no lograr el ascenso ante el Córdoba con anterioridad. A partir de ahí, se organizó una asociación de aficionados que estaban por el planeta desperdigados . Aquel 2014 UD Las Palmas firmó el mejor inicio de temporada de su historia y casualmente el décimo aniversario de 'Amarillos por el Mundo' coincide con el 75 aniversario de UD Las Palmas. Macanti, que se dedica al turismo y sabe cómo se organiza la logística de los viajes, destaca que ' Amarillos por el Mundo ' ayuda a que la gente se acerque a UD Las Palmas tanto dentro como cuando juega fuera del Estadio de Gran Canaria. Y eso pasa por aportar, por ejemplo, a través de las redes sociales información clave para los desplazamientos o para adquirir entradas en el Estadio de Gran Canaria. Entre sus socios están integrantes de diáspora amarilla , extranjero que están en la islas y en el resto del mundo desde EE.UU, Australia, Suecia, Ghana "y todos con nombre y apellido". Macanti dijo que tiene "casi un fundador" en la República Dominicana "y tenemos a Tomás, uno de nuestros directivos,...

title: El creador de Ataque a los Titanes te recomienda leer este nuevo manga
creator: José Alejandro Mendoza
content: Hajime Isayama recomienda el nuevo manga centrado en MMA, titulado "The Unbeatable Duo- Muhai no Futari" Hace varios años que finalizó el manga de Ataque a los Titanes , el cual tuvo una de las conclusiones más polémicas de todos los tiempos , la cual, a día de hoy, sigue provocando opiniones divididas dentro del fandom. Sin embargo, esto no ha sido impedimento para que esta obra sea considerada como una de las más populares e influyentes de la época. Asimismo, la revolucionaria y oscura premisa que relató Hajime Isayama hizo de Ataque a los Titanes una de las obras más populares de la época, logrando un gran éxito a nivel mundial que sirvió para que este artista fuera muy reconocido por su gran trabajo al crear esta historia, posicionándose como uno de los mangakas más influyentes de la industria manga/anime . Y tal parece que, ahora en su tiempo libre, Hajime Isayama se ha dedicado a disfrutar como todo buen fan de las obras de sus colegas. Es por ello que, recientemente, ha aprovechado la gran influencia y popularidad que tiene para recomendar un nuevo manga que le ha encantado . Hajime Isayama, creador de Ataque a los Titanes, recomienda leer The Unbeatable Duo- Muhai no Futari Hajime Isayama ha visto un enorme potencial en el nuevo manga The Unbeatable Duo- Muhai no Futari, por lo que no ha dudado en recomendárselo a los fans Se sabe que es bastante común que los mangakas compartan sus opiniones y gustos en lo que respecta a otras obras de la industria ,...

title: Carrión ajusta las claves para el Leganés
creator: José Luis Jiménez Mendoza
content: El entrenador de UD Las Palmas, Luis Carrión, dirigió este martes la puesta a punto para el primer encuentro de la temporada que la UD Las Palmas disputará lejos del Estadio de Gran Canaria. Su siguiente rival, el CD Leganés, partido que se disputará el próximo domingo, 25 de agosto, a las 18 hora canaria, en el Municipal de Butarque en LaLiga EA Sports. La sesión se inició con un ejercicio de rondos y continuó con secuencias de contro l y pase, juegos de posición, trabajo específico y finalizaciones.

People versus Process
Emendas impositivas e distorções federativas
creator: José Eduardo Faria
content: Ao suspender os pagamentos das emendas impositivas aos membros do Congresso Nacional , sob a justificativa de que eles não viriam obedecendo os critérios técnicos previstos pela Constituição , o Supremo Tribunal Federal recolocou na ordem do dia dois problemas interconectados. O primeiro diz respeito à necessidade de imposição de regras mais efetivas de transparência e de procedimentos de rastreabilidade dos recursos a serem encaminhados pelo Executivo federal aos entes subnacionais, conforme os interesses políticos e eleiçoeiros de deputados e senadores. O segundo problema diz respeito ao risco de que esses recursos sejam pulverizados por meio de emendas não vinculadas a projetos formulados de modo tecnicamente consistente e com base no interesse público. Desmentindo mais uma vez o provérbio de que o Brasil seria o país do futuro, a interconexão desses dois problemas volta a recolocar na ordem do dia, assim, o desafio de que o Brasil até hoje não conseguiu vencer —a formulação de um projeto de nação. Na defesa de seus interesses paroquianos , os parlamentares insistem em afirmar que conhecem as necessidades de seus municípios melhor do que a tecnocracia da União. Por conveniência, porém, esquecem-se de que se a distribuição de quase metade do Orçamento federal for estilhaçada , os diferentes interesses locais e a falta de eficiência na sua aplicação continuarão mantendo as profundas desigualdades regionais, impedindo assim o progresso do...

title: ¡Nuevo cortocircuito eléctrico! José Cevallos demanda a Emelec, confirma director ejecutivo azul
creator: Tonio Cisneros
content: Emelec se hunde en una crisis no solo futbolística, sino también administrativa. Lo que en principio había trascendido como posibilidad se convirtió en realidad. El exvolante José Francisco Cevallos demandó a la institución guayaquileña. Al desastre azul se suma el hecho de que está último en la segunda etapa de Liga Pro y con tres derrotas consecutivas. Además tiene menos tres puntos debido a una deuda con un exjugador, que la dirigencia señaló que se canceló y ahora el castigo está en proceso de apelación ante la Ecuafútbol. Pero en el descalabro eléctrico hay un silencio por parte del presidente José Pileggi, que no ha emitido declaración alguna, y el que ha salido al frente ha sido Carlos Javier Puga, director ejecutivo millonario. El dirigente, durante una entrevista radial, confirmó que el exmediocampista sí planteó una acción legal contra el club. “José Francisco (Cevallos) nos ha demandado. La demanda tiene que conocerse y debe seguir su curso; y, mientras eso no pase, ni él ni nosotros tenemos la razón: serán los jueces los que determinen eso”, expresó. “Sobre el profesor Hernán Torres (otra demanda), hasta el momento son rumores, no hay nada”, añadió Puga en conversación con radio Huancavilca . (D) Hay un nuevo Disney+ donde todo se encuentra. Contrata el UFC, suscríbete aquí.

title: Killeen Council sets September date for proposed budget approval
creator: By Kevin Limiti | Herald
content: The Killeen City Council on Tuesday unanimously approved setting Sept. 3 as the date for approval of the proposed fiscal 2025 budget. The City Council opted not to go over the budget presentation again, which it had during previous meetings. A proposed tax rate increase will also be voted on Sept. 3, which is 65.73 cents per $100 valuation, up from the current tax rate of 62.08 cents. According to a city of Killeen news release, this is the first proposed increase since fiscal year 2015. BUDGET HIGHLIGHTS The proposed 2025 budget totals $314 million, with general fund expenditures at $125.3 million, which is $4.7 million higher than the current year’s budget. Next year, Killeen is set to bring $5 million more in property tax revenue than the current budget, but the city of Killeen says this will be offset by the reduction in revenue from the state’s disabled veterans property tax exemption, as well as approximately $500,000 less in sales tax and less than $200,000 in revenue from fines. Killeen is one of a few Texas cities that get reimbursement from the state due to the disabled veterans tax exemption, but the reimbursements don’t cover the full amount of property taxes the city could have collected if the exemption were not in place. The tax exemption is based on Veterans Affairs disability ratings. For example, a veteran with a 100% disability rating does not have to pay any property taxes. In most towns it’s no big deal, but in veteran-heavy Killeen, the city feels the...

title: Disciplinar e reduzir as emendas impositivas
content: Parece satisfatório o acordo que brotou nesta terça-feira (20) de um encontro entre representantes de Executivo, Legislativo e Judiciário para disciplinar aspectos do regime das emendas parlamentares. A solução, contudo, limita-se a corrigir defeitos de segunda ordem da grande distorção em que se converteu esse dispositivo no Brasil. Em decisão unânime, na sexta-feira (16) o Supremo Tribunal Federal havia suspendido liminarmente os repasses de verbas oriundos de emendas parlamentares de execução obrigatória. Do modo como vinham sendo realizados, esses pagamentos feriam princípios constitucionais como o da transparência e da eficiência exigidas de atos e despesas estatais. A decisão, que referendou o voto do relator, o ministro Flávio Dino , vinculou a retomada dos desembolsos das emendas impositivas à adoção de regras que garantam a rastreabilidade da verba, a prestação de contas e a observância de limites fiscais. Foi dessa normatização que tratou a reunião entre Poderes patrocinada pelo presidente do STF , Luís Roberto Barroso . Os representantes reunidos comprometeram-se, segundo nota divulgada pelo tribunal, a acabar com a opacidade na destinação de dinheiro do contribuinte pelas chamadas emendas Pix, mecanismo pelo qual a União transfere recursos diretamente para prefeituras. Para as demais emendas individuais —cada deputado define repasses de quase R$ 40 milhões anuais, e cada senador, de quase R$ 70 milhões— promete-se a edição em dez...

¿Qué es la chikungunya y que puede producir este insecto encontrado de nuevo en Canarias?
creator: José Luis Jiménez Mendoza
content: La chikungunya es una enfermedad viral transmitida por mosquitos y causada por el virus CHIKV, un ARN del género alfavirus de la familia Togaviridae. El nombre chikungunya deriva de una palabra del idioma kimakonde que significa 'contorsionarse'. La Consejería de Sanidad del Gobierno de Canarias ha notificado una nueva detección de un ejemplar adulto de mosquito Aedes albopictus en una de las trampas instaladas en el aeropuerto Tenerife Sur. Este mosquito puede producir chikungunya. Desde 2004, los brotes de CHIKV se han vuelto más frecuentes y generalizados , en parte debido a las adaptaciones virales que permiten que el virus se propague más fácilmente por los mosquitos Aedes albopictus. El CHIKV se ha identificado actualmente en más de 110 países de Asia, África, Europa y las Américas. La transmisión se ha interrumpido en las islas donde una alta proporción de la población está infectada y luego inmune ; sin embargo, la transmisión a menudo persiste en países donde grandes partes de la población aún no han sido infectadas. El Sistema de Vigilancia Entomológica de Canarias se mantiene activo en esta instalación aeroportuaria desde que en diciembre de 2023 se localizase un primer ejemplar de esta misma especie, vector de transmisión de enfermedades víricas en otras zonas geográficas donde esas patologías son endémicas. Canarias pide colaboración ciudadana para identificar mosquitos invasores y la eliminación de sus puntos de cría En esta zona,...

title: Trabajadores independientes obtienen acceso a seguridad social y pensión con este nuevo esquema del IMSS
creator: Elsi Ventura
content: El Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social (IMSS) ha registrado un notable aumento en la cobertura de seguridad social para personas trabajadoras independientes. En comparación con la modalidad anterior, que contaba con 32 mil asegurados, el nuevo esquema ha elevado el número a más de 223 mil , lo que representa un crecimiento superior al 590%. Actualmente, más de 730 mil personas gozan de seguridad social bajo esta nueva modalidad. El Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social (IMSS) ha lanzado un nuevo esquema de seguridad social diseñado para trabajadores independientes , incluyendo profesionales, comerciantes pequeños, artesanos y otros no asalariados. Este esquema permite su incorporación voluntaria al Régimen Obligatorio del IMSS y ofrece la opción de contribuir a una subcuenta de vivienda. Te podría interesar: Se acerca septiembre, mes del dictamen del Seguro Social Este esquema también se extiende a mexicanos que laboran en el extranjero y no tienen un patrón en México. Al afiliarse al IMSS bajo esta modalidad para Personas Trabajadoras Independientes, estos trabajadores y sus beneficiarios legales pueden acceder a servicios médicos y prestaciones sociales en México , así como a un fondo para el retiro. title: Past presidents, political props and Republicans who ditched Trump: Takeaways from Day 2 of the DNC
creator: News Staff
content: The Democratic National Convention’s second night highlighted the party’s past presidents, particularly Chicago’s own Barack Obama. The Democrats also went all-in on promoting cross-party appeal, featuring a former Donald Trump spokeswoman and a Republican mayor from the battleground state of Arizona. Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, ducked out of Chicago to hold a rally just up the interstate in Milwaukee, wooing voters in swing state Wisconsin. It’s a recognition that, regardless of whatever good vibes may exist at the convention, Democrats expect this presidential election to be razor-close. Here are some takeaways from the convention’s second night. The ex-presidents club If the Republican convention was all about Trump, the Democrats on Tuesday wanted to put Harris in a pantheon with past presidents. It wasn’t just Obama who was to make the case for the vice president. The convention turned to the grandsons of Jimmy Carter and John F. Kennedy to also portray her as the natural heir of past Democratic leaders. As groundbreaking as Harris’ candidacy is as the first woman of color to be her party’s nominee, these speeches by an ex-president and presidential progeny were all about linking her to a broader historical arc, creating a nostalgic message that can animate an increasingly older electorate. Corpo de criança que morreu após ser estuprada e afogada é velado em Vitória do Xingu, no PA
content: O velório está sendo realizado em um salão público que fica na praça de Vitória do Xingu. O sepultamento está marcado para ocorrer nesta quarta (21), no cemitério municipal da cidade. A criança chegou a ficar hospitalizada na UTI pediátrica no Hospital Regional em , . O corpo da menina chegou a Vitória do Xingu sob forte comoção popular diante da violência que tirou a vida de Eloah Gomes. Moradores, entre parentes da vítima, amigos e pessoas que se solidarizaram com a família, fizeram uma manifestação pelas ruas. O caso . No hospital, a equipe médica identificou sinais de violência sexual. O principal suspeito foi preso ainda no domingo e um grupo de moradores tentou invadir a delegacia. O homem era vizinho da família da vítima e confessou o crime. Moradores de Vitória de Xingu, PA, protestam em frente à delegacia após estupro de criança. — Foto: Reprodução/Redes Sociais A Polícia Civil disse que o suspeito vai responder pelos crimes de estupro de vulnerável e homicídio qualificado. O suspeito continua preso preventivamente no complexo penitenciário de Vitória do Xingu. A PC também informou que perícias foram solicitadas e testemunhas são ouvidas para auxiliar as investigações conduzidas sob sigilo pela seccional de Altamira. CD Tenerife se encomienda a la Virgen de Candelaria antes del recibir a UD Almería
creator: José Luis Jiménez Mendoza
content: El CD Tenerife rinde homenaje este miércoles la tradicional visita a la Virgen de Candelaria y que este año coincide antes de recibir a la UD Almería. La representación blanquiazul estará encabezada por el presidente de la entidad, Paulino Rivero , y contará con la presencia de consejeros, dirección deportiva, primera plantilla, cuerpo técnico y auxiliares del primer equipo. La ofrenda a la Patrona de Canarias en la Basílica y Real Santuario Mariano de Nuestra Señora de Candelaria es un acto tradiconal del equipo blanquiazul y que este año se ha retrasado por el calendario de juego en LaLiga Hypermotion. El equipo dirigido por Óscar Cano ha regresado este martes a la isla y completará tres sesiones antes del estreno en casa, el próximo sábado ante la UD Almería (20.30 horas) . Marc Pubill, lateral derecho del Almería, ha considerado que su próximo rival, el Tenerife, " va a querer redimirse en casa con su gente , va a querer sacar todo" tras su derrota ante el Eldense (2-1), y que los almerienses tienen que enseñarle que son "mejores", que van a por "esos tres puntos" y que saldrán "al campo desde un inicio a demostrarlo".

title: Interactivo: ¿Quién es quién en el caso de extorsión del juez Marco Vallecillo?
creator: Noticias de hoy en Honduras: Sucesos, deportes y más
content: Tegucigalpa, Honduras.- El escándalo que rodea al juez Marco Antonio Vallecillo ha desnudado una red de corrupción y extorsión que desmorona la credibilidad del sistema judicial hondureño , poniendo en el ojo del huracán a diversos actores de diferente escala en el mismo contexto. El principal implicado es Marco Antonio Vallecillo. A sus 34 años, pasó en abril pasado de ser juez en el Juzgado de Letras Penal a coordinar el Juzgado de Letras en Criminalidad Organizada, Medio Ambiente y Corrupción, una posición de gran poder y responsabilidad. Sin embargo, su carrera ha sido oscurecida por acusaciones de extorsión. Según la Fiscalía, Vallecillo exigió tres millones de lempiras a un supuesto investigado por un proyecto de borda que nunca se ejecutó en río Claro, en Colón, denominado caso Sysco. La promesa era liberar al ahora testigo protegido del requerimiento fiscal y dar cierre administrativo a su causa. El arresto de Vallecillo ha desatado cuestionamientos sobre la integridad del sistema judicial. Una fuente de confianza reveló a LA PRENSA Premium que el togado, quien previamente colaboraba con organizaciones internacionales, fue suspendido de sus actividades de consultoría tras su captura. Además, está en riesgo de que las autoridades estadounidenses le revoquen su visa. Además, según la información obtenida por este medio, Lisseth Vallecillo, hermana del juez Marco Vallecillo, también fue destituida de su cargo como jueza nacional debido a...

title: Past presidents, political props and Republicans who ditched Trump: Takeaways from Day 2 of the DNC
creator: By JOSH BOAK and NICHOLAS RICCARDI - Associated Press
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, ducked out of Chicago to hold a rally just up the interstate in Milwaukee, wooing voters in swing state Wisconsin. It's a recognition that, regardless of whatever good vibes may exist at the convention, Democrats expect this presidential election to be razor-close. Here are some takeaways from the convention's second night. The ex-presidents club If the Republican convention was all about Trump, the Democrats on Tuesday wanted to put Harris in a pantheon with past presidents. It wasn’t just Obama who was to make the case for the vice president. The convention turned to the grandsons of Jimmy Carter and John F. Kennedy to also portray her as the natural heir of past Democratic leaders. As groundbreaking as Harris' candidacy is as the first woman of color to be her party’s nominee, these speeches by an ex-president and presidential progeny were all about linking her to a broader historical arc, creating a nostalgic message that can animate an increasingly older electorate. “Kamala Harris carries my grandfather’s legacy,” said Jason Carter, the grandson of the 39th president. “She knows what is right and she fights for it.” Jack Schlossberg suggested that Harris would carry forward the agenda of Kennedy. “She believes in America like my grandfather did," Schlossberg said. "That we do things not because they’re easy, but because they’re hard.” A message for Republicans: It’s OK to Quit Trump The...

content: CHICAGO (AP) — The Democratic National Convention's second night highlighted the party's past presidents, particularly Chicago's own Barack Obama. The Democrats also went all-in on promoting cross-party appeal, featuring a former Donald Trump spokeswoman and a Republican mayor from the battleground state of Arizona. title: Gold Prices: સોનાએ લગાવી મોટી છલાંગ, એક દિવસમાં તોડ્યો મહિનાનો રેકોર્ડ
creator: gujarati.abplive.com
content: Gold and Silver: નાણા પ્રધાન નિર્મલા સીતારમણના બજેટ 2024 રજૂ થયા પછી સોના અને ચાંદીના ભાવમાં મોટો ઘટાડો થયો હતો. જેના કારણે સોનું ખરીદવા માંગતા લોકોને લાગ્યું હતું કે હવે ગોલ્ડ ખરીદવાનો યોગ્ય સમય છે. પરંતુ થોડા દિવસો બાદ સોનાએ ફરી લાંબી છલાંગ લગાવી હતી. મંગળવારે સોનાએ રેકોર્ડબ્રેક ઉછાળો માર્યો હતો અને એક જ દિવસમાં 1400 રૂપિયાનો વધારો થયો હતો. સોનામાં એક મહિનામાં સૌથી વધુ વધારો નોંધાયો છે. ચાંદીના ભાવમાં પણ 3100 રૂપિયાનો જંગી વધારો નોંધાયો છે. સોનાના ભાવમાં 1400 અને ચાંદીમાં 3150નો વધારો થયો વૈશ્વિક માંગને કારણે મંગળવારે રાષ્ટ્રીય રાજધાની દિલ્હીના બુલિયન માર્કેટમાં સોનાની કિંમત 1400 રૂપિયા વધીને 74,150 રૂપિયા પ્રતિ 10 ગ્રામ પર પહોંચી ગઈ છે. શુક્રવારે છેલ્લા ટ્રેડિંગ સેશનમાં સોનું 72,750 રૂપિયા પ્રતિ 10 ગ્રામ પર બંધ થયું હતું. ચાંદીનો ભાવ પણ 3,150 વધીને 87,150 રૂપિયા પ્રતિ કિલોએ બંધ રહ્યો હતો, જ્યારે તેનો અગાઉનો બંધ ભાવ 84,000 પ્રતિ કિલો હતો. ઈમ્પોર્ટ ડ્યુટીમાં ઘટાડો કરવાની જાહેરાત બાદ કિંમતો સતત ઘટી રહી હતી નાણાંકીય વર્ષ 2024-25ના બજેટ માં નાણામંત્રી નિર્મલા સીતારમણ દ્વારા સોના પરની આયાત ડ્યૂટી ઘટાડવાની જાહેરાત બાદ ગોલ્ડની કિંમતો સતત ઘટી રહી હતી. 23 જૂલાઈએ સોનાની કિંમત 3,350 રૂપિયા ઘટીને 72,300 રૂપિયા પ્રતિ 10 ગ્રામ થઈ ગઈ હતી. દરમિયાન દિલ્હીમાં, 99.9 ટકા અને 99.5 ટકા શુદ્ધતાનું સોનું તેના અગાઉના બંધ ભાવની સરખામણીએ 1,400 રૂપિયા વધીને 74,150 અને 73,800 રૂપિયા પ્રતિ 10 ગ્રામ પર બંધ થયું હતું. જ્વેલર્સની વધતી જતી માંગને કારણે વધારો જોવા મળી રહ્યો છે. સ્થાનિક જ્વેલર્સની વધતી માંગ સાથે વૈશ્વિક મજબૂત વલણને કારણે સોનાના ભાવમાં વધારો થવાનું કારણ વેપારીઓએ જણાવ્યું હતું. વૈશ્વિક સ્તરે...

title: Kirby Smart mum on Georgia players’ availability against Clemson
creator: Chip Towers - The Atlanta Journal-Constitution (TNS)
content: ATHENS, Ga. — Three Georgia football players saw charges against them dismissed or significantly reduced in recent weeks. But coach Kirby Smart still was not ready Tuesday to share whether a determination has been made on their availability for the Bulldogs’ season opener against Clemson. Racing and reckless driving charges against senior linebacker Smael Mondon were dismissed Monday. Last week, reckless charges against freshman receiver Sacovie White also were dismissed. In July, junior running back Trevor Etienne had DUI charges dismissed, but he pleaded guilty to underage possession of alcohol and no contest to reckless driving. Asked if any of that changed their status for the opener, Smart said, “We’ll deal with all that when it comes time.” Mondon and Etienne are projected starters for the No. 1-ranked Bulldogs, who play 14th-ranked Clemson in the Aflac Kickoff game Aug. 31 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. Mondon practiced with the No. 1 defense in Saturday’s scrimmage, while Etienne did not participate in 11-on-11 work. The Bulldogs generally don’t suspend players for driving offenses, though driving under the influence and under-age consumption are violations of UGA’s policy guidelines for athletes on substance abuse. And, typically, Smart doesn’t announce player suspensions in advance of games. However, UGA did announce this summer that senior defensive back David Daniel-Sisavanh had been dismissed from the team because of serious traffic offenses. Last year, senior...

title: Tunji-Ojo: Year of transformative leadership in Interior ministry
creator: Femi Salako
content: IN a resounding testament to transformative leadership, Hon. Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo, the current Minister of Interior for the Federal Republic of Nigeria, has demonstrated an unwavering commitment to excellence and innovation. His tenure, marked by significant reforms and unprecedented accomplishments, has set a new standard in public service, encapsulating a vision of efficiency, equity, and progressive change. One of Tunji-Ojo’s hallmark triumphs is his commendable feat at the Nigeria Immigration Service (NIS). Confronted with an overwhelming backlog of 204,332 passports, he orchestrated their clearance within a record-breaking three-week period. This remarkable achievement not only alleviated a dire national crisis but also restored confidence in the NIS’s capability to meet the needs of Nigerian citizens efficiently. Beyond addressing immediate crises, Tunji-Ojo’s visionary directives have heralded a new era of efficiency and service delivery. He pledged to revolutionize passport processing by promising a two-week timeline for applications. Starting in February 2024, Nigerians will benefit from the introduction of home and office delivery of passports, a service aimed at enhancing convenience and accessibility. Moreover, his initiative to implement personal uploads of passport photographs streamlines the application process, making it more user-friendly and efficient. Tunji-Ojo’s proactive stance on international relations underscores his commitment to fairness and...

content: ஆகஸ்ட் மாதம் 21ஆம் நாள் புதன் கிழமையான இன்று, எப்போது நல்ல நேரம், எப்போது இராகு காலம், எந்த நேரத்தில் நல்ல காரியங்களை செய்யலாம் உள்ளிட்ட பஞ்சாங்க விவரங்கள் குறித்தான தகவலை இங்கே தெரிந்து கொள்வோம். இன்றைய நாள் பஞ்சாங்கம் விவரம் : August 21, 2024 தமிழ் ஆண்டு - குரோதி வருடம் : ஆவணி 5 , புதன்கிழமை சூரியோதயம் - 06:00 AM சூரியஸ்தமம் - 6:23 PM ராகு காலம் : 12:00 PM முதல் 01:30 PM வரை திதி : 05:07 PM வரை துவிதியை பின்னர் திருதியை சூலம் - சூலம் வடக்கு பரிகாரம் பால் நாள் - மேல் நோக்கு நாள் பிறை - தேய்பிறை சந்திராஷ்டமம் - சிம்மம் நட்சத்திரம் : பூரட்டாதி 12:33 AM வரை பிறகு உத்திரட்டாதி பூரட்டாதி - Aug 21 03:09 AM – Aug 22 12:33 AM உத்திரட்டாதி - Aug 22 12:33 AM – Aug 22 10:05 PM கரணம் : சைதுளை 06:50 AM வரை பிறகு கரசை 05:07 PM வரை பிறகு வனசை 03:25 AM வரை பிறகு பத்திரை (சைதுளை - Aug 20 08:33 PM – Aug 21 06:50 AM கரசை - Aug 21 06:50 AM – Aug 21 05:07 PM வனசை - Aug 21 05:07 PM – Aug 22 03:25 AM) யோகம் : சுகர்மம் 05:00 PM வரை, அதன் பின் த்ருதி சுகர்மம் - Aug 20 08:55 PM – Aug 21 05:00 PM த்ருதி - Aug 21 05:00 PM – Aug 22 01:10 PM எமகண்டம் - 7:33 AM – 9:06 AM குளிகை - 10:39 AM – 12:11 PM துரமுஹுர்த்தம் - 11:47 AM – 12:36 PM தியாஜ்யம் - 08:51 AM – 10:17 AM அபிஜித் காலம் - Nil அமிர்த காலம் - 05:24 PM – 06:50 PM பிரம்மா முகூர்த்தம் - 04:24 AM – 05:12 AM அமாந்த முறை - ஸ்ராவணம் பூர்ணிமாந்த முறை - பாத்ரபதம் விக்கிரம ஆண்டு - 2081, பிங்கள சக ஆண்டு - 1946, குரோதி சக ஆண்டு (தேசிய காலண்டர்) - ஸ்ராவணம் 30, 1946

title: Elderly couple dies in Marikina fire
creator: N/A (Richielyn Canlas)
content: An elderly couple was reportedly trapped and died in a fire that gutted a residential area in Barangay Fortune, Marikina City, on Wednesday, August 21. According to reports, the victims were trapped inside their house along Champaca 2 in Barangay Fortune as the fire started at around 12:36 a.m. The Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP) said the fire was immediately raised to the first alarm at 12:38 a.m. and escalated to the second alarm at 12:45 a.m. Firefighters promptly responded and extinguished the fire at around 1:39 a.m. The fire reportedly damaged around 17 houses, displacing over 20 families. The affected families are currently staying at the barangay's multi-purpose hall. Arson investigators are still determining the cause of the fire.
